 149+ 7B46
 150+ 7B46              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7B46 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7B48 FD 21 C5 7F                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7B4C C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7B4D FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7B50 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7B51 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7B53 3A 99 7E                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7B56                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7B56 A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7B57 C2 5B 7B    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7B5A 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7B5B 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7B5C 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7B5E CD 5B 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7B61                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7B61 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7B63 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7B65                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7B65 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7B67 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7B69 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7B6A F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7B6C DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7B6E FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7B72 66 05
 169+ 7B74 ED 5B 9A 7E                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7B78 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7B7B                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7B7B CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7B7D C2 D2 7C    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7B80 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7B84 74 05
 173+ 7B86 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7B8A 66 01
 174+ 7B8C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7B8D E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7B8F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7B90 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7B92 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7B94 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7B95 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7B97 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7B98 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7B99 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7B9C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7B9D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7B9F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7B9F FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7BA1 D2 D2 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7BA4 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7BA8 74 01
 188+ 7BAA FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7BAE 66 03
 189+ 7BB0 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7BB1 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7BB3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7BB4 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7BB6 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7BB8 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7BB9 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7BBB B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7BBC 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7BBD CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7BC0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7BC1 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7BC3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7BC3 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7BC5 D2 D2 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7BC8 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7BC9 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7BCB 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7BCD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7BCE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7BCE FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7BD0 D2 D2 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7BD3 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7BD7 74 03
 208+ 7BD9              ; Now roll
 209+ 7BD9              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7BD9 3A B9 7D     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7BDC FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7BDE 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7BE0                                   ;   break
 214+ 7BE0 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7BE1 3A BB 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7BE4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7BE6 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7BE7 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7BE8 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7BE9 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7BEA FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7BED 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7BEE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7BF0 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7BF1 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7BF2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7BF4 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7BF5 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7BF7 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7BF8 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7BF9 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7BFA 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7BFB FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7BFF 66 01
 234+ 7C01 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7C04 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7C08 74 01
 236+ 7C0A              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7C0A              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7C0A E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7C0B 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7C0C 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7C0D FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7C10 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7C11 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7C13 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7C14 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7C15 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7C17 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7C18 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7C1A 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7C1B A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7C1C B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7C1D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7C1E FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7C22 66 03
 254+ 7C24 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7C27 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7C2B 74 03
 256+ 7C2D 3A AD 7D     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7C30 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7C32 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7C34              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7C34 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7C35 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7C38 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7C39 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7C3B 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7C3C ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7C3E                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7C3E CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7C40 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7C42 3A AE 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7C45 B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7C46 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7C47 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7C4B 66 03
 271+ 7C4D CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7C50 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7C54 74 03
 273+ 7C56              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7C56              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7C56              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7C56              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7C56               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7C56                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7C56              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7C56 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7C59 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7C5A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7C5C                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7C5C CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7C5E C2 67 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7C61 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7C63 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7C64 C3 6C 7C                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7C67 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7C68 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7C6A 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7C6B 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7C6C FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7C6F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7C70 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7C72                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7C72 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7C74 C2 7D 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7C77 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7C79 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7C7A C3 82 7C                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7C7D 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7C7E 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7C80 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7C81 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7C82 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7C84 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7C85              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7C85 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7C89 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7C8C FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7C8F C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7C90                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7C90 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7C92 D2 C2 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7C95 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7C97 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7C98 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7C99                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7C99 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7C9D CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7CA0 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7CA3 C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7CA4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7CA4 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7CA6 D2 C2 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7CA9 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7CAB 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7CAC C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7CAD                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7CAD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7CB1 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7CB4 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7CB7 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7CB8 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7CBA 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7CBB                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7CBB ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7CBF CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7CC2 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7CC3 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7CC5 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7CC6 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7CCA E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7CCB FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7CCD 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7CCE C2 4C 7B                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7CD1 C9                                   ret
 337+ 7CD2 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7CD3 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7CD5 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7CD6 CD 5F 7A                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7CD9 C3 C3 7C                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7CDC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7CDC FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7CDF FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7CE2 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7CE3 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7CE5 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7CE6 CD E6 94                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7CE9 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7CEA                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7CEA CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7CEC C2 F7 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7CEF              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7CEF 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7CF1 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7CF3 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7CF4 C3 FE 7C                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7CF7              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7CF7 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7CF9 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7CFB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7CFB B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7CFC ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7CFE              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7CFE 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7CFF 32 1D 80                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7D02 C9                                   ret
 365+ 7D03
 366+ 7D03 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7D06 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7D09 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7D0A E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7D0C 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7D0D CD E6 94                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7D10 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7D11                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7D11 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7D13 C2 1E 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7D16                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7D16 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7D18                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7D18 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7D19 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7D1B C3 23 7D                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7D1E              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7D1E 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7D20 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7D22 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7D23              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7D23 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7D24 32 1E 80                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7D27 C9                                   ret
 387+ 7D28
 388+ 7D28
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

1086  7D28                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7D28
   2+ 7D28 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7D29 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7D2D 7D
   4+ 7D2E 28 7D        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7D30 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7D32 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7D35 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7D37 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7D3B              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7D3B
  11+ 7D3B              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7D3B              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7D3B              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7D3B 32 28 7D     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7D3E              .set_target:
  16+ 7D3E 22 35 7D     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7D41              .set_length:
  18+ 7D41 ED 53 30 7D  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7D45              .write_dma:
  20+ 7D45 21 29 7D     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7D48 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7D4A 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7D4C ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7D4E C9           	ret
  25+ 7D4F
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1087  7D4F                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7D4F
   2+ 7D4F 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7D53 7D
   3+ 7D54 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7D56 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7D58 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7D5B 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7D5D 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7D61              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7D61
  10+ 7D61              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7D61              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7D61              .set_target:
  13+ 7D61 22 5B 7D     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7D64              .set_source:
  15+ 7D64 ED 53 54 7D  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7D68              .set_length:
  17+ 7D68 ED 43 56 7D  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7D6C              .write_dma:
  19+ 7D6C 21 4F 7D     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7D6F 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7D71 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7D73 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7D75 C9           	ret
  24+ 7D76

 202+ 7D85              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 203+ 7D85              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 204+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 205+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
 206+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
 207+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
 208+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
 209+ 7D85              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid

 360+ 809A              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 361+ 809A              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 362+ 809A              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 363+ 809A              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 364+ 809A              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 365+ 809A              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 366+ 809A              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 367+ 809A              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 368+ 809A              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 369+ 809A              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 370+ 809A              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 371+ 809A              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 372+ 809A              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 373+ 809A              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.

 129+ 82F5 FE FF       >                        cp      EquipmentItemFitted
 129+ 82F7 C0          >                        ret     nz
 130+ 82F8 34           .EnergyUnitFitted:      inc     (hl)
 131+ 82F9 28 01                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 132+ 82FB C9                                   ret
 133+ 82FC 35           .OverflowedEnergy:      dec     (hl)                                            ;  restore to 255
 134+ 82FD C9                                   ret
 135+ 82FE 21 22 81     .SkipShieldCharge:      ld      hl,PlayerEnergy
 136+ 8301 18 EC                                jr      .UpdatePlayerEnergy
 137+ 8303
 138+ 8303              ; sets carry to true if target
 139+ 8303 3A 25 81     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 8306 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 8308 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 830A E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 830C CA 11 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 830F                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 830F B7          >                        or a
 145+ 8310 C9                                   ret
 146+ 8311              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 146+ 8311 21 73 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 146+ 8314 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 146+ 8316 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 146+ 8317 3C          >                        inc     a
 146+ 8318 CA 1E 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 146+ 831B 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 147+ 831C                                      SetCarryFlag
 147+ 831C 37          >                        scf
 148+ 831D C9                                   ret
 149+ 831E 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNotTargeting     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 150+ 8320 32 25 81                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 151+ 8323 C9                                   ret

  92+ 8399

1102  8439                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 8439              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 8439              doRND2:
   3+ 8439 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 843A              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 843A              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 843A              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 843A              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 843A 3A 95 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 843D CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 843F 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 8440 21 97 7D     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 8443 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 8444 32 95 7D     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 8447 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 8448 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 8449 32 97 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 844C 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 844D 3A 96 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 8450 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 8451 21 98 7D     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 8454 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 8455 32 96 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 8458 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 8459 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 845A 32 98 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 845D 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 845E                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 845E C9                                   ret
  29+ 845F
  30+ 845F 21 95 7D     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 8462 11 99 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 8465 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 8468 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 846A ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 846C ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 846E ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 8470 C9                                   ret
  38+ 8471
  39+ 8471 21 99 7D     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 8474 11 95 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 8477 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 847A ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 847C ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 847E ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8480 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 8482 C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm
1103  8483                  INCLUDE "./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
   1+ 8483 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 8487 58 59 53 45
   1+ 848B 45 44
   2+ 848D 21 3B 7F     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 8490 11 17 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 8493 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 8495 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 8497 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 8499 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 849B ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 849D ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 849F C9                                   ret
  11+ 84A0
  12+ 84A0 21 17 7F     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 84A3 11 3B 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 84A6 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 84A8
  16+ 84A8 21 3B 7F     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 84AB 11 2F 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 84AE 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 84B0
  20+ 84B0 21 2F 7F     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 84B3 11 3B 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 84B6 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 84B8
  24+ 84B8 21 2F 7F     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 84BB 11 17 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 84BE 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 84C0
  28+ 84C0 21 17 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 84C3 11 2F 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 84C6 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 84C8
  32+ 84C8              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 84C8 CD CB 84     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 84CB              .NextStep:
  35+ 84CB CD CE 84     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 84CE              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 84CE 3A 17 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 84D1 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 84D2 21 19 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 84D5 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 84D6 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 84D7 3A 18 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 84DA 21 1A 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 84DD 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 84DE 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 84DF 3A 19 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 84E2 32 17 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 84E5 3A 1A 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 84E8 32 18 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 84EB 3A 1C 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 84EE 32 1A 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 84F1 3A 1B 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 84F4 32 19 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 84F7 B7           		or		a
  55+ 84F8 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 84F9 21 19 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 84FC 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 84FD 32 1B 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8500 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8501 21 1A 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 8504 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 8505 32 1C 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8508 C9           		ret
  64+ 8509
  65+ 8509              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8509 CD 0C 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 850C              .NextStep:
  68+ 850C CD 0F 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 850F              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 850F              ; x = a + c
  71+ 850F 3A 2F 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8512 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8513 21 31 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 8516 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 8517 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 8518              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 8518 3A 30 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 851B 21 32 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 851E 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 851F 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 8520 3A 31 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8523 32 2F 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 8526 3A 32 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 8529 32 30 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 852C 3A 34 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 852F 32 32 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8532 3A 33 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 8535 32 31 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 8538 B7           		or		a
  90+ 8539 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 853A 21 31 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 853D 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 853E 32 33 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 8541 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8542 21 32 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 8545 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 8546 32 34 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 8549 C9           		ret
  99+ 854A
 100+ 854A 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 854B 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 854C 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 854D
 104+ 854D AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 854E 32 A4 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 8551 3A 18 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 8554 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 8555 3A 42 7F     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 8558 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 8559 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 855A 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 855B CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 855D 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 855F ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 8561 32 4C 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 8564 ED 5B 4A 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 8568 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 8569 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 856B 3A 1A 7F     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 856E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 856F 3A 41 7F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 8572 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 8573 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 8574 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 8575 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 8577 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8579 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 857B 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 857C BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 857D 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 857F 3A 4C 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 8582 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 8583 ED 43 4A 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 8587 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 8588 CD C0 84                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 858B C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 858C 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 858D B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 858E C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 858F CD C8 84     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8592 3A A4 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 8595 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 8596 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8598 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8599 32 A4 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 859C 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 859E
 148+ 859E              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 859E 3A 30 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 85A1 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 85A3 32 5C 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 85A6 3A 31 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 85A9 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 85AB CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 85AD CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 85AF CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 85B1 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 85B3 32 5D 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 85B6 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 85B8 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 85BA 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 85BC              .Fedual:
 163+ 85BC 3A 5C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 85BF F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 85C1 32 5C 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 85C4              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 85C4 3A 5C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 85C7 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 85C9 32 5E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 85CC 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 85CD 3A 32 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 85D0 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 85D2 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 85D3 32 5E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 85D6 3A 5D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 85D9 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 85DB 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 85DC 3A 5E 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 85DF 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 85E0 32 5E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 85E3 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 85E5 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 85E7 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 85E8 3A 5C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 85EB 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 85EC 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 85ED 3A 5D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 85F0 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 85F1 32 5F 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 85F4 3A 5C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 85F7 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 85F9 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 85FB 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 85FC 3A 5D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 85FF C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8601 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 8602 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 8604 3A 5F 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8607 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8608 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 860A CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 860C CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 860E CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8610 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8612 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8614 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 8616 ED 53 61 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 861A              .DoRadius:
 209+ 861A 3A 32 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 861D 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 861E 3A 34 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8621 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8623 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 8625 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 8626 ED 43 65 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 862A C9           		ret
 217+ 862B
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  51+ 8787
  52+ 8787
  53+ 8787              getTableText:
  54+ 8787              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 8787              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 8787 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 8788 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 878A ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 878C 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 878D 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 878E 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 878F EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8790 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8791 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 8792
  66+ 8792
  67+ 8792              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 8792              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 8792              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 8792              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 8792              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 8792              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 8792              getRankIndex:
  74+ 8792              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 8792              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 8792 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 8793 B3           	or		e
  78+ 8794 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 8796 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 8797 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 8798 21 D0 86     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 879B              .testLoop:
  83+ 879B 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 879C 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 879D 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 879E E5           	push	hl
  87+ 879F 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 87A0 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 87A1 CD 45 98     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 87A4 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 87A6              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 87A6 E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 87A7 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 87A8 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 87A9 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 87AA 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 87AC              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 87AC E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 87AD C9           	ret
 100+ 87AE
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 227+ 8DC8 85 8D 88 8D  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 227+ 8DCC 8E 8D 8B 8D

 227+ 8DD4 94 8D 9A 8D
 228+ 8DD8 9D 8D        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 229+ 8DDA A0 8D A4 8D  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 230+ 8DDE A9 8D        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 231+ 8DE0 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 232+ 8E01
 233+ 8E01              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8E01              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8E01
 236+ 8E01              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8E01              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8E01              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8E01 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8E02 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8E03 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8E05 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8E06 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8E08 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E0A FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E0C 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E0E              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8E0E C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8E10 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E11 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 251+ 8E13
 252+ 8E13 21 FA 8C     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8E16 C3 1C 8E                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8E19
 255+ 8E19 21 2C 8C     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8E1C ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8E1E ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8E20 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8E21 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8E22 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8E23 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8E24 EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8E25 D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8E26 C9                                   ret
 265+ 8E27
 266+ 8E27
 267+ 8E27              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8E27              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 269+ 8E27 21 AA 8D     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 270+ 8E2A CD 87 87     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8E2D 11 E0 8D     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8E30              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8E30 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8E31 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8E33 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8E35 E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8E36 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8E37 21 2C 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8E3A CD 87 87     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8E3D D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8E3E              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8E3E 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8E3F FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8E41 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8E43              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8E43 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8E44 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8E45 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8E46 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8E48              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8E48 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8E4A 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8E4B 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8E4C E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8E4D 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8E4E 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8E50              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8E50 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8E51 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8E52 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8E53 C9           	ret

 215+ 8EEE              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set

 217+ 8EEE              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 8EEE              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 8EEE              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8EEE              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8EEE              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8EEE              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8EEE              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8EEE              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8EEE              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 8EEE              ;
 227+ 8EEE              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 8EEE              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 8EEE              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8EEE              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8EEE              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8EEE              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8EEE              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8EEE              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8EEE              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 8EEE              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 8EEE              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8EEE              ;
 239+ 8EEE              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8EEE              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram

 242+ 8EEE              ;

 246+ 8EEE              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.

 250+ 8EEE              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts

   1+ 8EEE              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 8EEE 2A FF 83     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 8EF1 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 8EF2 22 FF 83                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 8EF5 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 8EF8 2A 01 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 8EFB ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 8EFD 22 01 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 8F00 C9                                   ret
  10+ 8F01
  11+ 8F01 2A FF 83     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 8F04 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 8F05 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 8F06 2A 01 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 8F09 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 8F0A B5                                   or      l
  17+ 8F0B C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 8F0C B7                                   or      a
  19+ 8F0D 2A FF 83                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 8F10 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 8F12 22 FF 83                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 8F15 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 8F18 2A 01 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 8F1B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 8F1D 22 01 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 8F20                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 8F20 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 8F22 C2 26 8F    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 8F25 C9                                   ret
  28+ 8F26 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0

   2+ 8F30              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder

   6+ 8F34 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 8F36 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 8F37 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 8F38 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 8F39 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 8F3A DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 8F3C CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 8F3E ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 8F40 17                                   rla
  15+ 8F41 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 8F42 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 8F44 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 8F46 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 8F48 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 8F49 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 8F4B ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 8F4D 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 8F4E DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 8F50 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 8F51 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 8F52 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 8F53 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 8F55 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 8F56 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 8F57 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 8F59 D1                                   pop de
  32+ 8F5A C9                                   ret
  33+ 8F5B
  34+ 8F5B FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 8F5D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 8F5F CD 30 8F                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 8F62 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 8F63 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 8F65 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 8F67 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 8F68 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 8F69 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 8F6A C9                                   ret
  44+ 8F6B
  45+ 8F6B                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 8F6B FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 8F6D A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 8F6E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 8F70 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 8F72 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 8F73 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 8F75 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 8F76 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 8F78 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 8F7A CD 30 8F                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 8F7D FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 8F7F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 8F81 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 8F82 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 8F84 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 8F85 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 8F87 C9                                   ret
  63+ 8F88
  64+ 8F88              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 8F88              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 8F88              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 8F88              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 8F88 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 8F89 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 8F8B 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 8F8D 3A 9F 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 8F90 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 8F91 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 8F94 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 8F95 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 8F97 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 8F99 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 8F9A ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 8F9C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 8F9E 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 8FA0 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 8FA1 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 8FA2 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 8FA4 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 8FA5 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 8FA8 C9                                   ret

   3+ 8FAC 3A 9F 7E                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 8FAF C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 8FB1 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 8FB4 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 8FB5                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 8FB5 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 8FB7 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 8FB9 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 8FBB 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 8FBD EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 8FBE 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 8FBF EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 8FC0              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1

  13+ 8FC2 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

  15+ 8FC6 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125

  17+ 8FCA EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 8FCB D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 8FCD C9                                   ret

  35+ 8FD7              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO

  37+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  38+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      e,a
  39+ 8FD7 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  40+ 8FD7 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  42+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  43+ 8FD7 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      d,a
  45+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  46+ 8FD7 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  47+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      e,a
  48+ 8FD7 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  49+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      a,d
  50+ 8FD7 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  51+ 8FD7 ~                                    ld      d,a
  52+ 8FD7                                      ENDM
