  73+ 9018 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  74+ 9019 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  75+ 901B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  76+ 901C AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  77+ 901D                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  77+ 901D FA 35 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  78+ 9020 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  79+ 9021 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9022                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  80+ 9022 FA 27 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  81+ 9025 19                                   add     hl,de
  82+ 9026 C9                                   ret
  83+ 9027 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  84+ 9028 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  85+ 902A 67                                   ld      h,a
  86+ 902B 7A                                   ld      a,d
  87+ 902C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  88+ 902E 57                                   ld      d,a
  89+ 902F 19                                   add     hl,de
  90+ 9030 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  91+ 9032 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  92+ 9033 67                                   ld      h,a
  93+ 9034 C9                                   ret
  94+ 9035 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  95+ 9036 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  96+ 9038 67                                   ld      h,a
  97+ 9039 7A                                   ld      a,d
  98+ 903A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  99+ 903C 57                                   ld      d,a
 100+ 903D B7                                   or      a
 101+ 903E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 102+ 9040 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 103+ 9042 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 104+ 9043 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 9044 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 106+ 9045 C9                                   ret
 107+ 9046              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 107+ 9046 AF          >                    xor a
 107+ 9047 95          >                    sub l
 107+ 9048 6F          >                    ld l,a
 107+ 9049 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 107+ 904A 94          >                    sub h
 107+ 904B 67          >                    ld h,a
 108+ 904C 78                                   ld      a,b
 109+ 904D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 110+ 904F B4                                   or      h
 111+ 9050 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 112+ 9051 C9                                   ret
 113+ 9052
 114+ 9052
 115+ 9052                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 116+ 9052                  ;
 117+ 9052                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 118+ 9052                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 119+ 9052                  ;
 120+ 9052                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 121+ 9052                  ;         carry reset
 122+ 9052                  ;
 123+ 9052                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 124+ 9052 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 125+ 9053 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 126+ 9054 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 127+ 9056 EB                                   ex de,hl
 128+ 9057 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 129+ 9059
 130+ 9059 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 131+ 905A 85                                   add a,l
 132+ 905B 57                                   ld  d,a
 133+ 905C EB                                   ex de,hl
 134+ 905D
 135+ 905D 7A                                   ld  a,d
 136+ 905E CE 00                                adc a,0
 137+ 9060 C9                                   ret
 138+ 9061
 139+ 9061 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 140+ 9062 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 141+ 9063 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 142+ 9065 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 143+ 9066 C9                                   ret
 144+ 9067
 145+ 9067                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 146+ 9067                 ;
 147+ 9067                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 148+ 9067                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 149+ 9067                 ;
 150+ 9067                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 151+ 9067                 ;         carry reset
 152+ 9067                 ;
 153+ 9067                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 154+ 9067
 155+ 9067
 156+ 9067
 157+ 9067 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 158+ 9068 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 159+ 9069 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 160+ 906A 6A                                   ld l,d
 161+ 906B E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 162+ 906C 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 163+ 906D              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 164+ 906D ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 165+ 906F EB                                   ex de,hl
 166+ 9070 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 167+ 9072
 168+ 9072 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 169+ 9073 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 170+ 9074 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 171+ 9075
 172+ 9075 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 173+ 9076 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 174+ 9077 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 175+ 9079
 176+ 9079 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 177+ 907A 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 178+ 907B
 179+ 907B 7A                                   ld a,d
 180+ 907C 85                                   add a,l
 181+ 907D 67                                   ld h,a
 182+ 907E 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 183+ 907F
 184+ 907F D1                                   pop de
 185+ 9080 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 186+ 9082
 187+ 9082 EB                                   ex de,hl
 188+ 9083 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 189+ 9085 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 190+ 9086
 191+ 9086 C9                                   ret
 192+ 9087
 193+ 9087              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 194+ 9087              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 195+ 9087              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 196+ 9087              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 197+ 9087              ;         carry reset
 198+ 9087              ; maths is
 199+ 9087              ;        hl = y , de= x
 200+ 9087              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 201+ 9087              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 202+ 9087              ;
 203+ 9087              ;
 204+ 9087              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 205+ 9087 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 206+ 9088 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 207+ 9089 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 208+ 908A 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 209+ 908B 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 210+ 908C 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 211+ 908D ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 212+ 908F EB                                   ex de,hl
 213+ 9090 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 214+ 9092 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 215+ 9093 59                                   ld e,c
 216+ 9094 50                                   ld d,b
 217+ 9095 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 218+ 9097 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 219+ 9098 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 220+ 9099 67                                   ld h,a
 221+ 909A 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 222+ 909B                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 223+ 909B AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 224+ 909C C1                                   pop     bc
 225+ 909D C9                                   ret
 226+ 909E
 227+ 909E
 228+ 909E              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 229+ 909E              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 230+ 909E 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 231+ 909F AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 232+ 90A0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 233+ 90A2 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 234+ 90A4 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 235+ 90A5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 236+ 90A7 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 237+ 90A8 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 238+ 90A9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 239+ 90AB              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 240+ 90AB 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 241+ 90AC 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 242+ 90AD ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 243+ 90AF 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 244+ 90B0 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 245+ 90B1 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 246+ 90B2 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 247+ 90B3 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 248+ 90B4 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 249+ 90B5 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 250+ 90B7 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 251+ 90B8 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 252+ 90B9 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 253+ 90BA 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 254+ 90BB 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 255+ 90BC 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 256+ 90BD 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 257+ 90BE ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 258+ 90C0 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 259+ 90C1 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 260+ 90C2 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 261+ 90C4 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 262+ 90C5 C9                                   ret
 263+ 90C6
 264+ 90C6              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 265+ 90C6              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 266+ 90C6              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 267+ 90C6              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 268+ 90C6              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 269+ 90C6              ;mult3
 270+ 90C6              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 271+ 90C6              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 272+ 90C6              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 273+ 90C6              ; Algorithm
 274+ 90C6              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 275+ 90C6              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 276+ 90C6              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 277+ 90C6              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 278+ 90C6              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 279+ 90C6              ;
 280+ 90C6              ;
 281+ 90C6 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 282+ 90C7 AC                                   xor     h
 283+ 90C8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 284+ 90CA FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 285+ 90CC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 286+ 90CD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ 90CF 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 288+ 90D1              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 288+ 90D1 AF          >                    xor a
 288+ 90D2 95          >                    sub l
 288+ 90D3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 288+ 90D4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 288+ 90D5 94          >                    sub h
 288+ 90D6 67          >                    ld h,a
 289+ 90D7 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 290+ 90D8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 291+ 90DA 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 292+ 90DC              .DENegative:            NegDE
 292+ 90DC AF          >                    xor a
 292+ 90DD 93          >                    sub e
 292+ 90DE 5F          >                    ld e,a
 292+ 90DF 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 292+ 90E0 92          >                    sub d
 292+ 90E1 57          >                    ld d,a
 293+ 90E2 CD 87 90     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 294+ 90E5 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 295+ 90E7 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 296+ 90E8 C8                                   ret     z
 297+ 90E9
 298+ 90E9
 299+ 90E9
 300+ 90E9 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 301+ 90EA AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 302+ 90EB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 303+ 90ED FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 304+ 90EF 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 305+ 90F0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 306+ 90F2 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 307+ 90F3 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 308+ 90F4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 309+ 90F6 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 310+ 90F7 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 311+ 90F8 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 312+ 90FA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 313+ 90FB B5                                   or      l
 314+ 90FC B3                                   or      e
 315+ 90FD 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 316+ 90FF              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 90FF 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 318+ 9100 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 319+ 9102 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 320+ 9103 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 321+ 9105 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 322+ 9106 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 323+ 9107 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 324+ 9109 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 325+ 910B 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 326+ 910C 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 327+ 910D FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 328+ 910F 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 329+ 9110 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 330+ 9111 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 331+ 9113 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 332+ 9115 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 333+ 9116 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 334+ 9117 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 335+ 9118 CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 336+ 911A FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 337+ 911C 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 338+ 911D C9                                   ret
 339+ 911E 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 340+ 9121                                      ZeroA
 340+ 9121 AF          >                        xor a
 341+ 9122 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 9123 6F                                   ld      l,a
 343+ 9124 C9                                   ret
 344+ 9125
 345+ 9125              ;;;
 346+ 9125              ;;;
 347+ 9125              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 348+ 9125              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 349+ 9125              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 350+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 351+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 352+ 9125              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 353+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 354+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 355+ 9125              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 356+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 357+ 9125              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 358+ 9125              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 359+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 360+ 9125              ;;;                        or      l
 361+ 9125              ;;;                        or      e
 362+ 9125              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 363+ 9125              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 364+ 9125              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 365+ 9125              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 366+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 367+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 368+ 9125              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 369+ 9125              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 370+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 371+ 9125              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 372+ 9125              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 373+ 9125              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 374+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 375+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 376+ 9125              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 377+ 9125              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 378+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 379+ 9125              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 380+ 9125              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 381+ 9125              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 382+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 383+ 9125              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 384+ 9125              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 385+ 9125              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 386+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 387+ 9125              ;;;                        ret
 388+ 9125              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 389+ 9125              ;;;                        ZeroA
 390+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 391+ 9125              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 392+ 9125              ;;;                        ret
 393+ 9125
 394+ 9125              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 395+ 9125              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 396+ 9125              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 397+ 9125              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 398+ 9125              ;         carry reset
 399+ 9125              ;
 400+ 9125              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 401+ 9125 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 402+ 9126 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 403+ 9127 32 25 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 404+ 912A 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 405+ 912B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 406+ 912E 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 407+ 9130 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 408+ 9132 57                                   ld      d,a
 409+ 9133 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 410+ 9135 32 25 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 411+ 9138 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 412+ 9139 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 413+ 913C 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 414+ 913E E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 415+ 9140 67                                   ld      h,a
 416+ 9141 3A 25 91                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 417+ 9144 EE 80                                xor     $80
 418+ 9146 32 25 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 419+ 9149 CD 87 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 420+ 914C 3A 25 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 421+ 914F ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 9152 C8                                   ret     z
 423+ 9153 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 424+ 9154 95                                   sub 	l
 425+ 9155 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 426+ 9156 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 427+ 9157 94                                   sub 	h
 428+ 9158 67                                   ld 		h,a
 429+ 9159 C9                                   ret
 430+ 915A
 431+ 915A AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 432+ 915B 32 25 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 433+ 915E 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 434+ 915F ED 27 80                             test    $80
 435+ 9162 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 436+ 9164 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 437+ 9166 57                                   ld      d,a
 438+ 9167 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 439+ 9169 32 25 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 440+ 916C CD 87 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 441+ 916F 3A 25 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 442+ 9172 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 443+ 9175 C8                                   ret     z
 444+ 9176 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 445+ 9177 95                                   sub 	l
 446+ 9178 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 447+ 9179 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 448+ 917A 94                                   sub 	h
 449+ 917B 67                                   ld 		h,a
 450+ 917C C9                                   ret
 451+ 917D
 452+ 917D
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1114  917D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 917D              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 917D              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 917D
   4+ 917D              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 917D ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 917D ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 917D ~            			mul
   8+ 917D              			ENDM
   9+ 917D
  10+ 917D              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 917D ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 917D ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 917D ~            			mul
  14+ 917D ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 917D              			ENDM
  16+ 917D

1115  917D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 917D              ;- MACROS
   2+ 917D              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 917D ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 917D ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 917D ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 917D                                      ENDM
   7+ 917D
   8+ 917D              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 917D              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 917D 21 26 92    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 9180 ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 9182 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 9183 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9184

1116  9184                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 9184              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9184              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 9184              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 9184              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 9184              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 9184              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 9184 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 9187 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 9188 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 9189              .sqrloop:
  11+ 9189 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 918B CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 918D 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 918E EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 918F ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9191 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 9193 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9194 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9195 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9197              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9197 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 9198 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 9199 B7           	or a
  24+ 919A ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 919C              .sqrfi:
  26+ 919C CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 919E CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 91A0 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 91A2 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 91A4 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 91A6 C9           	ret
  32+ 91A7
  33+ 91A7
  34+ 91A7              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 91A7 3A 9F 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 91AA 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 91AB 3A A0 7E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 91AE 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 91AF CD 84 91     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 91B2 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 91B3 32 9F 7E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 91B6 C9           	ret
  43+ 91B7
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1117  91B7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 91B7              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 91B7              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 91B7              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 91B7              ;
   5+ 91B7              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 91B7 3A A0 7D     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 91BA 21 9F 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 91BD AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 91BE 32 9D 7D                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 91C1 3A 9F 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 91C4 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 91C5 CA 07 92                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 91C8 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 91CA 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 91CD 3A A0 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 91D0 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 91D2 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 91D5 21 9F 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 91D8 BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 91D9 D2 EB 91                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 91DC CD 13 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 91DF                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 91DF B7          >                        or a
  23+ 91E0 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 91E1 3A 9D 7D                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 91E4 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 91E5 A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 91E6 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 91E7 FA 0A 92                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 91EA C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 91EB              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 91EB              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 91EB 3A 9F 7E     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 91EE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 91EF 3A A0 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 91F2 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 91F5 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 91F6 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 91F9 CD 13 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 91FC 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 91FF 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 9200 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 9202                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 9202 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 9203 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 9204 C3 E0 91                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 9207              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 9207 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 9209 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 920A              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 920A 32 BB 7E     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 920D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 920E 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 9210                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 9210 B7          >                        or a
  53+ 9211 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 9212 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 9213              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 9213 CD 3C A0     ARS1:                   call    LL28Amul256DivQ_6502        ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 9216 3A A0 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 9219 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 921B CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 921D CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 921F 21 46 92                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 9222 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 9224 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 9225 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 9226
  66+ 9226              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 9226              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 9226              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 9226              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 9226              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 9226              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 9226              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 9226              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 9226              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 9226              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 9226              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 9226              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 9226              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 9226              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 9226              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 9226              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 9226              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 9226              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 9226              ;;;		ret
  89+ 9226              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 9226              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 9226              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 9226              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 9226              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 9226              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 9226              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 9226              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 9226              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 9226              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 9226              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 9226              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 9226              ;;;		ret
 105+ 9226              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 9226              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 9226              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 9226              ;;;		ret
 110+ 9226              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 9226              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 9226              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 9226              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 9226              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 9226              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 9226              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 9226              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 9226              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 9226              ;;;		ret
 121+ 9226
 122+ 9226
 123+ 9226
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
1118  9226                  INCLUDE "./Maths/SineTable.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/SineTable.asm
   1+ 9226              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 9226              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 9226              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 9226              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 9226              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 9226              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 9226
   8+ 9226
   9+ 9226 00 19 32 4A  SNE:            DB 000, 025, 050, 074, 098, 121, 142, 162
   9+ 922A 62 79 8E A2

  10+ 9232 ED F5 FB FF
  11+ 9236 FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198

1119  9246                  INCLUDE "./Maths/ArcTanTable.asm"
