1120  9266                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9266              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9266              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9266                      ; Input:
   4+ 9266                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9266                      ; Output:
   6+ 9266                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9266                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9266                      ;       AF
   9+ 9266                      ;
  10+ 9266              negate16:
  11+ 9266 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 9267 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 9268 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 9269 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 926A 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 926B 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 926C C9                               ret
  18+ 926D
  19+ 926D AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 926E 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 926F 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 9270 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 9271 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 9272 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 9273 C9                               ret
  26+ 9274
  27+ 9274 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 9275 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 9276 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 9277 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 9278 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 9279 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 927A C9                               ret
  34+ 927B
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1121  927B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 927B              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 927B              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 927B
   4+ 927B              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 927B 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 927F 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 9282
   8+ 9282                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 9282              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 9282              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 9282
  12+ 9282              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 9282              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 9282 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 9284 DA 99 92                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 9287                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 9287 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 9288                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 9288 B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 9289 DA 8E 92    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 928C                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 928C 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 928D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 928D B7          >                        or a
  21+ 928E              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 928E 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 928F CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 9291 DA 82 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 9294 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 9295 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 9298 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 9299 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 929A                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 929A 37          >                        scf
  29+ 929B CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 929D DA 82 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 92A0 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 92A1 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 92A4 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 92A5 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 92A7 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 92AA 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 92AB                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 92AB 37          >                        scf
  38+ 92AC C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 92AD
  40+ 92AD
  41+ 92AD 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 92AE
  43+ 92AE 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 92AF 32 7D 92                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 92B2 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 92B3 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 92B5 32 7C 92                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 92B8 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 92B9 E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 92BB 32 7B 92                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 92BE C3 C4 92                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 92C1              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 92C1              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 92C1 32 A2 7D     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 92C4                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 92C4                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 92C4                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 92C4                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 92C4                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 92C4                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 92C4              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 92C4 3A A0 7D     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 92C7 F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 92C9 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 92CC              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 92CC 3A A2 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 92CF 21 A1 7E                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 92D2 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 92D3 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 92D5 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 92D8              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 92D8 3A 9F 7E     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 92DB 21 A0 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 92DE B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 92DF C2 E7 92                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 92E2 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 92E4 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 92E7              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 92E7 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 92E9 3A A2 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 92EC E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 92EE              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 92EE              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 92EE                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 92EE              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 92EE FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 92F0 D2 01 93                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 92F3 21 A0 7D                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 92F6 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 92F8 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 92F9 CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 92FB CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 92FD 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 92FE C3 EE 92                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 9301              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 9301 32 A2 7D     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 9304 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 9307 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 9309                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 9309              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 9309              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 9309              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 9309              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 9309 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 930A 21 9F 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 930D CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 930F 21 A0 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 9312 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 9314 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 9316 F2 09 93                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 9319              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 9319              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 9319 32 9F 7E     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 931C 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 931D 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 931E 32 AD 92                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 9321              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 9321 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 9323 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 9326 3A A2 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 9329 CD 82 92                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 932C              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 932C                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 932C AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 932D 32 B3 7E                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 9330 32 B4 7E                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 9333 32 B5 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 9336 3A AD 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 9339 B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 933A CA 65 93                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 933D F2 70 93                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 9340              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 9340                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 9340 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 9341 3A AD 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 9344 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 9345 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 9346                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 9346 CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 9348 21 B3 7E                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 934B CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 934D 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 934E CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 9350 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 9351 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 9353 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 9354 C2 46 93                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 9357 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 935A 3A B5 7E                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 935D 21 BB 7E                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 9360 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 9361 32 B5 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 9364 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 9365              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 9365 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 9366 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 9369 3A BB 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 936C 32 B5 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 936F C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 9370              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 9370              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 9370              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 9370              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 9370                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 9370 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 9371 3A AD 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 9374 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 9375 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 9376 CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 9378 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 9379 C2 76 93                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 937C 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 937F 3A BB 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 9382 32 B5 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 9385 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 9386              ;
 176+ 9386              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 9386              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 9386              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 9386              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 9386              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 9386              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 9386              ;           else
 183+ 9386
 184+ 9386              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 9386              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 9386              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 9386              ;
 188+ 9386              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 9386              ;
 190+ 9386              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 9386              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 9386
 193+ 9386 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 9387 3A 9F 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 938A 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 938B 3A A0 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 938E 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 938F                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 938F 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 9390 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 9391 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 9393 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 9394 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 9395 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 9397 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 9398 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 9399 E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 939B 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 939C 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 939E 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 93A0                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 93A0 CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 93A2 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 93A4 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 93A6 CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 93A8 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 93AA                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 93AA B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 93AB DA B1 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 93AE                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 93AE B7          >                        or a
 217+ 93AF 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 93B0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 93B0 B7          >                        or a
 219+ 93B1 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 93B2 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 93B4 CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 93B6 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 93B7 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 93B9 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 93BA B5                                   or      l
 226+ 93BB 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 93BC C9                                   ret
 228+ 93BD              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 93BD AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 93BE 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 93BF C9                                   ret
 231+ 93C0 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 93C2 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 93C3 C9                                   ret
 234+ 93C4
 235+ 93C4 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 93C5 3A 9F 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 93C8 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 93CA 3A A0 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 93CD 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 93CE                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 93CE 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 93CF B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 93D0 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 93D2 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 93D3 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 93D4 E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 93D6 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 93D7 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 93D9 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 93DB                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 93DB CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 93DD CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 93DF CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 93E1 CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 93E3 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 93E5                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 93E5 B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 93E6 DA EC 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 93E9                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 93E9 B7          >                        or a
 256+ 93EA 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 93EB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 93EB B7          >                        or a
 258+ 93EC 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 93ED CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 93EF CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 93F1 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 93F2 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 93F4 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 93F5 B5                                   or      l
 265+ 93F6 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 93F7 C9                                   ret
 267+ 93F8              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 93F8 AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 93F9 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 93FA C9                                   ret
 270+ 93FB
 271+ 93FB 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 93FC 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 93FD 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 93FF 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 9401 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 9403 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 9404 B3                                   or      e
 278+ 9405 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 9407 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 9408 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 9409 CD 5B 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 940C                                      ZeroA
 282+ 940C AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 940D EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 940E 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 9410 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 9411 C9                                   ret
 287+ 9412 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 9413 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 9414 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 9415 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 9416 C9                                   ret
 292+ 9417 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 9419 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 941A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 941B                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 941B 37          >                        scf
 296+ 941C C9                                   ret
 297+ 941D
 298+ 941D              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 941D                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 941D ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 941D ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 941D ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 941D ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 941D ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 941D ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 941D ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 941D ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 941D ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 941D ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 941D ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 941D ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 941D ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 941D ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 941D ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 941D ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 941D ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 941D ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 941D ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 941D ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 941D ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 941D ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 941D ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 941D ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 941D ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 941D ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 941D ~                                    ret
 327+ 941D ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 941D ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 941D ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 941D ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 941D ~                                    ret
 332+ 941D ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 941D ~                                    ret
 334+ 941D                          ENDIF
 335+ 941D
 336+ 941D BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 941E 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 9420 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 9422 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 9424 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 9426 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 9428                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 9428 BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 9429 DA 2E 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 942C 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 942D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 942D B7          >                        or a
 345+ 942E              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 942E 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 942F CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 9431 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 9433 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 9434 C9                                   ret
 350+ 9435 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 9436                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 9436 37          >                        scf
 352+ 9437 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 9439 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 943B 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 943C C9                                   ret
 356+ 943D 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 943F C9                                   ret
 358+ 9440 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 9442 C9                                   ret
 360+ 9443
 361+ 9443              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 9443              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 9443              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 9443              ;
 365+ 9443              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 9443              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 9443              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 9443              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 9443              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 9443              ;;;    rla
 371+ 9443              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 9443              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 9443              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 9443              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 9443              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 9443              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 9443              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 9443              ;;;    rla
 379+ 9443              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 9443              ;;;    ret
 381+ 9443
 382+ 9443              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 9443              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 9443              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 9443              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 9443              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 9443              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 9443              ;140 bytes
 389+ 9443              ;145cc
 390+ 9443
 391+ 9443              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 9443 ~                                rla
 393+ 9443 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 9443 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 9443 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 9443 ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 9443                                  ENDM
 398+ 9443
 399+ 9443 AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 400+ 9444 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 401+ 9446 7A                               ld a,d

 424+ 94CC 2F                               cpl
 425+ 94CD 5F                               ld e,a
 426+ 94CE C9                               ret
 427+ 94CF              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 94CF              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 94CF              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 94CF              ; Our use
 431+ 94CF              ; BC = A0
 432+ 94CF              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 94CF              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 94CF              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 94CF B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 94D0 D2 FB 94    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 94D3 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 94D4 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 94D5 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 94D7 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 94D9 C3 E6 94                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 94DC 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 94DD 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 94DF 21 9F 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 94E2 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 94E3 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 94E5 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 94E6              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 94E6 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 94E9 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 94EA 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 94EC CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 94EE 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 94EF ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 94F1 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 94F3 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 94F5 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 94F6 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 94F7 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 94F9 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 94FA C9                                   ret
 460+ 94FB 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 94FE C9                                   ret
 462+ 94FF              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 94FF              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 94FF 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 9501 AF                                   xor a
 466+ 9502 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 9504 17                                   rla
 468+ 9505 BA                                   cp d
 469+ 9506 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 9508
 470+ 9508 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 9509 92                                   sub d
 472+ 950A 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 950C C9                                   ret
 474+ 950D              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 950D 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 950F AF                                   xor a
 477+ 9510 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 9512 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 9514              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 9514 17                                   rla
 481+ 9515 B9                                   cp c
 482+ 9516 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 9518 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 9519 91                                   sub c
 485+ 951A 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 951C C9                                   ret
 487+ 951D              ;
 488+ 951D              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 951D              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 951D              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 951D              ;
 492+ 951D              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 951D ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 951D ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 951D ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 951D ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 951D ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 951D ~            1:
 499+ 951D ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 951D                                      ENDM
 501+ 951D
 502+ 951D              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 503+ 951D ~                                    rl  e
 504+ 951D ~                                    rla
 505+ 951D ~                                    sub c
 506+ 951D ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 507+ 951D ~                                    add a,c
 508+ 951D ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 509+ 951D                                      ENDM

 529+ 955B              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 955B ~                                    rla
 531+ 955B ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 955B ~                                    add	    hl,de

 537+ 955B
 538+ 955B
 539+ 955B              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 955B              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 955B              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 955B              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 955B              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 955B              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 955B              ;144 bytes
 546+ 955B AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 955C 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 955D 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 955E 93                                   sub e
 550+ 955F 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 9560 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 9561 92                                   sub d
 553+ 9562 57                                   ld d,a
 554+ 9563 78                                   ld a,b
 555+ 9564                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 555+ 9564 17          >                        rla
 555+ 9565 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 555+ 9567 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 555+ 9568 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 555+ 956A ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 555+ 956C             >1:
 556+ 956C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 556+ 956F 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 556+ 9570 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 556+ 9572 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 556+ 9574             >1:

 577+ 95EA              ; BC = BC / DE
 578+ 95EA              ; HL = BC % DE
 579+ 95EA              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 580+ 95EA 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 581+ 95EB B3                                   or      e
 582+ 95EC 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 583+ 95EE D5                                   push    de
 584+ 95EF CD 5B 95     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 585+ 95F2 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 586+ 95F3 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 587+ 95F5 C2 05 96                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 588+ 95F8 7A                                   ld      a,d
 589+ 95F9 B3                                   or      e
 590+ 95FA CA 05 96                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 591+ 95FD CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 592+ 95FF C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 593+ 9600 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 594+ 9601                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 594+ 9601 B7          >                        or a
 595+ 9602 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 596+ 9604 C9                                   ret
 597+ 9605 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 598+ 9607 C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 599+ 9608 7C                                   ld      a,h
 600+ 9609 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 601+ 960A C8                                   ret     z
 602+ 960B 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 603+ 960C                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 603+ 960C B7          >                        or a
 604+ 960D ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 605+ 960F C9                                   ret
 606+ 9610
 607+ 9610
 608+ 9610 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 609+ 9613 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 610+ 9616 C9                                   ret

 612+ 9617
 613+ 9617              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 614+ 9617 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 615+ 9617 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 616+ 9617 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 617+ 9617 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 618+ 9617 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 619+ 9617 ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 620+ 9617 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 621+ 9617 ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 622+ 9617 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 623+ 9617 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 624+ 9617 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 625+ 9617 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 626+ 9617 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 627+ 9617 ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 628+ 9617 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 629+ 9617 ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 630+ 9617                                      ENDM

 648+ 9740 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 649+ 9743              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 649+ 9743 CB 25       >			   sla l
 649+ 9745 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 650+ 9747 7C                                   ld      a,h
 651+ 9748 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 652+ 974A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 652+ 974A B9          >                        cp      c
 652+ 974B DA 56 97    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 653+ 974E 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 654+ 974F 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 655+ 9750 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 656+ 9751 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 657+ 9752 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 658+ 9754 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 659+ 9755 3F                                   ccf
 660+ 9756              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 660+ 9756 CB 13       >               rl  e
 660+ 9758 CB 12       >               rl  d
 661+ 975A 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 662+ 975C EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 663+ 975D C9                                   ret

 666+ 975E AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 667+ 975F 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 668+ 9761 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 669+ 9762 17                                   rla
 670+ 9763 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 671+ 9765 B9                                   cp	c
 672+ 9766 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 673+ 9768 91                                   sub	c
 674+ 9769 2C                                   inc	l
 675+ 976A 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 676+ 976C C9                                   ret
 677+ 976D              ;l_div, signed division
 678+ 976D              ; comes in with DE and HL
 679+ 976D              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 680+ 976D 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 681+ 976E 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 682+ 976F C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 683+ 9770 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 684+ 9771 7A                                   ld      a,d
 685+ 9772 B7                                   or      a
 686+ 9773 F2 7C 97                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 687+ 9776              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 687+ 9776 AF          >					xor 	a
 687+ 9777 93          >                    sub 	e
 687+ 9778 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 687+ 9779 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 687+ 977A 92          >                    sub 	d
 687+ 977B 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 688+ 977C 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 689+ 977D B7                                   or      a
 690+ 977E F2 87 97                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 691+ 9781                                      macronegate16bc
 691+ 9781 AF          >					xor 	a
 691+ 9782 91          >                    sub 	c
 691+ 9783 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 691+ 9784 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 691+ 9785 90          >                    sub 	b
 691+ 9786 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 692+ 9787 CD 17 96     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 693+ 978A                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 694+ 978A C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 695+ 978B 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ 978C A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 697+ 978D F2 96 97                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 698+ 9790                                      macronegate16hl
 698+ 9790 AF          >					xor 	a
 698+ 9791 95          >					sub 	l
 698+ 9792 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 698+ 9793 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 698+ 9794 94          >					sub 	h
 698+ 9795 67          >					ld 		h,a
 699+ 9796 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 700+ 9797 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 701+ 9798 F0                                   ret     p
 702+ 9799                                      macronegate16de
 702+ 9799 AF          >					xor 	a
 702+ 979A 93          >                    sub 	e

 702+ 979C 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 702+ 979D 92          >                    sub 	d
 702+ 979E 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 703+ 979F C9                                   ret

   1+ 97A0              asm_tis2:
   2+ 97A0              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 97A0              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 97A0 F5           	push af
   5+ 97A1 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 97A3 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 97A4 3A 9F 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 97A7 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 97A8 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 97A9 BB           	cp e
  11+ 97AA 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 97AC 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 97AE ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 97B0 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 97B1 3A 9F 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 97B4 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 97B5 CD 0D 95     	call asm_div16
  18+ 97B8 F1           	pop af
  19+ 97B9 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 97BB B5           	or l
  21+ 97BC C9           	ret
  22+ 97BD              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 97BD F1           	pop af
  24+ 97BE E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 97C0 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 97C2 C9           	ret

  30+ 97C3              squareregfx:

  32+ 97C6 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 97C7 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 97C8 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 97CA EB           	ex de,hl

  39+ 97CF 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 97D0 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 97D2 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 97D3              squareregfz:

  45+ 97D7 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 97D8 ED 30        	mul

  48+ 97DB EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 97DC              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 97DC CD 84 91     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 97DF E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 97E0 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 97E1 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 97E2              normfx:
  55+ 97E2 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 97E5 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 97E6 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 97E7 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 97E8 CD A0 97     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 97EB 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 97EE              normfy:
  62+ 97EE 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 97F1 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 97F2 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 97F3 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 97F4 CD A0 97     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 97F7 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 97FA              normfz:
  69+ 97FA 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 97FD E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 97FE 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 97FF 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9800 CD A0 97     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9803 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9806              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9806 C9           	ret
  77+ 9807
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1123  9807                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9807              ; Input:
   2+ 9807              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9807              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9807              ; Output:
   5+ 9807              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9807              ;
   7+ 9807              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9807              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9807              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9807              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9807              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9807              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9807              ;
  14+ 9807
  15+ 9807
  16+ 9807 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 9808 A7                               and     a
  18+ 9809 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 980B ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 980D E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 980E C9                               ret
  22+ 980F
  23+ 980F E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9810 A7                               and     a
  25+ 9811 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9813 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9815 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9816 C9                               ret
  29+ 9817
  30+ 9817
  31+ 9817              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9817              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9817 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 9818 AA                               xor d
  35+ 9819 FA 23 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 981C ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 981E 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9820 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9821                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9821 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9822 C9                               ret
  41+ 9823 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9825 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9827              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9827 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 9828 C9                               ret
  45+ 9829 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 982A                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 982A B7          >                        or a
  47+ 982B C9                               ret
  48+ 982C              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 982C 37          >                        scf
  49+ 982D C9                               ret
  50+ 982E
  51+ 982E              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 982E 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 982F BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9830 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9831 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9832 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9833 C9                               ret
  58+ 9834
  59+ 9834
  60+ 9834
  61+ 9834 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9835 A8                               xor b
  63+ 9836 FA 3F 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9839 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 983B 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 983D              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 983D 37          >                        scf
  67+ 983E C9                               ret
  68+ 983F CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 9841 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 9843              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9843 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9844 C9                               ret
  72+ 9845
  73+ 9845              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 9845 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 9846 A7                               and     a
  76+ 9847 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9849 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 984A C9                               ret
  79+ 984B              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 984B E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 984C A7                               and     a
  82+ 984D ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 984F E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 9850 C9                               ret
  85+ 9851
  86+ 9851              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 9851              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 9851
  89+ 9851 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 9853 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 9854 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 9856 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 9857 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 9858 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 985A 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 985B A7                               and     a
  97+ 985C ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 985E D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 9860 C9                               ret
 100+ 9861
 101+ 9861
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1124  9861                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9861              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9861
   3+ 9861
   4+ 9861 DD 7E 00     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+0)	        ; XX15+0
   5+ 9864 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   6+ 9866              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   6+ 9866 5F          >			ld	e,a
   6+ 9867 57          >			ld  d,a
   6+ 9868 ED 30       >			mul
   7+ 986A 62 6B                                ld		hl,de		 		; h == varR d = varO e= varA
   8+ 986C DD 7E 01     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(ix+1)
   9+ 986F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; = abs
  10+ 9871                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  10+ 9871 5F          >			ld	e,a
  10+ 9872 57          >			ld  d,a
  10+ 9873 ED 30       >			mul
  11+ 9875 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  12+ 9876 DD 7E 02     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(ix+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  13+ 9879 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  14+ 987B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  14+ 987B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  14+ 987C 57          >			ld  d,a
  14+ 987D ED 30       >			mul
  15+ 987F 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  16+ 9880 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  17+ 9881 CD 84 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  18+ 9884 DD 7E 00     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+0)
  19+ 9887 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  20+ 9888 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  21+ 988A 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  22+ 988B CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  23+ 988E 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  24+ 988F 79                                   ld      a,c
  25+ 9890 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  26+ 9892 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  27+ 9893 DD 77 00                             ld		(ix+0),a
  28+ 9896 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  29+ 9899 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  30+ 989A E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  31+ 989C 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  32+ 989D CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  33+ 98A0 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  34+ 98A1 79                                   ld      a,c
  35+ 98A2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  36+ 98A4 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  37+ 98A5 DD 77 01                             ld		(ix+1),a
  38+ 98A8 DD 7E 02     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+2)
  39+ 98AB 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  40+ 98AC E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  41+ 98AE 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  42+ 98AF CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  43+ 98B2 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  44+ 98B3 79                                   ld      a,c
  45+ 98B4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  46+ 98B6 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  47+ 98B7 DD 77 02                             ld		(ix+2),a
  48+ 98BA C9                                   ret
  49+ 98BB
  50+ 98BB              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  51+ 98BB 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  52+ 98BE DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  53+ 98C0 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  54+ 98C2              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  54+ 98C2 5F          >			ld	e,a
  54+ 98C3 57          >			ld  d,a
  54+ 98C4 ED 30       >			mul
  55+ 98C6 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  56+ 98C7 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  57+ 98C8 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  58+ 98CB DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  59+ 98CD E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  60+ 98CF                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  60+ 98CF 5F          >			ld	e,a
  60+ 98D0 57          >			ld  d,a
  60+ 98D1 ED 30       >			mul
  61+ 98D3 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  62+ 98D4 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  63+ 98D7 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  64+ 98D9 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  65+ 98DB                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  65+ 98DB 5F          >			ld	e,a
  65+ 98DC 57          >			ld  d,a
  65+ 98DD ED 30       >			mul
  66+ 98DF 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  67+ 98E0 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  68+ 98E1 CD 84 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  69+ 98E4 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 98E7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  71+ 98E9 4F                                   ld		c,a
  72+ 98EA 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  73+ 98EB CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  74+ 98EE 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  75+ 98EF DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  76+ 98F1 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  77+ 98F3 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  78+ 98F4 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  79+ 98F7 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  80+ 98FA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  81+ 98FC 4F                                   ld		c,a
  82+ 98FD 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  83+ 98FE CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  84+ 9901 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  85+ 9902 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  86+ 9904 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  87+ 9906 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9907 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  89+ 990A 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  90+ 990D E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  91+ 990F 4F                                   ld		c,a
  92+ 9910 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  93+ 9911 CD 7E 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  94+ 9914 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  95+ 9915 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  96+ 9917 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  97+ 9919 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  98+ 991A 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  99+ 991D C9                                   ret
 100+ 991E
 101+ 991E              ; Normalise vector
 102+ 991E              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
 103+ 991E              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
 104+ 991E              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
 105+ 991E              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
 106+ 991E
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1125  991E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 991E              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 991E              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 991E              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 991E              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 991E              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 991E              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 991E              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 991E 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9921 CD 37 99     	call	Num1
  10+ 9924 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9927 CD 37 99     	call	Num1
  12+ 992A 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 992D CD 37 99     	call	Num1
  14+ 9930 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9932 CD 37 99     	call	Num1
  16+ 9935 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9937              Num1:
  18+ 9937 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9939              .Num2:
  20+ 9939 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 993A 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 993B 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 993D ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 993F 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9940 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9941 C9           	ret
  27+ 9942
  28+ 9942              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9942 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9944 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9945 C3 1E 99     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9948
  33+ 9948              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9948 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 994A 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 994B 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 994E CD 5E 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9951 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9953 CD 37 99     	call	Num1
  40+ 9956 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9958                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9958 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9959 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 995A 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 995C 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 995E              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 995E 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9960              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9960 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9961 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9962 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9964 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9966 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9968              .Blank:
  55+ 9968 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 996A              .DontBlank:
  57+ 996A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 996C 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 996D 13           	inc	de
  60+ 996E C9           	ret
  61+ 996F
  62+ 996F              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 996F FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9971 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 9973 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 9975 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 9976 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9979 CD 85 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 997C 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 997E CD 85 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9981 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 9983 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 9985              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 9985 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 9987              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 9987 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 9988 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9989 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 998B FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 998D 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 998F              .Blank:
  82+ 998F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9991              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9991 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 9993 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 9994 13           	inc	de
  87+ 9995 C9           	ret
  88+ 9996              .NoStock:
  89+ 9996 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 9998 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9999 13           	inc	de
  92+ 999A 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 999B 13           	inc	de
  94+ 999C 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 999E 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 999F 13           	inc de
  97+ 99A0 C9           	ret
  98+ 99A1
  99+ 99A1
 100+ 99A1              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 99A1              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 99A1              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 99A1              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 99A1 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0

 104+ 99A9 64 00 00 00
 104+ 99AD E8 03 00 00
 104+ 99B1 10 27 00 00

 105+ 99BD 80 96 98 00
 105+ 99C1 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 99C5 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 99C9 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 99CD
 108+ 99CD              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 99CD CD DC 99     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY

 111+ 99D3 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 99D6 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 99D8 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 99DB C9                                   ret

 135+ 9A0E 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9A0F 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9A11 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
