 141+ 9A1B 22 C9 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9A1E DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9A21 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9A24 2A CB 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9A27 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9A29 22 CB 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9A2C 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9A2F DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9A31 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9A32 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9A33 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9A35 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9A38 FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9A3A 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9A3C 3A C9 99                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9A3F C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9A41 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9A44 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9A48 C9                                   ret
 160+ 9A49
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1126  9A49                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9A49              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9A49 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9A4A D2 65 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9A4D 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9A4F CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9A51                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9A51 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9A52 DA 68 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9A55 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9A56 37                                   scf
   7+ 9A57 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9A59 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9A5B 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9A5C CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9A5E CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9A60 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9A61 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9A63 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9A64 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9A65 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9A67 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9A68 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9A69 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9A6B 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9A6D C3 5B 9A                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9A70
  23+ 9A70
  24+ 9A70              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9A70              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9A70              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9A70 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9A72 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9A74 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9A76 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9A78              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9A78              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9A78              TIS2:
  34+ 9A78 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9A79 3A 9F 7E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9A7C 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9A7D 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9A7E              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9A7E 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9A7F 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9A80 CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9A82 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9A84              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9A84 B7               or          a
  45+ 9A85 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9A87
  47+ 9A87 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9A88 E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9A8A CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9A8C 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9A8D 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9A8E E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9A90 B0               or          b
  54+ 9A91 C3 95 9A         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9A94              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9A94 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9A95              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9A95 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9A96 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9A98              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9A98 BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9A99 D2 B9 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9A9C 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9A9E              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9A9E CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9AA0              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9AA0 BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9AA1 DA BF 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9AA4 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9AA5 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9AA6 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9AA8 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9AAA              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9AAA 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9AAB CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9AAD CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9AAF 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9AB0 CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9AB2 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9AB3 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9AB4 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9AB5 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9AB7 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9AB8 C9           	ret
  81+ 9AB9              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9AB9              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9AB9 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9ABA E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9ABC F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9ABE C9           	ret
  87+ 9ABF              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9ABF              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9ABF B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9AC0 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9AC2 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9AC4 C3 AA 9A     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9AC7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1127  9AC7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"

   1+ 9AC7              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9AC7              fmltu:
   3+ 9AC7 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9AC8 3A 9F 7E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9ACB 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9ACC ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9ACE 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9ACF C9                                   ret
   9+ 9AD0
  10+ 9AD0 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9AD1 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9AD3 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9AD4 C9                                   ret

1128  9AD5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9AD5              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9AD5              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9AD5 21 4B 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9AD8 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9ADA ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9ADC 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9ADD C3 E9 9A     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9AE0              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9AE0 21 4B 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9AE3 3A 8A 7D     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9AE6 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9AE8 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9AE9              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9AE9 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9AEA 3A 99 7E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9AED              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9AED 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9AEF CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9AF1 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9AF2 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9AF3              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9AF3 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9AF5 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9AF7 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9AF8 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9AFA              DV8:
  27+ 9AFA 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9AFB 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9AFC              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9AFC CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9AFE 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9B00              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9B00              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9B00 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9B02 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9B03              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9B03 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9B05 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9B07 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9B08 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9B0A              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9B0A 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9B0B              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9B0B CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9B0D 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9B0F 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9B10 32 A0 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9B13 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9B14 32 A0 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9B17 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9B18              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9B18 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9B19 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9B1A CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9B1C 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9B1E 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9B1F 32 A0 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9B22 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9B23 32 A0 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9B26 C9           		ret
  61+ 9B27              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9B27 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9B29 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9B2A 32 A0 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9B2D 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9B2E 32 A0 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9B31 C9           		ret
  68+ 9B32
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1129  9B32              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm" Moved to general multiply code
1130  9B32
1131  9B32                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9B32              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9B32              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9B32              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9B32 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9B34 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9B36 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9B37 3A 9F 7E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9B3A 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9B3B FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9B3D 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9B3F AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9B40 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9B42 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9B43 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9B44 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9B46 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9B47 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9B48 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9B4A 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9B4B ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9B4D 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9B4E 32 A0 7D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9B51 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9B52 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9B53 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9B54 C9           	ret
  27+ 9B55              .mul0:
  28+ 9B55 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9B56 32 A0 7D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9B59 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9B5A 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9B5B C9           	ret
  33+ 9B5C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1132  9B5C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9B5C              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9B5C              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9B5C              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9B5C              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9B5C              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9B5C              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9B5C              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9B5C              LL38:
   9+ 9B5C              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9B5C              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9B5C              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9B5C              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9B5C              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9B5C              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9B5C              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9B5C              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9B5C              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9B5C              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9B5C              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9B5C              ;	ret
  21+ 9B5C              ; calculation table
  22+ 9B5C              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9B5C              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9B5C              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9B5C              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9B5C              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9B5C              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9B5C              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9B5C              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9B5C              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9B5C
  32+ 9B5C              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9B5C              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9B5C              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9B5C              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9B5C
  37+ 9B5C
  38+ 9B5C              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9B5C 21 A1 7E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9B5F AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9B60 FA 6B 9B     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9B63 3A 9F 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9B66 21 A0 7E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9B69 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9B6A C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9B6B              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9B6B 3A A0 7E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9B6E 21 9F 7E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9B71              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9B71              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9B71 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9B72 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9B73 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9B75              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9B75              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9B75              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9B75 C9           	ret
  57+ 9B76              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9B76 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9B78 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9B7A ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9B7C 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9B7D 3A A1 7E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9B80 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9B82 32 A1 7E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9B85 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9B86                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9B86 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9B87 C9           	ret
  68+ 9B88              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9B88 32 A1 7E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9B8B                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9B8B B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9B8C C9               ret
  72+ 9B8D              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9B8D              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9B8D              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9B8D              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9B8D              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9B8D              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9B8D              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9B8D              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9B8D              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9B8D              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9B8D              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9B8D              ;--	ret
  84+ 9B8D
  85+ 9B8D              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9B8D              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9B8D              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9B8D              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9B8D              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9B8D              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9B8D              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9B8D              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9B8D              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9B8D              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9B8D              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9B8D              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9B8D              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9B8D              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9B8D              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9B8D              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9B8D              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9B8D              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9B8D              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9B8D              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9B8D              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9B8D              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9B8D              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9B8D              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9B8D              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9B8D              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9B8D              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9B8D              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9B8D              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9B8D              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9B8D              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9B8D
 142+ 9B8D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

1135  9B8D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9B8D              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9B8D              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9B8D              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9B8D              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9B8D              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9B8D              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9B8D              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9B8D              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9B8D              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9B8D              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9B8D              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9B8D              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9B8D              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9B8D              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9B8D              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9B8D              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9B8D              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9B8D              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9B8D              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9B8D              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9B8D              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9B8D              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9B8D              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9B8D              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9B8D              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9B8D              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9B8D              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9B8D              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9B8D              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9B8D
  40+ 9B8D              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9B8D 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9B8E 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9B8F 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9B91              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9B91 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9B92 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9B93 C8             ret z
  48+ 9B94 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9B97 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9B99              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9B99 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9B9B 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9B9C 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9B9E C9             ret
  55+ 9B9F
  56+ 9B9F              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9B9F              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9B9F              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9B9F              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9B9F 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9BA1 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9BA2              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9BA2 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9BA3 17                   rla
  65+ 9BA4 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9BA5 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9BA7 91                   sub c
  68+ 9BA8 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9BA9              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9BA9 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9BAB 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9BAC 32 A0 7E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9BAF C9                   ret
  74+ 9BB0
  75+ 9BB0
  76+ 9BB0
  77+ 9BB0              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9BB0              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9BB0              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9BB0 F5           		push	af
  81+ 9BB1 3A 9F 7E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9BB4 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9BB5 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9BB6 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9BB8 CA CF 9B     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9BBB              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9BBB 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9BBD 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9BBE              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9BBE 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9BC0 AF           		xor a
  92+ 9BC1              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9BC1 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9BC2 17           		rla
  95+ 9BC3 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9BC4 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9BC6 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9BC7 91           		sub c
  99+ 9BC8              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9BC8 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9BCA 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9BCB 32 A0 7E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9BCE C9           		ret
 104+ 9BCF              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9BCF 32 A0 7E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9BD2 C9           		ret
 107+ 9BD3              ;	push	af
 108+ 9BD3              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9BD3              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9BD3              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9BD3              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9BD3              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9BD3              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9BD3              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9BD3              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9BD3              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9BD3              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9BD3              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9BD3              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9BD3              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9BD3              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9BD3              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9BD3              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9BD3              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9BD3              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9BD3              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9BD3              ;	scf
 128+ 9BD3              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9BD3              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9BD3              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9BD3              ;LL2:
 132+ 9BD3              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9BD3              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9BD3              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9BD3              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9BD3              ;	ret

1136  9BD3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9BD3              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9BD3              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9BD3              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9BD3 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9BD4 3A 9F 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9BD7 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9BD9 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9BDB 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9BDC 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9BDE AF               xor a
  11+ 9BDF              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9BDF CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9BE1 17               rla
  14+ 9BE2 BA               cp d
  15+ 9BE3 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9BE5 0C               inc c
  17+ 9BE6 92               sub d
  18+ 9BE7              LL64:
  19+ 9BE7 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9BE9 32 9E 7E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9BEC 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9BED 32 A0 7E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9BF0 C9               ret
  24+ 9BF1              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9BF1 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9BF3 32 A0 7E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9BF6 32 9E 7E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9BF9 C9           	ret
  29+ 9BFA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   2+ 9BFA              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9BFA              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9BFA CD 32 9B     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9BFD 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9BFE 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9BFF 32 A1 7E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9C02 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9C03 32 A0 7E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9C06 08           	ex 	af,af'

  32+ 9C98              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9C98
  34+ 9C98              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9C98              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9C98              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9C98
  38+ 9C98
  39+ 9C98 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9C9B 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9C9E E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9CA0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9CA2 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9CA3 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9CA4 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9CA6 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9CA8 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9CA9 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9CAB DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9CAD 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9CAE 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9CAF ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9CB1 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9CB2 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9CB3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9CB5 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9CB7 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9CB8 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9CB9 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9CBB 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9CBC 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9CBD EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9CBE CD 84 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9CC1 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9CC2 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9CC4 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9CC6 CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9CC9 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9CCA 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9CCD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9CCF B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9CD0 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9CD3 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9CD5 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9CD6 CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9CD9 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9CDA 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9CDD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9CDF B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9CE0 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9CE3 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9CE5 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9CE6 CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9CE9 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9CEA 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9CED E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9CEF B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9CF0 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9CF3 C9                                   ret
  90+ 9CF4
  91+ 9CF4              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9CF4                                      ENDM
  96+ 9CF4              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9CF4 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9CF4                                      ENDM
 101+ 9CF4
 102+ 9CF4
 103+ 9CF4              TidyUbnK:               ;break
 104+ 9CF4                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 104+ 9CF4 CD 08 9C    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 104+ 9CF7 CD 98 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ 9CFA CD 41 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 105+ 9CFD 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 106+ 9D00 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ 9D02 C2 9A 9D                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ 9D05 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ 9D08 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ 9D0A 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9D0C              ;...roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 112+ 9D0C 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ 9D0F 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 114+ 9D12 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 115+ 9D15 CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 116+ 9D18 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 117+ 9D1B 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 118+ 9D1E 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 119+ 9D21 CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 120+ 9D24 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ 9D25 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ 9D27 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ 9D28 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ 9D2B 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ 9D2E 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ 9D2F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ 9D31 B3                                   or      e
 128+ 9D32 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ 9D34 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ 9D36                                      ZeroA
 130+ 9D36 AF          >                        xor a
 131+ 9D37 C3 94 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ 9D3A FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 133+ 9D3C 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 134+ 9D3E 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 135+ 9D40 B2                                   or      d
 136+ 9D41 C3 94 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 137+ 9D44 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 138+ 9D45 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 139+ 9D48 7A                                   ld      a,d
 140+ 9D49 CD 86 93                             call    DVIDT
 141+ 9D4C 78                                   ld      a,b
 142+ 9D4D 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ 9D50 C3 DE 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof
 144+ 9D53              ;...roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 145+ 9D53 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 146+ 9D56 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 147+ 9D59 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 148+ 9D5C CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 149+ 9D5F 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 150+ 9D62 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 151+ 9D65 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 152+ 9D68 CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 153+ 9D6B 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 154+ 9D6C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 155+ 9D6E 57                                   ld      d,a
 156+ 9D6F 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 157+ 9D72 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 158+ 9D75 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 159+ 9D76 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 160+ 9D78 B3                                   or      e
 161+ 9D79 FE 00                                cp      0
 162+ 9D7B 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 163+ 9D7D                                      ZeroA
 163+ 9D7D AF          >                        xor a
 164+ 9D7E C3 94 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 165+ 9D81 FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 166+ 9D83 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 167+ 9D85 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 168+ 9D87 B2                                   or      d
 169+ 9D88 C3 94 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 170+ 9D8B 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 171+ 9D8C 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 172+ 9D8F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 173+ 9D90 CD 86 93                             call    DVIDT
 174+ 9D93 78                                   ld      a,b
 175+ 9D94 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 176+ 9D97 C3 DE 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ 9D9A              ;...roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 178+ 9D9A 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ 9D9D 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 180+ 9DA0 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 181+ 9DA3 CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 182+ 9DA6 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 183+ 9DA9 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 184+ 9DAC 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 185+ 9DAF CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 186+ 9DB2 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 187+ 9DB3 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 188+ 9DB5 57                                   ld      d,a
 189+ 9DB6 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ 9DB9 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 191+ 9DBC 7A           .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 192+ 9DBD E6 7F                                and     $7F
 193+ 9DBF B3                                   or      e
 194+ 9DC0 FE 00                                cp      0
 195+ 9DC2 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 196+ 9DC4                                      ZeroA
 196+ 9DC4 AF          >                        xor a
 197+ 9DC5 C3 94 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 198+ 9DC8 FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 199+ 9DCA 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 200+ 9DCC 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 201+ 9DCE B2                                   or      d
 202+ 9DCF C3 DB 9D                             jp      .SetRoofX
 203+ 9DD2 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 204+ 9DD3 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 205+ 9DD6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 206+ 9DD7 CD 86 93                             call    DVIDT
 207+ 9DDA 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ 9DDB 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 209+ 9DDE              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 209+ 9DDE CD 1B 9C    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 209+ 9DE1 CD 98 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 209+ 9DE4 CD 5E 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9DE7              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9DE7 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9DEA EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9DEC 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9DEF 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ 9DF2 CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 216+ 9DF5 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 217+ 9DF8 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 218+ 9DFB 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ 9DFE CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9E01 CD CE 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9E04 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9E05 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9E08              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9E08 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ 9E0B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ 9E0D 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9E10 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9E13 CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ 9E16 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ 9E19 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 231+ 9E1C 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 232+ 9E1F CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 233+ 9E22 CD CE 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ 9E25 78                                   ld      a,b
 235+ 9E26 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 236+ 9E29              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 237+ 9E29 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 238+ 9E2C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ 9E2E 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 240+ 9E31 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 241+ 9E34 CD FA 9B                             call	RSequQmulA
 242+ 9E37 3A 36 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 243+ 9E3A 32 9F 7E                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 244+ 9E3D 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ 9E40 CD F9 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ 9E43 CD CE 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ 9E46 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ 9E47 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ 9E4A                                      ZeroA
 249+ 9E4A AF          >                        xor a
 250+ 9E4B 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 251+ 9E4E 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 252+ 9E51 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 253+ 9E54 C9                                   ret
 254+ 9E55
 255+ 9E55
 256+ 9E55              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9E55              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9E55              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9E55 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9E56 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9E57 32 9F 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9E5A 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9E5B EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9E5D CD D7 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9E60              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9E60              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9E60              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9E60 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9E61 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9E63 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9E64 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9E65 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9E67 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9E69              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9E69 CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9E6B              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9E6B FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9E6D DA 7A 9E    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9E70 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9E72 37           		scf
 279+ 9E73 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9E75 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9E77              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9E77 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9E78 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9E79 C9           		ret
 285+ 9E7A              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9E7A B7           	or			a
 287+ 9E7B CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9E7D 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9E7F C3 77 9E     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9E82
 291+ 9E82              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9E82              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 293+ 9E82

 305+ 9E8C 47           		ld		b,a
 306+ 9E8D 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 307+ 9E90 E6 60        		and		%01100000
 308+ 9E92 CA 82 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 309+ 9E95 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 310+ 9E98 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 311+ 9E99 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 312+ 9E9C CD 71 9F     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
 313+ 9E9F 32 32 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi

 320+ 9EA5              ORTHOGALISE:
 321+ 9EA5              ;-- NormaliseNosev
 322+ 9EA5 CD 08 9C     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15

 324+ 9EAB CD 41 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 325+ 9EAE              .CheckNXSmall:

 328+ 9EB3 CA 8B 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 329+ 9EB6              .RotXIsBig:
 330+ 9EB6 CD 37 9F             call	CalcRoofvX
 331+ 9EB9 32 30 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 332+ 9EBC              NormaliseRoofV:
 333+ 9EBC CD 1B 9C     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 334+ 9EBF CD BB 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 335+ 9EC2              ;calc sidev x
 336+ 9EC2 CD 5E 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 337+ 9EC5 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 338+ 9EC8 32 9F 7E     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 339+ 9ECB 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 340+ 9ECE CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 341+ 9ED1 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 342+ 9ED4 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 343+ 9ED5 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 344+ 9ED8 CD 55 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 345+ 9EDB                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ 9EDB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 345+ 9EDC CA E1 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 346+ 9EDF EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 347+ 9EE1              NormSideXNoNeg:
 348+ 9EE1 32 2A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 349+ 9EE4              ;calc sidev y
 350+ 9EE4 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 351+ 9EE7 32 9F 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 352+ 9EEA 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 353+ 9EED CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 354+ 9EF0 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 355+ 9EF3 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 356+ 9EF4 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 357+ 9EF7 CD 55 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 358+ 9EFA                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 358+ 9EFA A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 358+ 9EFB CA 00 9F    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 359+ 9EFE EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 360+ 9F00              NormSideYNoNeg:
 361+ 9F00 32 38 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 362+ 9F03              ;calc sidev z
 363+ 9F03 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 364+ 9F06 32 9F 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 365+ 9F09 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 366+ 9F0C CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 367+ 9F0F 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 368+ 9F12 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 369+ 9F13 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 370+ 9F16 CD 55 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 371+ 9F19                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ 9F19 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 371+ 9F1A CA 1F 9F    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 372+ 9F1D EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 373+ 9F1F              NormSideZNoNeg:
 374+ 9F1F 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 375+ 9F22              .ClearLoBytes:
 376+ 9F22 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 377+ 9F25 06 09        		ld		b,9
 378+ 9F27 AF                   xor     a
 379+ 9F28              .ClearLoLoop:
 380+ 9F28 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 381+ 9F29 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9F2A 23           		inc		hl
 383+ 9F2B 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 384+ 9F2D CD 2E 9C     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ 9F30 CD BB 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 386+ 9F33              ;calc sidev x
 387+ 9F33 CD 7B 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 388+ 9F36
 389+ 9F36 C9           		ret
 390+ 9F37
 391+ 9F37
 392+ 9F37              CalcRoofvX:
 393+ 9F37              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 394+ 9F37              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 394+ 9F37 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 394+ 9F3A 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 395+ 9F3D 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 396+ 9F40 CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 397+ 9F43              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 397+ 9F43 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 397+ 9F46 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 398+ 9F49 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 399+ 9F4C CD D7 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 400+ 9F4F 7A           		ld		a,d
 401+ 9F50 E6 80        		and 	$80
 402+ 9F52 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 403+ 9F54              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 404+ 9F54 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 405+ 9F57 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 406+ 9F58 E6 80        		and		$80
 407+ 9F5A FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 408+ 9F5C FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 409+ 9F5E 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 410+ 9F5F E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 411+ 9F61 42           		ld		b,d
 412+ 9F62 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 413+ 9F63 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 414+ 9F64 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 415+ 9F66 CD 5B 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 416+ 9F69 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 417+ 9F6B EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 418+ 9F6D E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 419+ 9F6F B0           		or		b
 420+ 9F70 C9           		ret
 421+ 9F71
 422+ 9F71
 423+ 9F71              CalcRoofvY:
 424+ 9F71              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 425+ 9F71              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 425+ 9F71 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 425+ 9F74 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 426+ 9F77 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 427+ 9F7A CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 428+ 9F7D              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 428+ 9F7D 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 428+ 9F80 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 429+ 9F83 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 430+ 9F86 CD D7 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 431+ 9F89 7A           		ld		a,d
 432+ 9F8A E6 80        		and 	$80
 433+ 9F8C FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 434+ 9F8E 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 435+ 9F91 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 436+ 9F92 E6 80        		and		$80
 437+ 9F94 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 438+ 9F96 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 439+ 9F98 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 440+ 9F99 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 441+ 9F9B 42           		ld		b,d
 442+ 9F9C 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 443+ 9F9D 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 444+ 9F9E 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 445+ 9FA0 CD 5B 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 446+ 9FA3 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 447+ 9FA5 EE 80        		xor		$80
 448+ 9FA7 E6 80        		and		$80
 449+ 9FA9 B0           		or		b
 450+ 9FAA C9           		ret
 451+ 9FAB
 452+ 9FAB              CalcRoofvZ:
 453+ 9FAB              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 454+ 9FAB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 454+ 9FAB 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 454+ 9FAE 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 455+ 9FB1 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 456+ 9FB4 CD FA 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 457+ 9FB7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 457+ 9FB7 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 457+ 9FBA 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 458+ 9FBD 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 459+ 9FC0 CD D7 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 460+ 9FC3 7A           		ld		a,d
 461+ 9FC4 E6 80        		and 	$80
 462+ 9FC6 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 463+ 9FC8 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 464+ 9FCB 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 465+ 9FCC E6 80        		and		$80
 466+ 9FCE FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 467+ 9FD0 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 468+ 9FD2 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 469+ 9FD3 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 470+ 9FD5 42           		ld		b,d
 471+ 9FD6 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 472+ 9FD7 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 473+ 9FD8 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 474+ 9FDA CD 5B 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 475+ 9FDD FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 476+ 9FDF EE 80        		xor		$80
 477+ 9FE1 E6 80        		and		$80
 478+ 9FE3 B0           		or		b
 479+ 9FE4 C9           		ret
 480+ 9FE5
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1142  9FE5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ 9FE5
   2+ 9FE5              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ 9FE5 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ 9FE6 D2 04 A0    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ 9FE9 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ 9FEB CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ 9FED 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ 9FEF                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ 9FEF BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ 9FF0 DA F5 9F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ 9FF3 92                                   sub     d
   8+ 9FF4                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ 9FF4 B7          >                        or a
   9+ 9FF5 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ 9FF6 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ 9FF8 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ 9FFA 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ 9FFB C9                                   ret
  14+ 9FFC 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ 9FFD 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ 9FFE CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A000 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A002 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A003 C9                                   ret
  20+ A004 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A006 C9                                   ret
  22+ A007
  23+ A007              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
  24+ A007              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
  25+ A007              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
  26+ A007              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
  27+ A007              ;               a     a
  28+ A007              ;               b     x
  29+ A007              ;               c     q
  30+ A007              ;               d     r
  31+ A007              ;
  32+ A007 21 B6 F1     LL28Amul256DivD_6502:   ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  33+ A00A 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  34+ A00B B9                                   cp      c
  35+ A00C                                      FlipCarryFlag
  35+ A00C 3F          >                        ccf
  36+ A00D DA 35 A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  37+ A010 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  38+ A012 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  39+ A014 DA 29 A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  40+ A017                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  40+ A017 3F          >                        ccf
  41+ A018                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  41+ A018 B9          >                        cp      c
  41+ A019 DA 1E A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  42+ A01C                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  43+ A01C 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  44+ A01D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  44+ A01D B7          >                        or a
  45+ A01E              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  45+ A01E 3F          >                        ccf
  46+ A01F CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  47+ A021 DA 12 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  48+ A024 78                                   ld      a,b
  49+ A025 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  50+ A028 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  51+ A029 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  52+ A02A                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  52+ A02A 37          >                        scf
  53+ A02B CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  54+ A02D DA 12 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  55+ A030 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  56+ A031 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  57+ A034 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  58+ A035 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  59+ A037 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  60+ A03A                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  60+ A03A 37          >                        scf
  61+ A03B C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  62+ A03C
  63+ A03C
  64+ A03C 21 9F 7E     LL28Amul256DivQ_6502:   ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  65+ A03F 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  66+ A040 B9                                   cp      c
  67+ A041                                      FlipCarryFlag
  67+ A041 3F          >                        ccf
  68+ A042 DA 6A A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  69+ A045 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  70+ A047 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  71+ A049 DA 5E A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  72+ A04C                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  72+ A04C 3F          >                        ccf
  73+ A04D                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  73+ A04D B9          >                        cp      c
  73+ A04E DA 53 A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  74+ A051                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  75+ A051 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  76+ A052                                      ClearCarryFlag
  76+ A052 B7          >                        or a
  77+ A053              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  77+ A053 3F          >                        ccf
  78+ A054 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  79+ A056 DA 47 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  80+ A059 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ A05A 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  82+ A05D C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  83+ A05E 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  84+ A05F                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  84+ A05F 37          >                        scf
  85+ A060 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  86+ A062 DA 47 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  87+ A065 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  88+ A066 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  89+ A069 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  90+ A06A 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  91+ A06C 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  92+ A06F                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  92+ A06F 37          >                        scf
  93+ A070 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  94+ A071
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1143  A071                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A071              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A071              TIS1:
   3+ A071 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A072 3A 89 7D     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A075 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A076 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A077              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A077 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A078 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A079 32 9F 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A07C 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A07D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A07F CD D7 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A082              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A082              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A082              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A082 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A083 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A085 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A086 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A087 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A089 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A08B 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A08C              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A08C CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A08E FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A090 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A092 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A094              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A094 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A096 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A098 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A099 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A09A C9           		ret
  35+ A09B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  31+ A0A9 D2 A0 D2 A0
