  34+ A0AF
  35+ A0AF
  36+ A0AF              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ A0AF              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  38+ A0AF              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS
  39+ A0AF 21 77 68                            ld      hl,TidyCounter
  40+ A0B2 35                                  dec     (hl)
  41+ A0B3                                     DISPLAY "TODO: SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  42+ A0B3 CC F4 9C                            call     z,TidyUbnK  ;TODO SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  43+ A0B6                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  44+ A0B6 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  45+ A0B8 32 77 68                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  46+ A0BB                                     ;call    TidyUbnK
  47+ A0BB                                     ; add AI in here too
  48+ A0BB 3A 0D C4                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  49+ A0BE                                                 DISPLAY "TODO: capture duff jumps"
  50+ A0BE                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  50+ A0BE FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  50+ A0C0 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  51+ A0C1 21 9B A0                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  52+ A0C4 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  53+ A0C6 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  54+ A0C8 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  55+ A0C9 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  56+ A0CA 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  57+ A0CB 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  58+ A0CC E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  59+ A0CD C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this
  60+ A0CE
  61+ A0CE
  62+ A0CE
  63+ A0CE              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
  64+ A0CE
  65+ A0CE
  66+ A0CE C9           StationAI:              ret
  67+ A0CF C9           JunkAI:                 ret
  68+ A0D0 C9           ScoopableAI:            ret
  69+ A0D1 C9           ThargoidAI:             ret
  70+ A0D2 C9           NoAI:                   ret
  71+ A0D3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ A0D3              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  73+ A0D3 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  74+ A0D3                                      ENDIF
  75+ A0D3 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  76+ A0D6 47                                   ld      b,a
  77+ A0D7 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  78+ A0D9 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  79+ A0DB 78                                   ld      a,b
  80+ A0DC E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  81+ A0DE 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  82+ A0E1 B6                                   or      (hl)
  83+ A0E2 47                                   ld      b,a
  84+ A0E3 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  85+ A0E6 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  86+ A0E8 B0                                   or      b
  87+ A0E9 47                                   ld      b,a
  88+ A0EA 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  89+ A0ED                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  89+ A0ED FE 40       >                        cp      64
  89+ A0EF DA F6 A0    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  90+ A0F2 78                                   ld      a,b
  91+ A0F3 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  92+ A0F5 47                                   ld      b,a
  93+ A0F6 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  94+ A0F7 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  95+ A0FA C9                                   ret
  96+ A0FB 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  97+ A0FD 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  98+ A100 C9                                   ret
  99+ A101              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 100+ A101              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 101+ A101 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 102+ A104                                      ;break
 103+ A104                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 103+ A104 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 103+ A107 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 103+ A109 CA 28 A1    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 104+ A10C E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 105+ A10E C4 62 A1                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 106+ A111 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 107+ A114                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 107+ A114 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 107+ A116 C8          >                        ret		z
 108+ A117 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 109+ A118                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 109+ A118 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 109+ A11A 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 110+ A11D CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 111+ A11F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 112+ A122 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 113+ A125                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 113+ A125 E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 113+ A127 C8          >                        ret     z
 114+ A128 CD 1A C6     .SetNewbHostile:        call    SetShipHostile
 115+ A12B C9                                   ret
 116+ A12C
 117+ A12C                          DISPLAY "TODO: Missile Did Hit Us"
 118+ A12C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 119+ A12C C9           MissileDidHitUs:        ret ; TODO
 120+ A12D
 121+ A12D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ A12D              PlayerHitByMissile:     MMUSelectLayer1
 122+ A12D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 123+ A131 3E 05                                ld      a,L1ColourInkCyan
 124+ A133 CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 125+ A136 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileBlastDamage)
 126+ A139 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; b = damage
 127+ A13A 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 128+ A13D E6 80                                and     $80
 129+ A13F 20 0A                                jr      nz,.HitRear
 130+ A141 3A 20 81     .HitFront:              ld      a,(ForeShield)
 131+ A144 CD 38 64                             call    ApplyDamage
 132+ A147 32 20 81                             ld      (ForeShield),a
 133+ A14A C9                                   ret
 134+ A14B 3A 21 81     .HitRear:               ld      a,(AftShield)
 135+ A14E CD 38 64                             call    ApplyDamage
 136+ A151 32 21 81                             ld      (AftShield),a
 137+ A154                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: Set up blast radius"
 138+ A154 C9                                   ret; TODO , do hit set up blast radius etc
 139+ A155              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 140+ A155              MissileHitShipA:        MMUSelectLayer1
 140+ A155 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 141+ A159 3E 02                                ld      a,L1ColourInkRed
 142+ A15B CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 143+ A15E CD 45 C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip
 144+ A161                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  hit ship do explosion"
 145+ A161 C9                                   ret; TODO hit ship do explosion, check for near by and if player is near and missile type logic, e.g. AP or HE
 146+ A162              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 147+ A162 CD CB 83     SetStationHostile:      call    IsSpaceStationPresent                   ; only if present
 148+ A165 D8                                   ret     c
 149+ A166 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
 150+ A169 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 151+ A16B                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
 151+ A16B ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 152+ A16F CD 1A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 153+ A172 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
 154+ A174                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
 154+ A174 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 154+ A176 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 155+ A179 C9                                   ret
 156+ A17A
 157+ A17A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 158+ A17A              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
 158+ A17A AF          >                        xor a
 159+ A17B 32 71 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 160+ A17E 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
 161+ A181 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
 162+ A184 11 78 7F                             ld      de,MissileXPos
 163+ A187 ED B0                                ldir
 164+ A189                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
 164+ A189 AF          >                        xor a
 165+ A18A 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
 166+ A18D CD 4A A2                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
 167+ A190 DC 2C A1                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
 168+ A193 C9                                   ret
 169+ A194
 170+ A194              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 171+ A194              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 172+ A194 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 173+ A194 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 174+ A194 ~                                    xor     (hl)
 175+ A194 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 176+ A194 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 177+ A194 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 178+ A194 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 179+ A194 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 180+ A194 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 181+ A194 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 182+ A194 ~                                    NegHL
 183+ A194 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 184+ A194 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 185+ A194 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 186+ A194 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 187+ A194 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 188+ A194 ~                                    ld      a,l
 189+ A194 ~                                    and     a
 190+ A194 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 191+ A194                                      ENDM
 192+ A194              ;...................................................................
 193+ A194              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 194+ A194 3A 71 80     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 195+ A197                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A197 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A199 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 196+ A19A FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 197+ A19C 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 198+ A19D 32 71 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 199+ A1A0                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 199+ A1A0 21 73 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 199+ A1A3 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 199+ A1A5 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 199+ A1A6 3C          >                        inc     a
 199+ A1A7 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 199+ A1A8 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 200+ A1A9 CD CB 83                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 201+ A1AC D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
 202+ A1AD 3A 51 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
 203+ A1B0 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
 204+ A1B2                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 204+ A1B2 C0          >                        ret     nz
 205+ A1B3 3A 99 7F                             ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastRange)
 206+ A1B6 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type
 207+ A1B8 FD 7D        .CheckRange:            ld      a,iyl                               ; now page in universe data
 208+ A1BA                                      MMUSelectUniverseA
 208+ A1BA C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 208+ A1BC ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 209+ A1BF                                      CheckPointRange UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn, MissileXPos, MissileXSgn  ; its a square but its good enough
 209+ A1BF 3A 78 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileXPos)                      ; check X Coord
 209+ A1C2 2A 22 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxsgn)
 209+ A1C5 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 209+ A1C6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 209+ A1C8 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 209+ A1CB ED 5B 78 7F >                        ld      de,(MissileXPos)
 209+ A1CF 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 209+ A1D1 A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
 209+ A1D2 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 209+ A1D4             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 209+ A1D4 F2 E2 A1    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 209+ A1D7             >                        NegHL
 209+ A1D7 AF          >                    xor a
 209+ A1D8 95          >                    sub l
 209+ A1D9 6F          >                    ld l,a
 209+ A1DA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 209+ A1DB 94          >                    sub h
 209+ A1DC 67          >                    ld h,a
 209+ A1DD C3 E2 A1    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
 209+ A1E0 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 209+ A1E1             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 209+ A1E1 F8          >                        ret     m
 209+ A1E2 7C          >.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 209+ A1E3             >                        ReturnIfANotZero
 209+ A1E3 A7          >                        and     a
 209+ A1E4 C0          >                        ret     nz
 209+ A1E5 7D          >                        ld      a,l
 209+ A1E6 A7          >                        and     a
 209+ A1E7             >                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 209+ A1E7 21 99 7F    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 209+ A1EA BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 209+ A1EB D0          >                        ret	    nc
 210+ A1EC                                      CheckPointRange UBnKylo, UBnKysgn, MissileYPos, MissileYSgn
 210+ A1EC 3A 7B 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileYPos)                      ; check X Coord
 210+ A1EF 2A 25 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKysgn)
 210+ A1F2 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 210+ A1F3 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 210+ A1F5 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 210+ A1F8 ED 5B 7B 7F >                        ld      de,(MissileYPos)
 210+ A1FC 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 210+ A1FE A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
 210+ A1FF ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 210+ A201             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 210+ A201 F2 0F A2    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 210+ A204             >                        NegHL
 210+ A204 AF          >                    xor a
 210+ A205 95          >                    sub l
 210+ A206 6F          >                    ld l,a
 210+ A207 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 210+ A208 94          >                    sub h
 210+ A209 67          >                    ld h,a
 210+ A20A C3 0F A2    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
 210+ A20D 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 210+ A20E             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 210+ A20E F8          >                        ret     m
 210+ A20F 7C          >.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 210+ A210             >                        ReturnIfANotZero
 210+ A210 A7          >                        and     a
 210+ A211 C0          >                        ret     nz
 210+ A212 7D          >                        ld      a,l
 210+ A213 A7          >                        and     a
 210+ A214             >                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 210+ A214 21 99 7F    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 210+ A217 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 210+ A218 D0          >                        ret	    nc
 211+ A219                                      CheckPointRange UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn, MissileZPos, MissileZSgn
 211+ A219 3A 7E 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileZPos)                      ; check X Coord
 211+ A21C 2A 28 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzsgn)
 211+ A21F AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 211+ A220 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 211+ A222 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 211+ A225 ED 5B 7E 7F >                        ld      de,(MissileZPos)
 211+ A229 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 211+ A22B A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
 211+ A22C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 211+ A22E             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 211+ A22E F2 3C A2    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 211+ A231             >                        NegHL
 211+ A231 AF          >                    xor a
 211+ A232 95          >                    sub l
 211+ A233 6F          >                    ld l,a
 211+ A234 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 211+ A235 94          >                    sub h
 211+ A236 67          >                    ld h,a
 211+ A237 C3 3C A2    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
 211+ A23A 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 211+ A23B             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 211+ A23B F8          >                        ret     m
 211+ A23C 7C          >.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 211+ A23D             >                        ReturnIfANotZero
 211+ A23D A7          >                        and     a
 211+ A23E C0          >                        ret     nz
 211+ A23F 7D          >                        ld      a,l
 211+ A240 A7          >                        and     a
 211+ A241             >                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 211+ A241 21 99 7F    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 211+ A244 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 211+ A245 D0          >                        ret	    nc
 212+ A246 CD 34 C7                             call    ShipMissileBlast                    ; Ship hit by missile blast
 213+ A249 C9                                   ret                                         ; we are done

 216+ A24D 4F                                   ld      c,a

 218+ A251              ;...................................................................
 219+ A251 3A 3D C0     CheckIfMissileHitUs:    ld      a,(UBnKMissileDetonateRange)
 220+ A254 4F                                   ld      c,a

 222+ A255 2A 20 C0     MissileHitUsCheckPos:   ld      hl, (UBnKxlo)
 223+ A258 ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de, (UBnKylo)
 224+ A25C ED 4B 26 C0                          ld      bc, (UBnKzlo)
 225+ A260 7C                                   ld      a,h
 226+ A261 B2                                   or      d
 227+ A262 B0                                   or      b
 228+ A263                                      ClearCarryFlag
 228+ A263 B7          >                        or a
 229+ A264                                      ReturnIfNotZero
 229+ A264 C0          >                        ret     nz
 230+ A265                                      SetCarryFlag
 230+ A265 37          >                        scf
 231+ A266 C9                                   ret
 232+ A267
 233+ A267                                      ZeroA
 233+ A267 AF          >                        xor a
 234+ A268 B4                                   or      h
 235+ A269                                      ClearCarryFlag
 235+ A269 B7          >                        or a
 236+ A26A                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 236+ A26A C0          >                        ret     nz

 238+ A26C                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if x far

 252+ A280                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if z far

 253+ A282              .ItsAHit:               SetCarryFlag                                ; So must have hit

 117++A41A              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A41A              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A41A 2A CA A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A41D 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A41E ED 5B CE A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A422 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A423 ED 4B D2 A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A427 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A428                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A428 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A42A                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A42A C2 39 A4    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A42D B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A42E B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A42F B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A430                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A430 C2 39 A4    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A433                                      ELSE
 132++A433 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A433                                      ENDIF
 134++A433              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A433 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A436 C3 55 A1                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A439                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 138++A439              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A439 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A43B             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A43B ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A43E                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A43E 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)

 139++A442 C2 5F A4    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A445                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A445 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A448 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax

 142++A454 3A 97 7D     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A457                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A457 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A459 D2 5F A4    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A45C              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A45C C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A45F              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A45F              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A45F              .NoECM:
 149++A45F                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A45F                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A45F              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A45F              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A45F                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A45F FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A461             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A461 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A464                                      ;break
 155++A464                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A464              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A464 ~                                        break
 158++A464                                      ENDIF
 159++A464 CD C3 A9                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A467                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A467 CD 8A A8                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A46A                                      ENDIF
 163++A46A              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A46A 3A CB A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A46D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A46F 32 CB A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A472                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A472 3A CF A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A475 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A477 32 CF A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A47A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A47A 3A D3 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A47D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A47F 32 D3 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A482 CD 99 A4                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A485 C9                                   ret
 168++A486 3A 71 80     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A489                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A489 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A48B D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A48C C3 7A A1     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A48F                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A48F CD 45 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A492                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A492 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A493 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A496 C3 86 A4                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A499                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A499
 177++A499 CD CF A8     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A49C 32 8C A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A49F 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A4A2 32 90 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A4A5 CD 25 A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A4A8 32 8F A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A4AB 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A4AE 32 90 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A4B1 CD BB A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A4B4 CD DF A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A4B7 CD 0D A5                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A4BA C9                                   ret
 189++A4BB
 190++A4BB              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A4BB 2A 8F A2                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A4BE 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A4BF EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A4C1 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A4C3 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A4C4 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A4C5 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A4C7                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A4C7 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A4C9 D2 D5 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A4CC                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A4CC AF          >                        xor a
 200++A4CD B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A4CE 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A4D1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A4D1 32 1C A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A4D4                                      ENDIF
 205++A4D4 C9                                   ret
 206++A4D5 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A4D7 B4                                   or      h
 208++A4D8 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A4DB                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A4DB 32 1C A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A4DE                                      ENDIF
 212++A4DE C9                                   ret
 213++A4DF
 214++A4DF              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A4DF              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A4DF              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A4DF              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A4DF              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A4DF              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A4DF              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A4DF              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A4DF              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A4DF              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A4DF
 225++A4DF
 226++A4DF
 227++A4DF              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A4DF                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A4DF                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A4DF CD 2B A9                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A4E2 32 92 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A4E5 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A4E6 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A4E9 32 93 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A4EC 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A4ED 3A 90 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A4F0                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A4F0                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A4F0                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A4F0                                      ;xor $80
 241++A4F0 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A4F1 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A4F2 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A4F4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A4F4 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A4F6 D2 02 A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A4F9                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A4F9 AF          >                        xor a
 246++A4FA B0                                   or      b

 248++A4FE                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A4FE 32 1A A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A501                                      ENDIF
 251++A501 C9                                   ret
 252++A502 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A504 B4                                   or      h
 254++A505 A8                                   xor     b

 256++A509                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

 261++A50D 2A 8C A2     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)

 263++A511 A7                                   and     a
 264++A512 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown

 266++A518 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A519                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A519 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A51B DA 27 A5    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A51E 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A520 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A523                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A523 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A526                                      ENDIF
 273++A526 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A527              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A527 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A529 DA 35 A5    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A52C 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A52E 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A531                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A531 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A534                                      ENDIF
 280++A534 C9                                   ret
 281++A535              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change

 283++A539                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A539 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A53C                                      ENDIF

 300++A554 C2 65 A5                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .

 307++A564                                      ENDIF
 308++A564 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .

 165++A74A EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A74C 32 CF A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++A74F                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++A74F 3A D3 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++A752 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++A754 32 D3 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++A757 CD 5F A7                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++A75A C9                                   ret
 169++A75B CD 5F A7     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++A75E                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A75E C9                                   ret
 172++A75F
 173++A75F CD CF A8     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A762 32 8C A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A765 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A768 32 90 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A76B CD 25 A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A76E 32 8F A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A771 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A774 32 90 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A777 CD 81 A7                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A77A CD A5 A7                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A77D CD D3 A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A780 C9                                   ret
 185++A781
 186++A781 2A 8F A2     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A784 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A785 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A787 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A789 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A78A 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A78B CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A78D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A78D FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A78F D2 9B A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A792                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A792 AF          >                        xor a
 195++A793 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A794 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A797                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A797 32 1C A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A79A                                      ENDIF
 200++A79A C9                                   ret
 201++A79B 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A79D B4                                   or      h
 203++A79E 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A7A1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A7A1 32 1C A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A7A4                                      ENDIF
 207++A7A4 C9                                   ret
 208++A7A5
 209++A7A5 CD 2B A9     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A7A8 32 92 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A7AB 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A7AC 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A7AF 32 93 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A7B2 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A7B3 3A 90 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A7B6 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A7B7 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A7B8 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A7BA                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A7BA FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A7BC D2 C8 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A7BF                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A7BF AF          >                        xor a
 221++A7C0 B0                                   or      b
 222++A7C1 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A7C4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A7C4 32 1A A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A7C7                                      ENDIF
 226++A7C7 C9                                   ret
 227++A7C8 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A7CA B4                                   or      h
 229++A7CB A8                                   xor     b
 230++A7CC 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A7CF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A7CF 32 1A A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A7D2                                      ENDIF
 234++A7D2 C9                                   ret
 235++A7D3
 236++A7D3 2A 8C A2     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A7D6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A7D7 A7                                   and     a
 239++A7D8 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A7DA ED 5B 8F A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A7DE 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A7DF                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A7DF FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A7E1 DA ED A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A7E4 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A7E6 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A7E9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A7E9 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A7EC                                      ENDIF
 248++A7EC C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A7ED              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A7ED FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A7EF DA FB A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A7F2 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A7F4 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A7F7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A7F7 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A7FA                                      ENDIF
 255++A7FA C9                                   ret
 256++A7FB              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A7FB AF          >                        xor a
 257++A7FC 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A7FF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A7FF 32 1E A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A802                                      ENDIF
 261++A802 C9                                   ret
 262++A803              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++A803              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++A803              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A803              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A803              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A803              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A803              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A803              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++A803              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++A803              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++A803              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++A803              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 274++A803              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A803              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF
 277++A803              ;;;                        ret
 278++A803              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++A803              ;;;                        or      h
 280++A803              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 281++A803              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++A803              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++A803              ;;;                        ret
 285++A803

 315++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF

 336++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF

 372++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF

 374++A803              ;;;
 375++A803              ;;;
 376++A803              ;;;                        ;

 380++A803              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++A803              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++A803              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++A803              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++A803              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product

 386++A803              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 393++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF

 397++A803              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++A803              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++A803              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++A803              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++A803              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A803              ;;;                        ret
 403++A803              ;;;
 404++A803              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)

 271+ A803
 272+ A803              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 273+ A803              ; on exit a == new roll
 274+ A803 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 275+ A805 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 276+ A807 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 277+ A808 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 278+ A80A 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 279+ A80D C9                                   ret
 280+ A80E
 281+ A80E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 282+ A810 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 283+ A811 3A 8F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 284+ A814                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 284+ A814 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 284+ A816 DA 23 A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 285+ A819 78                                   ld      a,b
 286+ A81A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ A81C                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 288+ A81C                                     ; ld      a,
 289+ A81C 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 290+ A81E B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 291+ A81F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 292+ A822 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 293+ A823 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 294+ A824 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 295+ A827 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 296+ A828
 297+ A828 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 298+ A82B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 299+ A82D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 300+ A82F F6 05                                or      5
 301+ A831 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 302+ A834 C9                                   ret
 303+ A835
 304+ A835 4F                                   ld      c,a
 305+ A836 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 306+ A838 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 307+ A83B C9                                   ret
 308+ A83C
 309+ A83C
 310+ A83C
 311+ A83C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 312+ A83E 47                                   ld      b,a
 313+ A83F 3A 8F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 314+ A842                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 314+ A842 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 314+ A844 DA 4E A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 315+ A847 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 316+ A849 B1                                   or      c
 317+ A84A 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 318+ A84D C9                                   ret
 319+ A84E B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 320+ A84F 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 321+ A852 C9                                   ret

 324+ A853 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 325+ A856 C3 62 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 326+ A859
 327+ A859 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 328+ A85C C3 62 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 329+ A85F
 330+ A85F 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 331+ A862              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 332+ A862 11 AD A2     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 333+ A865 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 334+ A866 47                                   ld      b,a
 335+ A867 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 336+ A869 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 337+ A86A 13                                   inc     de
 338+ A86B 78                                   ld      a,b
 339+ A86C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 340+ A86E 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 341+ A86F 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 342+ A870 23                                   inc     hl
 343+ A871 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 344+ A872 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 345+ A873 47                                   ld      b,a
 346+ A874 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 347+ A876 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 348+ A877 13                                   inc     de
 349+ A878 78                                   ld      a,b
 350+ A879 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 351+ A87B 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 352+ A87C 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 353+ A87D 23                                   inc     hl
 354+ A87E 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 355+ A87F 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 356+ A880 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ A881 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 358+ A883 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 359+ A884 13                                   inc     de
 360+ A885 78                                   ld      a,b
 361+ A886 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 362+ A888 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 363+ A889 C9                                   ret
 364+ A88A
 365+ A88A                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 366+ A88A              DebugTacticsCopy:
