 392+ A8CF CD 59 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 393+ A8D2 21 AD A2     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 394+ A8D5 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 395+ A8D6 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 396+ A8D7 3A C9 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 397+ A8DA 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 398+ A8DB ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 399+ A8DD 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 400+ A8DE 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 401+ A8E1 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 402+ A8E2 3A CB A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 403+ A8E5 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 404+ A8E6 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 405+ A8E7 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 406+ A8E8 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 407+ A8E9 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 408+ A8EA 3A CD A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 409+ A8ED 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 410+ A8EE ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 411+ A8F0 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 412+ A8F1 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 413+ A8F3 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 414+ A8F4 3A CF A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 415+ A8F7 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 416+ A8F8 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 417+ A8F9 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 418+ A8FA E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 419+ A8FB 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 420+ A8FE 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 421+ A900 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 422+ A901 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 423+ A904 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 424+ A905 22 CD A8                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 425+ A908 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 426+ A909 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 427+ A90A 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 428+ A90B 3A D1 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 429+ A90E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 430+ A90F ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 431+ A911 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 432+ A912 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 433+ A914 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 434+ A915 3A D3 A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 435+ A918 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 436+ A919 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 437+ A91A 2A CD A8                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 438+ A91D CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 439+ A920 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 440+ A923 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 441+ A924 C9                                   ret
 442+ A925
 443+ A925 CD 5F A8     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 444+ A928 C3 D2 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 445+ A92B
 446+ A92B CD 53 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 447+ A92E C3 D2 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 448+ A931
 449+ A931 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 450+ A934 11 B9 A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 451+ A937 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 452+ A93A ED B0                                ldir
 453+ A93C C9                                   ret
 454+ A93D
 455+ A93D 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 456+ A940 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 457+ A943                                      ;xor     $80
 458+ A943 22 C9 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 459+ A946 32 CB A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 460+ A949
 461+ A949 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 462+ A94C 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 463+ A94F                                      ;xor     $80
 464+ A94F 22 CD A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 465+ A952 32 CF A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 466+ A955
 467+ A955 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 468+ A958 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 469+ A95B                                      ;xor     $80
 470+ A95B 22 D1 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 471+ A95E 32 D3 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 472+ A961 C9                                   ret
 473+ A962
 474+ A962              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 474+ A962 AF          >                        xor a
 475+ A963 21 B9 A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 476+ A966 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 477+ A968 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 478+ A969 23                                   inc     hl
 479+ A96A 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 480+ A96C C9                                   ret
 481+ A96D
 482+ A96D CD 62 A9     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 483+ A970 CD 3D A9                             call    CopyPosToVector
 484+ A973                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 485+ A973                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 486+ A973                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 487+ A973                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 488+ A973 C9                                   ret
 489+ A974
 490+ A974 ED 5B B9 A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 491+ A978 3A BB A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 492+ A97B                                      FlipSignBitA
 492+ A97B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 493+ A97D 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 494+ A97E 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 495+ A981 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 496+ A984 47                                   ld      b,a
 497+ A985 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 498+ A988 22 C9 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 499+ A98B 32 CB A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 500+ A98E ED 5B BC A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 501+ A992 3A BE A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 502+ A995                                      FlipSignBitA
 502+ A995 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 503+ A997 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 504+ A998 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 505+ A99B 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 506+ A99E 47                                   ld      b,a
 507+ A99F CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 508+ A9A2 22 CD A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 509+ A9A5 32 CF A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 510+ A9A8 ED 5B BF A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 511+ A9AC 3A C1 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 512+ A9AF                                      FlipSignBitA
 512+ A9AF EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 513+ A9B1 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 514+ A9B2 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 515+ A9B5 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 516+ A9B8 47                                   ld      b,a
 517+ A9B9 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 518+ A9BC 22 D1 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 519+ A9BF 32 D3 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 520+ A9C2 C9                                   ret
 521+ A9C3
 522+ A9C3              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 523+ A9C3              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 524+ A9C3              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 525+ A9C3 2A C9 A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 526+ A9C6 ED 5B CD A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 527+ A9CA ED 4B D1 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 528+ A9CE 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 529+ A9CF B2                                   or      d
 530+ A9D0 B0                                   or      b
 531+ A9D1 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 532+ A9D3                                      ShiftHLRight1
 532+ A9D3 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 532+ A9D5 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 533+ A9D7                                      ShiftDERight1
 533+ A9D7 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 533+ A9D9 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 534+ A9DB                                      ShiftBCRight1
 534+ A9DB CB 38       >			   srl b
 534+ A9DD CB 19       >			   rr  c
 535+ A9DF C3 CE A9                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 536+ A9E2              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 536+ A9E2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 536+ A9E4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 537+ A9E6                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 537+ A9E6 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 537+ A9E8 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 538+ A9EA                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 538+ A9EA CB 38       >			   srl b
 538+ A9EC CB 19       >			   rr  c
 539+ A9EE E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 540+ A9F1 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 541+ A9F2 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 542+ A9F4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 543+ A9F5 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 544+ A9F6 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 545+ A9F8 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 546+ A9F9 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 547+ A9FA 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 548+ A9FB ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 549+ A9FD 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 550+ A9FE EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 551+ A9FF CD 84 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 552+ AA02                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 553+ AA02 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 554+ AA03 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 555+ AA05 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 556+ AA06 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 557+ AA07 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 558+ AA08 CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 559+ AA0B 32 D1 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 560+ AA0E D1                                   pop     de
 561+ AA0F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 562+ AA10 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ AA12 CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ AA15 32 CD A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 565+ AA18 E1                                   pop     hl
 566+ AA19 7D                                   ld      a,l
 567+ AA1A FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 568+ AA1C CD 7E 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 569+ AA1F 32 C9 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 570+ AA22                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 571+ AA22                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 572+ AA22                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 572+ AA22 AF          >                        xor a
 573+ AA23 32 CA A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 574+ AA26 32 CE A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 575+ AA29 32 D2 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 576+ AA2C                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 576+ AA2C 3A CB A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 576+ AA2F E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 576+ AA31 32 CB A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 577+ AA34                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 577+ AA34 3A CF A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 577+ AA37 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 577+ AA39 32 CF A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 578+ AA3C                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 578+ AA3C 3A D3 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 578+ AA3F E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 578+ AA41 32 D3 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 579+ AA44 C9                                   ret

 767+ AA45              ;                         end if
 768+ AA45              ;                end if
 769+ AA45              ;           end if
 770+ AA45              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 771+ AA45
 772+ AA45
 773+ AA45              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 774+ AA45              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 775+ AA45              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 776+ AA45              ; .PART 8 - new
 777+ AA45              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 778+ AA45              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 779+ AA45              ;              if chance 25%
 780+ AA45              ;                 then fire ECM
 781+ AA45              ;
 782+ AA45
 783+ AA45
 784+ AA45
 785+ AA45
 786+ AA45 2A C9 A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 787+ AA48 ED 5B CD A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 788+ AA4C ED 4B D1 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 789+ AA50 3A CB A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 790+ AA53 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 791+ AA55 3A CF A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 792+ AA58 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 793+ AA5A 3A D3 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 794+ AA5D DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 795+ AA5F FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 796+ AA61 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 797+ AA63                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 797+ AA63 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 798+ AA65 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 799+ AA67 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 800+ AA69 CB 2F                            sra     a
 801+ AA6B FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 802+ AA6D CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 803+ AA6F CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 804+ AA71 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 805+ AA73 CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 806+ AA75 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 807+ AA77 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 808+ AA79 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 809+ AA7B DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 810+ AA7D CB 2F                            sra     a
 811+ AA7F DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 812+ AA81 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 813+ AA83 CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 814+ AA85 C3 5F AA                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 815+ AA88 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 816+ AA89 B2                               or      d
 817+ AA8A B0                               or      b
 818+ AA8B                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 818+ AA8B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 819+ AA8D 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 820+ AA8F              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 820+ AA8F CB 3C       >			   srl h
 820+ AA91 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 821+ AA93                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 821+ AA93 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 821+ AA95 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 822+ AA97                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 822+ AA97 CB 38       >			   srl b
 822+ AA99 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 823+ AA9B 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 824+ AA9C FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 825+ AA9E 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 826+ AA9F 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 827+ AAA0 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 828+ AAA2 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 829+ AAA3 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 830+ AAA4 DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 831+ AAA6 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 832+ AAA7 22 D9 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 833+ AAAA 22 DD A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 834+ AAAD 22 E1 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 835+ AAB0 C9                               ret
 836+ AAB1                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 837+ AAB1
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

  23+ AAB5 DD E5

 189+ AAD2              ;.FileStreamError:       jp      .FileStreamError
 190+ AAD2              ;
 191+ AAD2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AAD2              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AAD2              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AAD2              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AAD2              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AAD2              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AAD2 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AAD3 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AAD4 E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AAD5 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AAD8 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AAD9 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AADA E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AADB C9                                   ret
 205+ AADC
 206+ AADC              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AADC              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AADC              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AADC              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AADC              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AADC              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AADC B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AADD C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AADE E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AADF DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AAE2 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AAE3 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AAE4 E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AAE5 C9                                   ret
 220+ AAE6
 221+ AAE6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AAE6              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AAE6              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AAE6              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AAE6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AAE6 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AAE7 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AAE8 CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AAE9 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ AAEA C9                                   ret

 247+ AAEB
 248+ AAEB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ AAEB              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ AAEB              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ AAEB              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ AAEB              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ AAEB              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ AAEB              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ AAEB DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
 256+ AAEE CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ AAEF 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
 258+ AAF0 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl

 260+ AAF4
 261+ AAF4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ AAF4              ; Init the file system
 263+ AAF4              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ AAF4 CD B1 AA     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ AAF7 C9                                   ret
 266+ AAF8
 267+ AAF8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AAF8              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AAF8              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AAF8              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AAF8              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AAF8              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AAF8 CD B1 AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AAFB C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AAFE                                      ; get file size
 276+ AAFE C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AB01 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AB04 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AB06 CD C4 AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AB09 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AB0B FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AB0D 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AB0F DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AB12 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AB13 CD D2 AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AB16 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AB18 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AB19 CD E6 AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AB1C 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AB1E F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AB21 C9                                   ret
 292+ AB22              ;
 293+ AB22              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AB22              ;
 295+ AB22 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AB24 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AB25
 298+ AB25              .error_closing:
 299+ AB25 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AB26 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AB27 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AB28 C9                                   ret
 303+ AB29
 304+ AB29              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AB29              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AB29              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AB29              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AB29              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AB29              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AB29 CD B1 AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AB2C C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AB2F E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AB32 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AB34 CD C4 AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AB37 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AB39 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AB3B 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AB3D DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AB40 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AB41 CD DC AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AB44 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AB46 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AB47 CD E6 AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AB4A C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AB4B              ;
 326+ AB4B              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AB4B              ;
 328+ AB4B DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AB4E C9                                   ret

 333+ AB51 00           CardFlags               DB  0

 335+ AB54 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ AB56 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data

 339+ AD59 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ AD5B 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0

  19+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCTprint_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCTBoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  25+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  27+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  29+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  31+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT    MMUSelectLayer2
  35+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	call		l1_print_at
  36+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			hl
  37+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			bc
  38+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCT	ret
  40+ AECA
  41+ AECA
  42+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT print_boiler_text:
  43+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  48+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  50+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  52+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  54+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,txt_status_colour

  58+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			de
  59+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	call		l1_print_at
  60+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			hl
  61+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			bc
  62+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AECA              ;:DEFUNCT 	ret
  64+ AECA
  65+ AECA              ;;DEFUNCTGetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"

1177  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
1178  B109
1179  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
1180  B109                              org $B1B1
1181  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
1182  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
1183  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
1184  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
1185  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
1186  B1B1 ~                                            ei
1187  B1B1 ~                                            reti
1188  B1B1                                      ELSE
1189  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
1190  B1B1                                      ENDIF
1191  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1191  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
1192  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
1193  B1BA D9                                   exx
1194  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1195  B1BF 21 9D 7E                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
1196  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
1197  B1C3                                      ;break
1198  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
1199  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1200  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
1201  B1CB D9                                   exx
1202  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1202  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
1203  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
1204  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti

1209  B1D7
1210  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
1211  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1212  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
1213  B1D7                                      ENDM
1214  B1D7
1215  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
1216  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1217  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1218  B1D7                                      ENDM
1219  B1D7
1220  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
1221  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1222  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1223  B1D7                                      ENDM
1224  B1D7
1225  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
1226  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1227  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1228  B1D7                                      ENDM
1229  B1D7
1230  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
1230  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1230  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1230  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1230  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
1230  B1DE 04          >            inc b
1230  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1230  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1231  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
1231  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1232  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1233  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1234  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1235  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
1236  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1236  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1236  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1237  B1F1 C9                                   ret
1238  B1F2
1239  B1F2
1240  B1F2              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
1240  B1F2             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1240  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1240  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1240  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
1240  B1F9 04          >            inc b
1240  B1FA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1240  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1241  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
1241  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1242  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1243  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1244  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1245  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
1246  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1246  B206 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1246  B209 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7

  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de

  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B 43 7F                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B 41 7F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite

 191+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 192+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 193+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 194+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 195+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 196+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 198+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 199+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 200+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 201+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 202+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 203+ C236 83                                   add     e
 204+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 205+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 206+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 207+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 209+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height

 211+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de

 214+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 215+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 216+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 217+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 218+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 219+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 220+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 221+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 222+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 223+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 223+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 223+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 224+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 225+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 225+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)

 404+ C3D8 C6 02                                add		a,2
 405+ C3DA 57                                   ld		d,a
 406+ C3DB 1E D8                                ld		e,local_chart_star_colour
 407+ C3DD                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 407+ C3DD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 408+ C3E1 CD F4 ED                             call	l2_draw_circle_fill
 409+ C3E4                                     ; call    src_get_name
 410+ C3E4 CD B3 C2                             call	src_label_ssytem
 411+ C3E7 E1           SRCtoofar:              pop     hl
 412+ C3E8 ED 34 08 00                          add     hl,8
 413+ C3EC E5                                   push    hl
 414+ C3ED DD E1                                pop     ix
 415+ C3EF 3A A4 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 416+ C3F2 3D                                   dec		a
 417+ C3F3 FE 00                                cp		0
 418+ C3F5 C8                                   ret		z
 419+ C3F6 32 A4 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 420+ C3F9 C3 79 C3                             jp		SRCCounterLoop
 421+ C3FC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 422+ C3FC              draw_local_chart_menu:  InitNoDoubleBuffer
 422+ C3FC             >                            MMUSelectLayer1
 422+ C3FC ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 422+ C400 CD 8F E0    >                            call	l1_cls
 422+ C403 3E 07       >                            ld		a,7
 422+ C405 CD AA E0    >                            call	l1_attr_cls_to_a
 422+ C408             >                            MMUSelectLayer2
 422+ C408 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 422+ C40C CD 0A E0    >                            call    asm_l2_double_buffer_off
 422+ C40F CD 0E E2    >                            call	l2_cls	; Get some space
 422+ C412             >                            MMUSelectSpriteBank
 422+ C412 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 422+ C416 CD 6E E5    >                            call    sprite_cls_cursors
 423+ C419 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 424+ C41B 32 AC 7E                             ld      (MenuIdMax),a
 425+ C41E                                      CopyPresentSystemToTarget               ; for short range we always start at present and cusor on present
 425+ C41E 2A 41 7F    >                        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 425+ C421 22 43 7F    >                        ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 426+ C424 01 01 01     SRCDrawbox:             ld		bc,$0101
 427+ C427 11 FD BE                             ld		de,$BEFD
 428+ C42A 3E C0                                ld		a,$C0
 429+ C42C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 429+ C42C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 430+ C430 CD F9 E3                             call	l2_draw_box
 431+ C433 01 01 0A                             ld		bc,$0A01
 432+ C436 11 C0 FE                             ld		de,$FEC0
 433+ C439                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 433+ C439 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 434+ C43D CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 435+ C440 3E 0C        SRCStaticText:          ld		a,short_range_header
 436+ C442 CD 27 8E                             call	expandTokenToString
 437+ C445 06 01                                ld		b,1
 438+ C447 21 10 C0                             ld		hl,short_range_boiler_text
 439+ C44A CD C2 C0                             call	SRM_print_boiler_text
 440+ C44D CD 8D 84     SRCSetUpChart:          call	copy_galaxy_to_system
 441+ C450 CD 65 C3                             call	plot_local_stars
 442+ C453 CD DD C0     .CircleandCrosshair:    call	SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair
 443+ C456 CD F9 C0                             call	SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair
 444+ C459 C9                                   ret
 445+ C45A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 446+ C45A 3A 8E 80     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 447+ C45D                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 447+ C45D A7          >                        and     a
 447+ C45E C8          >                        ret     z
 448+ C45F 17                                   rla
 449+ C460 DC 78 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 450+ C463 17                                   rla
 451+ C464 DC 95 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 452+ C467 17                                   rla
 453+ C468 DC B4 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 454+ C46B 17                                   rla
 455+ C46C DC D1 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 456+ C46F 17                                   rla
 457+ C470 DC F0 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 458+ C473 17                                   rla
 459+ C474 DC FA C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 460+ C477 C9                                   ret
 461+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C478 3A 44 7F     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 463+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 463+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 463+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 465+ C480 3A 42 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 466+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 467+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 468+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 468+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 468+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 469+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 470+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 471+ C48E 32 44 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 472+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 473+ C494 C9                                   ret
 474+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 475+ C495 3A 42 7F     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 476+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 477+ C499 3A 44 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 478+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 479+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 479+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 480+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 481+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 482+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 482+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 483+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 484+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 485+ C4AD 32 44 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 486+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 487+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 488+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 489+ C4B4 3A 43 7F     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 490+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 490+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 490+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 492+ C4BC 3A 41 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 493+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 494+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 495+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 495+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 495+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 496+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 497+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 498+ C4CA 32 43 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 499+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 500+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 501+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ C4D1 3A 41 7F     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 503+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 504+ C4D5 3A 43 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 505+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 506+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 506+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 507+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 508+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 509+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 509+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 509+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 510+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 511+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 512+ C4E9 32 43 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 513+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 515+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4F0 2A 41 7F     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 517+ C4F3 22 43 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 518+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 519+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 520+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 521+ C4FA 3A 2E 7F     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 522+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 522+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 523+ C500 ED 4B 43 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 524+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 525+ C507 ED 43 43 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 526+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 527+ C50E C9                                   ret
 528+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 529+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 530+ C510 C9                                   ret
 531+ C511
# file closed: ./Menus/short_range_chart_menu.asm

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C08F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C090 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C091 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C092 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C093 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C094 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C095 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C096 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C097 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C098 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C099 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C09B C5                                   push		bc
  16++C09C D1                                   pop			de
  17++C09D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0A1 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0A4 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0A5 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0A6 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0A8 C9                                   ret
  23++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 155+ C220 11 08 B0     gc_display_find_text:   ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 156+ C223 21 3C C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_message
 157+ C226                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 157+ C226 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 158+ C22A CD D7 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 159+ C22D C9                                   ret
 160+ C22E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 161+ C22E 11 DC C1     gc_display_find_string: ld      de,gcInputText
 162+ C231                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 162+ C231 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 163+ C235 CD 3D E2                             call    keyboard_copy_input_to_de
 164+ C238 21 DA C1                             ld      hl,gcCursorChar         ; Now just copy cursor char too
 165+ C23B ED A0                                ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 166+ C23D 3A 39 E2                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 167+ C240 3C                                   inc     a
 168+ C241 47                                   ld      b,a
 169+ C242 3E 14                                ld      a,20
 170+ C244 90                                   sub     b
 171+ C245 47                                   ld      b,a
 172+ C246 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 173+ C248 12           .SpacePad:              ld      (de),a
 174+ C249 13                                   inc     de
 175+ C24A 10 FC                                djnz    .SpacePad
 176+ C24C AF                                   xor     a
 177+ C24D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 178+ C24E 11 38 B0                             ld		de,galactic_find_text    ; Display text
 179+ C251 21 DC C1                             ld      hl,gcInputText
 180+ C254                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 180+ C254 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 181+ C258 CD D7 E0                             call	l1_print_at
 182+ C25B C9                                   ret
 183+ C25C
 184+ C25C 3A D9 C1     blink_cursor:           ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 185+ C25F 3D                                   dec     a
 186+ C260 32 D9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 187+ C263 C0                                   ret     nz
 188+ C264 3E 10        .FlashCursor:           ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 189+ C266 32 D9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 190+ C269 3A DA C1                             ld      a,(gcCursorChar)
 191+ C26C FE 20                                cp      " "
 192+ C26E 28 06                                jr      z,.ChangeToStar
 193+ C270 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 194+ C272 32 DA C1                             ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 195+ C275 C9                                   ret
 196+ C276 3E 2A        .ChangeToStar:          ld      a,"*"
 197+ C278 32 DA C1                             ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 198+ C27B C9                                   ret
 199+ C27C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 200+ C27C              ; The main loop handles the find key
 201+ C27C              loop_gc_menu:           JumpIfMemTrue TextInputMode,AlreadyInInputMode  ;if we are in input mode then go directly there
 201+ C27C 3A 8D 80    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 201+ C27F A7          >                        and     a
 201+ C280 CA A1 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 202+ C283              .StartFindCheck:        MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 202+ C283 3E 4E       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find
 202+ C285             >                        MMUSelectKeyboard
 202+ C285 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 202+ C289 CD A2 E1    >                        call    is_key_pressed
 203+ C28C C0                                   ret     nz                                      ;the main loop handles find key
 204+ C28D                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 204+ C28D ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 205+ C291 CD 9C E2                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 206+ C294                                      SetMemTrue TextInputMode                        ;Set input mode to true
 206+ C294 AF          >                        xor     a
 206+ C295 32 8D 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 207+ C298                                      SetMemToN gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal             ; set up blink
 207+ C298 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 207+ C29A 32 D9 C1    >                        ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 208+ C29D CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 209+ C2A0 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 210+ C2A1              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 211+ C2A1              AlreadyInInputMode:     MMUSelectKeyboard
 211+ C2A1 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 212+ C2A5 CD C3 E2                             call    InputName                               ; Call input routine to parse a key
 213+ C2A8                                      JumpIfMemFalse InputChanged, .blinkNoDelay      ; no key they bypass rest of input
 213+ C2A8 3A 3B E2    >                        ld      a,(InputChanged)
 213+ C2AB A7          >                        and     a
 213+ C2AC C2 B9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay
 214+ C2AF              .WasItEnter:            JumpIfMemTrue EnterPressed, .FindEnterPressed   ; if enter was pressed then find
 214+ C2AF 3A 3A E2    >                        ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 214+ C2B2 A7          >                        and     a
 214+ C2B3 CA C5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed
 215+ C2B6 CD 2E C2                             call    gc_display_find_string                  ; update string
 216+ C2B9 CD 5C C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 217+ C2BC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 217+ C2BC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 217+ C2BF FE 10       >                        cp      gcBlinkVal
 217+ C2C1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string
 218+ C2C4 C9                                   ret
 219+ C2C5              .FindEnterPressed:      SetMemFalse EnterPressed                        ; reset enter

 219+ C2C7 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 220+ C2CA                                      SetMemFalse TextInputMode                       ; leave input mode
 220+ C2CA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF

 227+ C2E1 FE FF                                cp      $FF                                     ; 0 denotes found FF, failure
 228+ C2E3 28 1D                                jr      z,.FindNoMatch
 229+ C2E5 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 230+ C2E8 4F                                   ld      c,a

 232+ C2EC 47                                   ld      b,a

 237+ C2FA                                      MMUSelectLayer1

 376+ C439 32 22 C0                             ld		(galactic_chart_fraction),a
 377+ C43C 2B                                   dec     hl

  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C071 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C072 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C073 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C074 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C075 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C076 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C077 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C078 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C079 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C07A EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C07B 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C07D C5                                   push		bc
  16++C07E D1                                   pop			de
  17++C07F                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C083 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C086 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C087 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C088 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C08A C9                                   ret
  23++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  11++C145 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++C147              .Num2:

  14++C148 81           	add		a,c
  15++C149 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++C14B 91           	sub 	c
  17++C14C C5           	push	bc
  18++C14D F5           	push	af
  19++C14E 79           	ld		a,c
  20++C14F FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++C151 CC 5A C1     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++C154 78           	ld		a,b
  23++C155 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++C156 13           	inc		de
  25++C157 F1           	pop		af
  26++C158 C1           	pop		bc
  27++C159 C9           	ret

   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C2C6 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C2C7 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C2C8 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C2C9 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C2CA 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C2CB 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C2CC 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C2CD 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C2CE E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C2CF EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C2D0 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C2D2 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C2D3 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C2D4                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C2D8 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C2DB E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C2DC C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C2DD 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C2DF C9                                   ret

 143+ C333 ED 43 E8 C2                          ld      (SD_working_cursor),bc

 303+ C4E3              ; HL = value to add on
 304+ C4E3              ; de = Unit of Measure
 305+ C4E3 7E           SDAddUoMtoHL:           ld      a,(hl)

 307+ C4E6 28 03                                jr      z,.FoundEnd
 308+ C4E8 23                                   inc     hl
 309+ C4E9 18 F8                                jr      SDAddUoMtoHL
 310+ C4EB EB           .FoundEnd:              ex      de,hl
 311+ C4EC CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
 312+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 313+ C4F0
 314+ C4F0              ; works on HL already being at end
 315+ C4F0              ; de = Unit of Measure

 317+ C4F1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 318+ C4F2 CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
