 812++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 813++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y1HighIsZero                     ;
 814++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ; if we get here Y1 high <> 0
 815++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 816++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y2HighIsZero                     ; if they are both non zero we can do a sign check
 817++CCD8              ;;;;;;.CheckYSameSign:        ld      a,b                                 ; if we get here Y1 high and Y2 high are not zero
 818++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        xor     ixh                                 ; so same sign then bail out if they are
 819++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 820++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 821++CCD8              ;;;;;;;if we get here either y1hi or y2 hi are 0, now check and y1 low > 127 & y2 low > 127, exit
 822++CCD8              ;;;;;;.Y1HighIsZero:          ld      a,ixh                               ; as y1h is zero, if y2h is zero we do y1 y2 test
 823++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 824++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.Startprocessing                 ;
 825++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c                                 ; so by here y1h and y2h must be zero
 826++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        and     ixl
 827++CCD8              ;;;;;;
 828++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        .CheckY2Lo                        ;
 829++CCD8              ;;;;;;.CheckY1Lo:             ld      a,c
 830++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 831++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 832++CCD8              ;;;;;;.CheckY2Lo:             ld      a,ixl
 833++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 834++CCD8              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz
 835++CCD8              ;;;;;;;clip = 0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
 723+ CCD8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 724+ CCD8                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CCD8              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CCD8              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CCD8              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CCD8              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CCD8              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CCD8              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CCD8
   8++CCD8              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CCD8 DD 21 00 00  CopyRotmatToTransMat:   ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  10++CCDC DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  11++CCDE 31 29 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  12++CCE1 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  13++CCE2 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  14++CCE3 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  15++CCE4 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  16++CCE5 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  17++CCE6 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  18++CCE7 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  19++CCE8 31 6D C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  20++CCEB C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  21++CCEC D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  22++CCED E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  23++CCEE D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  24++CCEF C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  25++CCF0 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  26++CCF1 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  27++CCF2 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  28++CCF5 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  29++CCF6 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  30++CCF7 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  31++CCF8 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  32++CCFB C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  33++CCFC D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  34++CCFD E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  35++CCFE DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  36++CD00 C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  37++CD01
  38++CD01
  39++CD01
  40++CD01              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  41++CD01              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++CD01              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  43++CD01              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  44++CD01              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  45++CD01              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  46++CD01              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  47++CD01              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  48++CD01              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  49++CD01              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  50++CD01              ;                        ret
  51++CD01
  52++CD01              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  53++CD01 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  54++CD01 ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  55++CD01 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  56++CD01 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  57++CD01 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  58++CD01                                      ENDM
  59++CD01
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 725+ CD01                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CD01              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CD01 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CD04 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CD05 E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CD07 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CD08                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CD08 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CD09 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CD0B 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CD0C                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CD0C ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CD10 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CD13 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CD15 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CD16 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CD19 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CD1A 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CD1B 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CD1E              ; ..................................
  20++CD1E 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CD21 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CD22 E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CD24 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CD25                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CD25 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CD26 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CD28 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CD29                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CD29 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CD2D 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CD30 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CD32 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CD33 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CD36 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CD37 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CD38 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CD3B              ; ..................................
  38++CD3B 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CD3E 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CD3F E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CD41 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CD42                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CD42 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CD43 E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CD45 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CD46                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CD46 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CD4A 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CD4D E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CD4F 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CD50 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CD53 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CD54 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CD55 CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CD57 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CD59 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CD5B 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CD5D 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CD5E              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CD5E FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CD60 DA 6F CD    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CD63              NoClampZto4:
  61++CD63 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CD66 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CD67 32 BB 7E             ld      (varT),a
  64++CD6A 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CD6B 32 9E 7E             ld      (varU),a
  66++CD6E C9           		ret
  67++CD6F              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CD6F 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CD72 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CD75 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CD76 32 BB 7E             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CD79 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CD7A 32 9E 7E             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CD7D C9           		ret
  75++CD7E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 726+ CD7E                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CD7E              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CD7E ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CD82 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CD85 ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CD89              SetABSbc:
   6++CD89 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CD8A DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CD8C E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CD8E 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CD8F              SetABShl:
  11++CD8F 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CD90 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CD92 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CD94 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CD95              SetABSde:
  16++CD95 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CD96 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CD98 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CD9A 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CD9B              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CD9B 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CD9C B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CD9D B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CD9E 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CDA0                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CDA0 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CDA2 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CDA4                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CDA4 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CDA6 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CDA8              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CDA8 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CDAA CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CDAC C3 9B CD         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CDAF              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CDAF DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CDB1 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CDB3 B0           	or			b
  33++CDB4 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CDB5              SignforHL:
  35++CDB5 DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CDB7 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CDB9 B4           	or			h
  38++CDBA 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CDBB              SignforDE:
  40++CDBB FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CDBD E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CDBF B2           	or			d
  43++CDC0 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CDC1              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CDC1 ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CDC5 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CDC8 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CDCC 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CDCD 32 9E 7E     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CDD0 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CDD1 32 BB 7E     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CDD4 C9           	ret
  53++CDD5
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
 727+ CDD5

 729+ CDD5 21 D2 C0     SetFaceAVisible:        ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 730+ CDD8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 731+ CDDA 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 732+ CDDC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 733+ CDDD C9                                   ret
 734+ CDDE              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 735+ CDDE 21 D2 C0     SetFaceAHidden:         ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 736+ CDE1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 737+ CDE3 AF                                   xor     a
 738+ CDE4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 739+ CDE5 C9                                   ret

 741+ CDE6 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesVisible:     ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+FaceCtX4Addr                                 ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 742+ CDE9 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 743+ CDEB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 744+ CDED 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 745+ CDEE 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 746+ CDF1 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 747+ CDF3              SetAllFacesVisibleLoop:
 748+ CDF3 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 749+ CDF4 23                                   inc     hl
 750+ CDF5 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop
 751+ CDF7 C9                                   ret
 752+ CDF8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 753+ CDF8 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 754+ CDFB CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 755+ CDFD CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 756+ CDFF 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 757+ CE00 06 10                                ld      b,16
 758+ CE02 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 759+ CE05 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 760+ CE07 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 761+ CE08 23                                   inc     hl
 762+ CE09 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop
 763+ CE0B C9                                   ret

 765+ CE0C              ;;;;X = normal scale
 766+ CE0C              ;;;;ZtempHi = zhi
 767+ CE0C              ;;;;......................................................
 768+ CE0C              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 769+ CE0C              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90
 770+ CE0C              ;;;;     inc X
 771+ CE0C              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2
 772+ CE0C              ;;;;  Until ZtempHi = 0
 773+ CE0C              ;;;;......................................................
 774+ CE0C              ;-LL21---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 775+ CE0C                  DISPLAY "Tracing 3", $
 776+ CE0C
 777+ CE0C                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CE0C              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CE0C 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CE0D 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CE0F 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CE11 3A 9F 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CE14 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CE15              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CE15              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CE15 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CE18 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE19 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CE1B CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CE1D 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CE1E ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CE20 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CE22 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CE24 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CE25 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CE26 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CE28 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CE29 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CE2C C9                                   ret
  23++CE2D
  24++CE2D FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CE2F                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CE2F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CE31 CD 0C CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CE34 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CE36                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CE36 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CE38 B1                                   or      c
  30++CE39 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CE3C C9                                   ret
  32++CE3D
  33++CE3D              ; Tested OK
  34++CE3D              ;LL21
  35++CE3D              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CE3D                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CE3D ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CE3D ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CE3D ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CE3D ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CE3D ~                            dec     hl
  42++CE3D ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CE3D ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CE3D ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CE3D ~                            push	hl
  46++CE3D ~                            push	bc
  47++CE3D ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CE3D ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CE3D ~                            pop		bc
  50++CE3D ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CE3D ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CE3D ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CE3D ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CE3D ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CE3D ~                            ret
  56++CE3D                      ELSE
  57++CE3D 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CE40 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CE42 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CE43 32 9F 7E                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CE46 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CE48 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CE49 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CE4A 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CE4B                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CE4B CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CE4D CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CE4F 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CE50 E5                           push	hl
  68++CE51 C5                           push	bc
  69++CE52 CD 0C CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CE55                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CE55 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CE56 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CE57 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CE58 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CE59 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CE5A 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CE5C C9                           ret
  78++CE5D                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 778+ CE5D              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"
 779+ CE5D              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 780+ CE5D
 781+ CE5D              ; Now we have
 782+ CE5D              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 783+ CE5D              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 784+ CE5D              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 785+ CE5D              ;
 786+ CE5D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 787+ CE5D                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CE5D              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CE5D
   3++CE5D              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CE5D              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CE5D              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CE5D              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CE5D              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CE5D              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CE5D              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CE5D              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CE5D              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CE5D              ;        sla      a
  13++CE5D              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CE5D              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CE5D              ;        inc     hl
  16++CE5D              ;        inc     hl
  17++CE5D              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CE5D              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CE5D              ;        ret
  20++CE5D
  21++CE5D
  22++CE5D              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CE5D              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CE5D              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CE5D              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CE5D              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CE5D              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CE5D              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CE5D              ; OUTPUT
  30++CE5D              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CE5D              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CE5D              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CE5D              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CE5D 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CE60 ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CE64 ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CE68 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CE6B ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CE6F ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CE73 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CE76 ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CE7A ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CE7E 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CE81 ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CE85 ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CE89 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CE8C ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CE90 ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CE94 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CE97 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CE9B ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CE9F C9                   ret
  53++CEA0
  54++CEA0
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 788+ CEA0              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 789+ CEA0              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 790+ CEA0              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 791+ CEA0              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 792+ CEA0              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 793+ CEA0              ; Returns
 794+ CEA0              ;
 795+ CEA0              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 796+ CEA0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 797+ CEA0              ;
 798+ CEA0              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 799+ CEA0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 800+ CEA0              ;
 801+ CEA0              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 802+ CEA0              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 803+ CEA0              ; TESTEDOK
 804+ CEA0              XX12DotOneRow:
 805+ CEA0              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 805+ CEA0 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 805+ CEA3 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 805+ CEA4 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 805+ CEA5 57          >                        ld      d,a
 805+ CEA6 ED 30       >                        mul
 805+ CEA8 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 805+ CEA9 32 BB 7E    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 806+ CEAC 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 807+ CEAD              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 807+ CEAD 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 807+ CEB0 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 808+ CEB1 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 809+ CEB4 23                                   inc     hl
 810+ CEB5              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 810+ CEB5 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 810+ CEB8 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 810+ CEB9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 810+ CEBA 57          >                        ld      d,a
 810+ CEBB ED 30       >                        mul
 810+ CEBD 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 810+ CEBE 32 9F 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 811+ CEC1                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 811+ CEC1 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 811+ CEC4 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 812+ CEC7 23                                   inc     hl
 813+ CEC8                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 813+ CEC8 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 813+ CECB AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 814+ CECC              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 815+ CECC E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 816+ CECD CD 5C 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 817+ CED0 E1                                   pop     hl
 818+ CED1 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 819+ CED4 23                                   inc     hl
 820+ CED5              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 820+ CED5 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 820+ CED8 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 820+ CED9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 820+ CEDA 57          >                        ld      d,a
 820+ CEDB ED 30       >                        mul
 820+ CEDD 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 820+ CEDE 32 9F 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 821+ CEE1                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 821+ CEE1 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 821+ CEE4 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 822+ CEE7 23                                   inc     hl
 823+ CEE8                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 823+ CEE8 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 823+ CEEB AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 824+ CEEC              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 825+ CEEC CD 5C 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 826+ CEEF              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 827+ CEEF C9                                   ret
 828+ CEF0
 829+ CEF0
 830+ CEF0                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 831+ CEF0
 832+ CEF0              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 833+ CEF0              ;TESTED OK
 834+ CEF0              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 835+ CEF0              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 836+ CEF0 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 837+ CEF3 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 838+ CEF6 CD A0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 839+ CEF9 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 840+ CEFC 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 841+ CEFF 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 842+ CF02 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 843+ CF05 CD A0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 844+ CF08 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 845+ CF0B 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 846+ CF0E 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 847+ CF11 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 848+ CF14 CD A0 CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 849+ CF17 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 850+ CF1A 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 851+ CF1D 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 852+ CF20 C9                                   ret
 853+ CF21              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 854+ CF21                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CF21              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CF21              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++CF21                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev

   6++CF33 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++CF36 32 9F C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++CF39                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++CF39 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)

   8++CF3F                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++CF3F 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+5)

   9++CF45 C9                   ret

   1++CF90 2A 20 C0     LoadCraftToCamera:      ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)            ; UBnKxlo, UBnKxhi
   2++CF93 ED 5B 22 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxsgn)           ; UBnKxsgn, UBnKylo
   3++CF97 ED 4B 24 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnKyhi)            ; UBnKyhi, UBnKysgn
   4++CF9B 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl    ; UBnkDrawCam0xLo, UBnkDrawCam0xHi

   7++CFA6
