  56++CFD6              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  57++CFD6              LL94Z:
  58++CFD6 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++CFD8 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++CFDA 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++CFDD 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++CFDE 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++CFE1 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++CFE2 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++CFE5 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++CFE6 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++CFE9 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++CFEA CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++CFED 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++CFEE 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++CFEF 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++CFF0 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++CFF3 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++CFF4 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  75++CFF7              LL94X:
  76++CFF7 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  77++CFF9 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  78++CFFB 3A A6 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  79++CFFE 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  80++CFFF 3A A7 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  81++D002 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D003 3A 9A C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  83++D006 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  84++D007 3A 9C C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  85++D00A 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  86++D00B CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  87++D00E 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  88++D00F 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  89++D010 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  90++D011 32 A7 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  91++D014 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  92++D015 32 A6 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  93++D018              LL94Y:
  94++D018 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  95++D01A 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  96++D01C 3A A8 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  97++D01F 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  98++D020 3A A9 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  99++D023 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 100++D024 3A 9D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
 101++D027 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
 102++D028 3A 9F C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
 103++D02B 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
 104++D02C CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
 105++D02F 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 106++D030 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
 107++D031 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 108++D032 32 A9 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
 109++D035 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
 110++D036 32 A8 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 111++D039 C9                   ret
 112++D03A
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX18ScaledToXX15.asm
 858+ D03A                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D03A              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D03A              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D03A                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D03A 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D03D 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D040                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D040 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D043 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D046                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D046 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D049 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D04C C9                   ret
   7++D04D
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 859+ D04D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 860+ D04D                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D04D              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D04D              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D04D              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D04D              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D04D              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D04D              ;;; R = T
   7++D04D              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D04D              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D04D              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D04D              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D04D              ;;; R = T
  12++D04D              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D04D
  14++D04D
  15++D04D
  16++D04D
  17++D04D
  18++D04D              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D04D ~            						mul
  20++D04D ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D04D              						ENDM
  22++D04D              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D04D 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D050                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D050 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D051 CA 6E D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D054 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D055 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D058 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D059                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D059 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D05A CA 6E D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D05D ED 30        		mul
  30++D05F 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D060 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D063 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D066 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D067 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D069 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D06B C3 72 D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D06E              dotxskipzero:
  38++D06E AF                   xor         a
  39++D06F 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D070 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D072              dotmuly:
  42++D072              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D072 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D075                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D075 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D076 CA 95 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D079 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D07A 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D07D                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D07D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D07E CA 95 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D081 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D082 ED 30                mul
  50++D084 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D085 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D087 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D08A 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D08D AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D08E E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D090 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D092 C3 99 D0             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D095              dotyskipzero:
  59++D095 AF                   xor         a
  60++D096 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D097 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D099              dotaddxy:
  63++D099              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D099 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D09B 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D09C 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D09E 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D09F FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D0A1 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D0A2 CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D0A5 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D0A6 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D0A9                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D0A9 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D0AA CA CF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D0AD 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D0AE 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D0B1                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D0B1 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D0B2 CA CF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D0B5 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D0B6 ED 30                mul
  79++D0B8 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D0B9 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D0BC 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D0BF AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D0C0 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D0C2 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D0C3 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D0C4 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D0C5 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D0C7 CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D0CA 32 A1 7E             ld          (varS),a
  90++D0CD 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D0CE C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D0CF              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D0CF 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D0D0 32 A1 7E             ld          (varS),a
  95++D0D3 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D0D4 C9                   ret
  97++D0D5              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D0D5              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D0D5              ;;;;		mul
 104++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D0D5              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D0D5              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D0D5              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D0D5              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D0D5              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D0D5              ;;;;       mul
 117++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D0D5              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D0D5              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D0D5              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D0D5              ;;;;       mul
 132++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D0D5              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D0D5              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D0D5              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D0D5              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D0D5              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D0D5              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D0D5
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 861+ D0D5              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 862+ D0D5              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 863+ D0D5              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 864+ D0D5              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 865+ D0D5                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D0D5              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D0D5              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D0D5 3A 09 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D0D8 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D0D9              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D0D9 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D0DC 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D0DD                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D0DD A7          >                        and     a
   8++D0DE C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D0DF              LL90Loop:
  10++D0DF              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D0DF 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D0E0                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D0E0 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D0E3 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D0E5 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D0E7 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D0EA                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D0EA 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D0ED CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D0EF CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D0F1 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D0F4                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D0F4 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D0F7 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D0F9 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D0FB 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D0FE 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D0FF                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D0FF A7          >                        and     a
  16++D100 C2 DF D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D103 C9                   ret
  18++D104
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 866+ D104              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 867+ D104
 868+ D104              ; Backface cull
 869+ D104              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 870+ D104              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 871+ D104              ;
 872+ D104                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D104 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D105 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D106 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D108 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D10B 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D10C CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D10E 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D10F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D111 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D114 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D115 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D117 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D119 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D11C 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D11D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D11E 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D121 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D122 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D123 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D126 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D127 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D128 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D12B C9                                   ret
  24++D12C
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 873+ D12C                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D12C 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D12D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D12E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D130 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D133 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D134 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D136 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D137 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D139 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D13C 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D13D CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D13F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D141 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D144 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D145 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D146 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D149 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D14A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D14B 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D14E 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D14F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D150 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D153 C9                                   ret
  24++D154
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 874+ D154              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 875+ D154              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 876+ D154              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 877+ D154              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 878+ D154              ; return if no faces
 879+ D154              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 880+ D154              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 881+ D154              ; While Z hi <> 0
 882+ D154              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 883+ D154              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 884+ D154              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 885+ D154              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 886+ D154              ; Loop
 887+ D154              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 888+ D154              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 889+ D154              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 890+ D154              ; For each face
 891+ D154              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 892+ D154              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 893+ D154              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 894+ D154              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 895+ D154              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 896+ D154              ;        else
 897+ D154              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 898+ D154              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 899+ D154              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 900+ D154              ;           While X >= 0
 901+ D154              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 902+ D154              ;              if  x >= 0
 903+ D154              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 904+ D154              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 905+ D154              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 906+ D154              ;           loop
 907+ D154              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 908+ D154              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 909+ D154              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 910+ D154              ;               X = 1
 911+ D154              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 912+ D154              ;           else
 913+ D154              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 914+ D154              ;           endif
 915+ D154              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 916+ D154              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 917+ D154              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 918+ D154              ;               X = 1
 919+ D154              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 920+ D154              ;           else
 921+ D154              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 922+ D154              ;           endif
 923+ D154              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 924+ D154              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 925+ D154              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 926+ D154              ;               X = 1
 927+ D154              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 928+ D154              ;           else
 929+ D154              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 930+ D154              ;           endif
 931+ D154              ;        endif
 932+ D154              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 933+ D154              ;        if dot product < 0
 934+ D154              ;           set face visible
 935+ D154              ;        else
 936+ D154              ;           set face invisible
 937+ D154              ;        end if
 938+ D154              ;     else
 939+ D154              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 940+ D154              ;     end if
 941+ D154              ; Next Face
 942+ D154
 943+ D154              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 944+ D154
 945+ D154              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 946+ D154              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 947+ D154              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 948+ D154              ;
 949+ D154              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 950+ D154              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 951+ D154              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 952+ D154              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 953+ D154              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 954+ D154                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D154              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D154                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D154               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D154 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D155              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D155              ; EE29:
   7++D155
   8++D155              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D155              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D155              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D155              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D155              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D155              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D155              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D155              ;
  16++D155              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D155              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D155              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D155              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D155              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D155              ;
  22++D155              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D155              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D155              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D155              ;
  26++D155              ; so
  27++D155              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D155              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D155              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D155              ;
  31++D155              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D155              ;
  33++D155              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D155              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D155              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D155              ;
  37++D155
  38++D155
  39++D155
  40++D155 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D158                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D158 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D159 CA 85 D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D15C 2A 9A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D15F ED 5B 9D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D163 ED 4B A0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D167 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D169                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D169 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D16B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D16D                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D16D CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D16F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D171                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D171 CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D173 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D175 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D176                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D176 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D177 C2 67 D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D17A 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D17D ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D181 ED 43 A0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D185 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D187 32 A6 7E                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D18A C9                                   ret
  57++D18B
  58++D18B 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D18E E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D190 20 31                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D192 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D195 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D196                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D196 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D198 D2 C3 D1    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D19B ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D19F CD 45 98                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D1A2 38 1F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D1A4 ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D1A8 CD 45 98                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D1AB 38 16                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D1AD                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D1AD 3A 04 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++D1B0                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D1B0 BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D1B1 D2 B7 D1    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D1B4 C3 C9 D1                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D1B7 3A 54 C0     .DrawFull:                  ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  75++D1BA F6 40                                    or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  76++D1BC E6 F7                                    and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  77++D1BE 32 54 C0                                 ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  78++D1C1                                          ClearCarryFlag
  78++D1C1 B7          >                        or a
  79++D1C2 C9                                       ret
  80++D1C3                                      ELSE
  81++D1C3 ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  82++D1C3 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  83++D1C3 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  84++D1C3 ~                                        ld      a,h
  85++D1C3 ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  86++D1C3 ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  87++D1C3 ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  88++D1C3 ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  89++D1C3 ~                                        ld      a,l
  90++D1C3 ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  91++D1C3 ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D1C3 ~                                        srl     a
  93++D1C3 ~                                        srl     a
  94++D1C3 ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  95++D1C3 ~                                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  96++D1C3 ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  97++D1C3 ~                                        and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  98++D1C3 ~                                        ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  99++D1C3 ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
 100++D1C3 ~                                        ret
 101++D1C3                                      ENDIF
 102++D1C3              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 102++D1C3 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 102++D1C6 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 103++D1C8 C9                                   ret
 104++D1C9 3A 54 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 105++D1CC                                      IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
 106++D1CC ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible   ;
 107++D1CC                                      ELSE
 108++D1CC F6 48                                    or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 109++D1CE                                      ENDIF

 111++D1D1 C9                                   ret

 149++D211 CD 2C D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy

 151++D217 47                                   ld      b,a

 153++D21D CD 6B CF     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix

 178++D278              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 179++D278              ; Add normal to XX15
 180++D278              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 181++D278              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 182++D278              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 183++D278              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 184++D278              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam

 207++D2E1 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 208++D2E4              ; calculate dot product LL89
 209++D2E4              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 209++D2E4 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 209++D2E7 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D2EA 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 211++D2ED CD C7 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 212++D2F0 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D2F3 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 214++D2F6 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 215++D2F9 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 216++D2FA 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 217++D2FD                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 217++D2FD 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 217++D300 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 218++D303 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 219++D306 CD C7 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 220++D309 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D30C                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 221++D30C 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 221++D30F 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 222++D312 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 223++D315 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 224++D318 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 225++D319 CD 5C 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 226++D31C 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D31F                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 227++D31F 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 227++D322 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 228++D325 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 229++D328 CD C7 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 230++D32B 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D32E                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 231++D32E 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 231++D331 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 232++D334 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 233++D337 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 234++D33A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 235++D33B CD 5C 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 236++D33E FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 237++D340 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 238++D342 3A A1 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 239++D345 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 240++D348 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 241++D34A 3A 54 D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 242++D34D CD DE CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 243++D350 C3 59 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 244++D353 3A 54 D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 245++D356 CD D5 CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 246++D359 21 54 D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 247++D35C 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 248++D35D C1                                   pop         bc
 249++D35E E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 250++D35F 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 251++D361 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 252++D363 22 A5 7D                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 253++D366 05                                   dec         b
 254++D367 C2 03 D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 255++D36A C9                                   ret
 256++D36B
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 955+ D36B              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 956+ D36B
 957+ D36B              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:

 962+ D379              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 963+ D379              NodeXPositiveX:
 964+ D379 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 965+ D37A 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 966+ D37C 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 967+ D37F 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 968+ D381 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 969+ D382 22 A6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 970+ D385 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 971+ D386 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 972+ D389 C3 A8 D3             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 973+ D38C              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 974+ D38C              NodeNegativeX:

 976+ D38C 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord

 978+ D393 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 979+ D395 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo

 981+ D39A              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 982+ D39A              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 983+ D39A CD 66 92             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 984+ D39D 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 985+ D3A0 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 986+ D3A2 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 987+ D3A5              SetAndMopX:
 988+ D3A5 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 989+ D3A8              FinishedThisNodeX:
