1195+ D507              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1196+ D507              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1197+ D507              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1198+ D507              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1199+ D507              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1200+ D507              CopyNodeToXX15:
1201+ D507                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1201+ D507 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1201+ D508 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1202+ D50B 23                   inc         hl
1203+ D50C                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1203+ D50C 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1203+ D50D 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1204+ D510 23                   inc         hl
1205+ D511                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1205+ D511 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1205+ D512 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1206+ D515 23                   inc         hl
1207+ D516              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1208+ D516              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1209+ D516 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1210+ D517 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1211+ D518 47                   ld          b,a
1212+ D519 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1213+ D51B 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1214+ D51E 78                   ld          a,b
1215+ D51F E6 40                and         $40
1216+ D521 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1217+ D523 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1218+ D526 78                   ld          a,b
1219+ D527 E6 20                and         $20
1220+ D529 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1221+ D52B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1222+ D52D 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1223+ D530 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1224+ D531 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1225+ D533 32 BB 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1226+ D536 C9                   ret
1227+ D537
1228+ D537              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1229+ D537              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1230+ D537              ;..............................................................................................................................
1231+ D537              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1232+ D537              LL48GetScale:
1233+ D537 3A 91 7D             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1234+ D53A 5F                   ld          e,a
1235+ D53B CD 07 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1236+ D53E              LL48GetVertices:
1237+ D53E              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1238+ D53E                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1238+ D53E BB          >                        cp      e
1238+ D53F DA 7C D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1239+ D542              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1240+ D542                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1240+ D542 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1240+ D543 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1240+ D544 32 A0 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1241+ D547 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1242+ D548 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1243+ D54A E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1244+ D54B                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1244+ D54B 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1244+ D54E ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1244+ D550 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1245+ D551 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1246+ D552                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1246+ D552 A7          >                        and     a
1246+ D553 C2 82 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1247+ D556              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1248+ D556 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1249+ D557 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1250+ D559 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1251+ D55B                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1251+ D55B A7          >                        and     a
1251+ D55C C2 82 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1252+ D55F              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1253+ D55F                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1253+ D55F 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1253+ D560 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1253+ D561 32 A0 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1254+ D564 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1255+ D565 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1256+ D567 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1257+ D568                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1257+ D568 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1257+ D56B ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1257+ D56D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1258+ D56E E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1259+ D56F                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1259+ D56F A7          >                        and     a
1259+ D570 C2 82 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1260+ D573              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1261+ D573 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1262+ D574 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1263+ D576 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1264+ D578                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1264+ D578 A7          >                        and     a
1264+ D579 C2 82 D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1265+ D57C              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1266+ D57C 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1267+ D57F FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1268+ D581                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1269+ D581 C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1270+ D582              NodeIsVisible:
1271+ D582              LL49:
1272+ D582 CD 29 D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1273+ D585 C9                   ret
1274+ D586
1275+ D586                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1276+ D586
1277+ D586              ProjectNodeToEye:
1278+ D586 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1279+ D58A 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1280+ D58B 32 9F 7E         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1281+ D58E 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1282+ D591 CD CF 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1283+ D594 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1284+ D597                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1284+ D597 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1284+ D599 C2 A4 D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1285+ D59C              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1286+ D59C 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1287+ D59E 26 00            ld          h,0
1288+ D5A0 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1289+ D5A1 C3 AB D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1290+ D5A4              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1291+ D5A4 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1292+ D5A6 26 00            ld          h,0
1293+ D5A8                  ClearCarryFlag
1293+ D5A8 B7          >                        or a
1294+ D5A9 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1295+ D5AB              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1296+ D5AB EB               ex          de,hl
1297+ D5AC FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1298+ D5AF FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1299+ D5B2              EyeProcessYPoint:
1300+ D5B2 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1301+ D5B6 79               ld          a,c
1302+ D5B7 32 9F 7E         ld          (varQ),a
1303+ D5BA 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1304+ D5BD CD CF 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1305+ D5C0 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1306+ D5C3                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1306+ D5C3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1306+ D5C5 C2 D0 D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1307+ D5C8              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1308+ D5C8 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1309+ D5CA                  ClearCarryFlag
1309+ D5CA B7          >                        or a
1310+ D5CB ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1311+ D5CD C3 D5 D5         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1312+ D5D0              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1313+ D5D0 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1314+ D5D2 26 00            ld          h,0
1315+ D5D4 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1316+ D5D5              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1317+ D5D5 EB               ex          de,hl
1318+ D5D6 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1319+ D5D9 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1320+ D5DC C9               ret
1321+ D5DD
1322+ D5DD
1323+ D5DD
1324+ D5DD              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1325+ D5DD              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1326+ D5DD              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1327+ D5DD              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1328+ D5DD              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1329+ D5DD              ; which can be simplified as:
1330+ D5DD              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1331+ D5DD              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1332+ D5DD              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1333+ D5DD              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1334+ D5DD              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1335+ D5DD              ;      Roll calculations:
1336+ D5DD              ;
1337+ D5DD              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1338+ D5DD              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1339+ D5DD              ;      Pitch calculations:
1340+ D5DD              ;
1341+ D5DD              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1342+ D5DD              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1343+ D5DD
1344+ D5DD
1345+ D5DD              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1346+ D5DD                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D5DD
   2++D5DD              ; Full version
   3++D5DD              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D5DD              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D5DD              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D5DD              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D5DD
   8++D5DD
   9++D5DD              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D5DD ~                                    push    bc
  11++D5DD ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D5DD ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D5DD ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D5DD ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D5DD ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D5DD ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D5DD ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D5DD ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D5DD ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D5DD ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D5DD ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D5DD ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D5DD ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D5DD ~                                    ret
  25++D5DD ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D5DD ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D5DD ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D5DD ~                                    or      a
  29++D5DD ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D5DD ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D5DD ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D5DD ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D5DD ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D5DD ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D5DD ~                                    ret
  36++D5DD ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D5DD ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D5DD ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D5DD ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D5DD ~                                    ret
  41++D5DD                                      ENDM
  42++D5DD
  43++D5DD
  44++D5DD              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D5DD C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D5DE 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D5DF 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D5E2 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D5E3 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D5E4 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D5E5 FA F6 D5    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D5E8             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D5E8 ED 5B A1 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D5EC 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D5EF 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D5F0 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D5F3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D5F4 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D5F5 C9          >                        ret
  44++D5F6             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D5F6 ED 5B A1 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D5FA 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D5FD B7          >                        or      a
  44++D5FE ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D600 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D602 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D603 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D606 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D608 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D609 C9          >                        ret
  44++D60A             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D60A AF          >                    xor a
  44++D60B 95          >                    sub l
  44++D60C 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D60D 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D60E 94          >                    sub h
  44++D60F 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D610 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D613 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D614 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D615 C9          >                        ret
  45++D616
  46++D616              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D616 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D617 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D618 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D61B 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D61C 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D61D A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D61E FA 2F D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D621             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D621 ED 5B A1 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D625 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D628 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D629 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D62C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D62D C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D62E C9          >                        ret
  46++D62F             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D62F ED 5B A1 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D633 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D636 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D637 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D639 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D63B 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D63C 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D63F EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D641 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D642 C9          >                        ret
  46++D643             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D643 AF          >                    xor a
  46++D644 95          >                    sub l
  46++D645 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D646 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D647 94          >                    sub h
  46++D648 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D649 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D64C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D64D C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D64E C9          >                        ret
  47++D64F
  48++D64F              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D64F C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D650 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D651 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D654 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D655 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D656 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D657 FA 68 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D65A             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D65A ED 5B A1 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D65E 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D661 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D662 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D665 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D666 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D667 C9          >                        ret
  48++D668             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D668 ED 5B A1 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D66C 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D66F B7          >                        or      a
  48++D670 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D672 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D674 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D675 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D678 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D67A C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D67B C9          >                        ret
  48++D67C             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D67C AF          >                    xor a
  48++D67D 95          >                    sub l
  48++D67E 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D67F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D680 94          >                    sub h
  48++D681 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D682 22 A1 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D685 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D686 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D687 C9          >                        ret
  49++D688
  50++D688              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D688 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D68B              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D68B              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D68B              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D68B
  56++D68B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D68B              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D68B 3A B9 7D     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D68E 21 AD 7D                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D691 B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D692 CA 4E D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D695                                      ;break
  63++D695              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  64++D695 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  65++D696 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  66++D699 CD 52 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  67++D69C 32 A2 7D                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  68++D69F 22 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  69++D6A2              ; A = Flip sign
  70++D6A2 3A BA 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  71++D6A5 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  72++D6A8 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  73++D6A9              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  74++D6A9 CD 16 D6                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  75++D6AC              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  76++D6AC 32 8A D6                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  77++D6AF 22 88 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  78++D6B2              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  79++D6B2 3A AD 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  80++D6B5 5F                                   ld      e,a
  81++D6B6 CD 52 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  82++D6B9 32 A2 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  83++D6BC 22 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
  84++D6BF              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  85++D6BF 3A 8A D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  86++D6C2 5F                                   ld      e,a
  87++D6C3 3A AE 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)
  88++D6C6 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  89++D6C7              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  90++D6C7 CD 4F D6                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
  91++D6CA 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
  92++D6CD 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
  93++D6D0              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
  94++D6D0 3A AD 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
  95++D6D3 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D6D4 CD 52 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
  97++D6D7 32 A2 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
  98++D6DA 22 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
  99++D6DD              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 100++D6DD 3A 8A D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 101++D6E0 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 102++D6E3 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 103++D6E4 3A AE 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 104++D6E7 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 105++D6E8 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 106++D6E9 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 107++D6EC AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 108++D6ED F2 FC D6                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 109++D6F0 2A A1 7D                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 110++D6F3 ED 5B 88 D6                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 111++D6F7 B7                                   or      a
 112++D6F8 19                                   add     hl,de
 113++D6F9 C3 16 D7                             jp      .MV44
 114++D6FC 2A 88 D6     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 115++D6FF ED 5B A1 7D                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 116++D703 B7                                   or      a
 117++D704 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 118++D706 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 119++D708                                      NegHL
 119++D708 AF          >                    xor a
 119++D709 95          >                    sub l
 119++D70A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 119++D70B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 119++D70C 94          >                    sub h
 119++D70D 67          >                    ld h,a
 120++D70E 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 121++D711 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122++D713 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 123++D716              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 124++D716 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 125++D719 3A B9 7D                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 126++D71C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 127++D71D 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 128++D720 CD 52 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 129++D723 32 A2 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 130++D726 22 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
 131++D729 3A BB 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 132++D72C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 133++D72D 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 134++D730 AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 135++D731 CD DD D5                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 136++D734 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 137++D737 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 138++D73A                                      ;break
 139++D73A                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 140++D73A                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 140++D73A             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 140++D73A 3A B8 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 140++D73D 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 140++D740             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 140++D740 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 140++D743 22 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D746             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 140++D746 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D749 32 A0 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 140++D74C 3A 36 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 140++D74F EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 140++D751 CD D7 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 140++D754 ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 140++D758             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 140++D758 2A 35 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D75B 22 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D75E 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 140++D761 CD D7 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 140++D764 ED 53 35 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 141++D768                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 141++D768             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 141++D768 3A B8 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 141++D76B 32 9F 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 141++D76E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 141++D76E 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 141++D771 22 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D774             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 141++D774 3A 29 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D777 32 A0 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 141++D77A 3A 2A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 141++D77D EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 141++D77F CD D7 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 141++D782 ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 141++D786             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 141++D786 2A 29 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D789 22 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D78C 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 141++D78F CD D7 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 141++D792 ED 53 29 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 142++D796                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 142++D796             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)

 145++D83E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 145++D83E 2A 33 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)

 145++D847 CD D7 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 145++D84A ED 53 33 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 146++D84E 3A 99 7E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 147++D851 16 00                                ld      d,0
 148++D853 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 149++D854 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 150++D857 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 151++D85A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 152++D85B 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 153++D85D CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 154++D860 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 155++D863 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 156++D866 C9                                   ret

   1++D867
   2++D867              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D867              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D867              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D867              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D867 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D867 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D867 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D867 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D867 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D867 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D867 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D867 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D867 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D867 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D867 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D867 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D867 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D867                                      ENDM
  20++D867
  21++D867              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D867 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D867 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D867 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D867 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D867 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D867 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D867 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D867 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D867 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D867 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D867 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D867 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D867 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D867 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D867                                      ENDM
  37++D867
  38++D867
  39++D867              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D867              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D867              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D867 3A 49 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)

  44++D86C 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes

  45++D875 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign

  45++D878 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D87B 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b

  45++D87E 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen

  55++D89E 22 87 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl

  57++D8A4 21 33 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D8A7 22 85 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D8AA 21 39 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D8AD 22 87 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D8B0 CD FF D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis

  64++D8B8 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis

  65++D8BD A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D8BE C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D8BF 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D8C0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D8C2 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D8C3 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D8C6 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D8C7 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D8C9 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen

  65++D8CD B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D8CE 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a

  67++D8D4 22 85 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D8D7 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D8DA 22 87 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D8DD CD FF D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D8E0 21 31 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D8E3 22 85 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D8E6 21 2B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D8E9 22 87 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D8EC CD FF D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D8EF 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D8F2 22 85 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D8F5 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D8F8 22 87 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D8FB CD FF D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D8FE C9                                   ret
  82++D8FF
  83++D8FF
  84++D8FF
  85++D8FF              ; Roate around axis
  86++D8FF              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D8FF              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D8FF              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D8FF              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D8FF              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D8FF              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D8FF              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D8FF              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D8FF              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D8FF 2A 85 7D     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D902 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D903 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D904 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D905 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D906 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D907 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D909 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D90B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D90C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D90E CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D910 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D911 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D913 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D914 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D915 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D918              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D918 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D919 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D91A 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D91D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D91E 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D921              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D921 2A 87 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D924 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D925 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D926 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D927 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D928 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D92A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D92C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D92D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D92F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D930                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D930 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D932 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D934                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D934 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D936 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D938                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D938 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D93A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D93C                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D93C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D93E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D940 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D943 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D945 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D947 B2                                   or      d
 136++D948 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D949              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D949              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D949              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D949              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D949 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D94A                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D94A              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D94A CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D94D E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D94E              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D94E              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D94E 2A 87 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D951 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D952 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D953 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D954 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D955 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D956 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D958 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D95A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D95B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D95D CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D95F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D960 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D962 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D963 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D964 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D967              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D967 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D968 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D969 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D96C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D96D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D96F 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D972              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D972 2A 85 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D975              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D975 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D976 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D977 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D978 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D979 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D97B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D97D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D97E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D980 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D981                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D981 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D983 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D985                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D985 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D987 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D989                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D989 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D98B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D98D                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D98D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D98F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D991 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D994 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D996 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D998 B2                                   or      d
 191++D999 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D99A              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D99A              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D99A              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D99A E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D99B              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D99B CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D99E              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D99E EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D99F 2A 87 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D9A2 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D9A3 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D9A4 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D9A5              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D9A5 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D9A6 2A 85 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D9A9 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D9AA 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D9AB 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D9AC C9                                   ret
 211++D9AD
 212++D9AD
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
1348+ D9AD                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipSpeed.asm"

  10++D9AD              ;                        ENDM
  11++D9AD
  12++D9AD

  16++D9B2 C8                                   ret     z
  17++D9B3 CB 27                                sla     a
  18++D9B5 CB 27                                sla     a

  20++D9B9              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign

  20++D9C4             >                        SignBitOnlyA

  20++D9C6 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  20++D9C7 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  20++D9C8 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0

  21++D9D6 32 20 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a
  21++D9D9 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+1),de
  22++D9DD              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY
