 279+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ld      (PlanetYsgn),a
 280+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ret
 281+ C31B
 282+ C31B
 283+ C31B                                 ;     include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
 284+ C31B
 285+ C31B 7C           SunADDHLDESignedv3:     ld      a,h
 286+ C31C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ C31E 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 288+ C31F AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 289+ C320                                      JumpIfNegative .SunADDHLDEOppSGN    ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 289+ C320 FA 3B C3    >                        jp		m, .SunADDHLDEOppSGN
 290+ C323 78           .SunADDHLDESameSigns:   ld      a,b
 291+ C324 B2                                   or      d
 292+ C325                                      JumpIfNegative .SunADDHLDESameNeg   ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 292+ C325 FA 2D C3    >                        jp		m, .SunADDHLDESameNeg
 293+ C328                                      JumpIfNegative .SunADDHLDESameNeg   ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 293+ C328 FA 2D C3    >                        jp		m, .SunADDHLDESameNeg
 294+ C32B 19                                   add     hl,de
 295+ C32C C9                                   ret
 296+ C32D 7C           .SunADDHLDESameNeg:     ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 297+ C32E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 298+ C330 67                                   ld      h,a
 299+ C331 7A                                   ld      a,d
 300+ C332 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 301+ C334 57                                   ld      d,a
 302+ C335 19                                   add     hl,de
 303+ C336 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 304+ C338 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 305+ C339 67                                   ld      h,a
 306+ C33A C9                                   ret
 307+ C33B 7C           .SunADDHLDEOppSGN:      ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 308+ C33C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 309+ C33E 67                                   ld      h,a
 310+ C33F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 311+ C340 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 312+ C342 57                                   ld      d,a
 313+ C343 B7                                   or      a
 314+ C344 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 315+ C346 38 04                                jr      c,.SunADDHLDEOppInvert
 316+ C348 78           .SunADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 317+ C349 B4                                   or      h
 318+ C34A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 319+ C34B C9                                   ret
 320+ C34C              .SunADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 320+ C34C AF          >                    xor a
 320+ C34D 95          >                    sub l
 320+ C34E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 320+ C34F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 320+ C350 94          >                    sub h
 320+ C351 67          >                    ld h,a
 321+ C352 78                                   ld      a,b
 322+ C353 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 323+ C355 B4                                   or      h
 324+ C356 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 325+ C357 C9                                   ret
 326+ C358
 327+ C358              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 328+ C358 7C           .SunSUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 329+ C359 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 330+ C35B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 331+ C35C AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 332+ C35D                                      JumpIfNegative .SunSUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 332+ C35D FA 8B C3    >                        jp		m, .SunSUBHLDEOppSGN
 333+ C360 78           .SunSUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 334+ C361 B2                                   or      d
 335+ C362                                      JumpIfNegative .SunSUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 335+ C362 FA 6C C3    >                        jp		m, .SunSUBHLDESameNeg
 336+ C365 B7                                   or      a
 337+ C366 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 338+ C368                                      JumpIfNegative .SunSUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 338+ C368 FA 7F C3    >                        jp		m, .SunSUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 339+ C36B C9                                   ret
 340+ C36C 7C           .SunSUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 341+ C36D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 342+ C36F 67                                   ld      h,a
 343+ C370 7A                                   ld      a,d
 344+ C371 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 345+ C373 57                                   ld      d,a
 346+ C374 B7                                   or      a
 347+ C375 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 348+ C377                                      JumpIfNegative .SunSUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 348+ C377 FA 7F C3    >                        jp		m, .SunSUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 349+ C37A 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 350+ C37B F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 351+ C37D 67                                   ld      h,a
 352+ C37E C9                                   ret
 353+ C37F              .SunSUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 353+ C37F AF          >                    xor a
 353+ C380 95          >                    sub l
 353+ C381 6F          >                    ld l,a
 353+ C382 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 353+ C383 94          >                    sub h
 353+ C384 67          >                    ld h,a
 354+ C385 78                                   ld      a,b
 355+ C386 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 356+ C388 B4                                   or      h
 357+ C389 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 358+ C38A C9                                   ret
 359+ C38B B7           .SunSUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 360+ C38C 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 361+ C38D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 362+ C38F 67                                   ld      h,a
 363+ C390 7A                                   ld      a,d
 364+ C391 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 365+ C393 57                                   ld      d,a
 366+ C394 19                                   add     hl,de
 367+ C395 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 368+ C396 B4                                   or      h
 369+ C397 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 370+ C398 C9                                   ret
 371+ C399
 372+ C399
 373+ C399              .SunSBCHLDESigned:      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.SunSBCHLDEhlNeg
 373+ C399 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 373+ C39B C2 AC C3    >                        jp      nz,.SunSBCHLDEhlNeg
 374+ C39E              .SunSBCHLDEhlPos:       JumpOnBitSet h,7,.SunSBCHLDEhlNeg
 374+ C39E CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 374+ C3A0 C2 AC C3    >                        jp      nz,.SunSBCHLDEhlNeg
 375+ C3A3 ED 52        .SunSBCHLDEhlPosDePos:  sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 376+ C3A5 C9                                   ret
 377+ C3A6 CB BA        .SunSBCHLDEhlPosDeNeg:  res     7,d
 378+ C3A8 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 379+ C3A9 CB FA                                set     7,d
 380+ C3AB C9                                   ret
 381+ C3AC CB BC        .SunSBCHLDEhlNeg:       res     7,h
 382+ C3AE                                      JumpOnBitSet d,7,.SunSBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 382+ C3AE CB 7A       >                        bit 	7,d
 382+ C3B0 C2 B8 C3    >                        jp      nz,.SunSBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg
 383+ C3B3 ED 52        .SunSBCHLDEhlNegdePos:  sbc     hl,de                       ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 384+ C3B5 CB FC                                set     7,h
 385+ C3B7 C9                                   ret
 386+ C3B8 CB BA        .SunSBCHLDEhlNegdeNeg:      res     7,d
 387+ C3BA 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO
 388+ C3BB CB FA                                set     7,d
 389+ C3BD CB FC                                set     7,h
 390+ C3BF C9                                   ret
 391+ C3C0

 393+ C3C0                                      include "./Universe/Sun/TransposeSunXX12BySunToSunXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/TransposeSunXX12BySunToSunXX15.asm
   1++C3C0              TransposeSXX12BySunToSXX15:
   2++C3C0 2A 7E C0                             ld		hl,(SBnKXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++C3C3 7C                                   ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++C3C4 E6 80                                and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++C3C6 47                                   ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++C3C7                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++C3C7 7C                                   ld      a,h
   8++C3C8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
   9++C3CA 67                                   ld      h,a
  10++C3CB                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++C3CB ED 5B 10 C0                          ld		de,(SBnKxlo)						;
  12++C3CF 3A 12 C0                             ld		a,(SBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++C3D2 E6 80                                and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++C3D4 4F                                   ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++C3D5 CD 2F 00                             call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++C3D8 B4                                   or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++C3D9 67                                   ld		h,a
  18++C3DA 22 78 C0                             ld		(SBnKXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++C3DD              ; ..................................
  20++C3DD 2A 80 C0                             ld		hl,(SBnKXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++C3E0 7C                                   ld		a,h
  22++C3E1 E6 80                                and		$80
  23++C3E3 47                                   ld		b,a
  24++C3E4                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++C3E4 7C                                   ld      a,h
  26++C3E5 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  27++C3E7 67                                   ld      h,a
  28++C3E8                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++C3E8 ED 5B 13 C0                          ld		de,(SBnKylo)
  30++C3EC 3A 15 C0                             ld		a,(SBnKysgn)
  31++C3EF E6 80                                and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++C3F1 4F                                   ld		c,a
  33++C3F2 CD 2F 00                             call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++C3F5 B4                                   or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++C3F6 67                                   ld		h,a
  36++C3F7 22 7A C0                             ld		(SBnKYScaled),hl
  37++C3FA              ; ..................................
  38++C3FA 2A 82 C0                             ld		hl,(SBnKXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++C3FD 7C                                   ld		a,h
  40++C3FE E6 80                                and		$80
  41++C400 47                                   ld		b,a
  42++C401                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++C401 7C                                   ld      a,h
  44++C402 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  45++C404 67                                   ld      h,a
  46++C405                                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++C405 ED 5B 16 C0                          ld		de,(SBnKzlo)
  48++C409 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(SBnKzsgn)
  49++C40C E6 80                                and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++C40E 4F                                   ld		c,a
  51++C40F CD 2F 00                             call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++C412 B4                                   or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++C413 67                                   ld		h,a
  54++C414 CB 7C                                bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++C416 20 16                                jr		nz,.ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++C418 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++C41A 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++C41C 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++C41D                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++C41D FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++C41F DA 2E C4    >                        jp		c, .ClampZto4
  60++C422 22 7C C0     .NoClampZto4:           ld		(SBnKZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  61++C425 7D                                   ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  62++C426 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a
  63++C429 7C                                   ld		a,h
  64++C42A 32 9E 7E                             ld      (varU),a
  65++C42D C9                                   ret
  66++C42E              ; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  67++C42E 21 04 00     .ClampZto4:             ld		hl,4
  68++C431 22 7C C0                             ld		(SBnKZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  69++C434 7D                                   ld		a,l
  70++C435 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  71++C438 7C                                   ld		a,h
  72++C439 32 9E 7E                             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  73++C43C C9                                   ret
  74++C43D
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/TransposeSunXX12BySunToSunXX15.asm

 396+ C43D ED 4B 7C C0  ScaleSunTo8Bit:			ld			bc,(SBnKZScaled)
 397+ C441 2A 78 C0                             ld			hl,(SBnKXScaled)
 398+ C444 ED 5B 7A C0                          ld			de,(SBnKYScaled)
 399+ C448 78           .SetABSbc:              ld			a,b
 400+ C449 DD 67                                ld			ixh,a
 401+ C44B E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 402+ C44D 47                                   ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
 403+ C44E 7C           .SetABShl:              ld			a,h
 404+ C44F DD 6F                                ld			ixl,a
 405+ C451 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 406+ C453 67                                   ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
 407+ C454 7A           .SetABSde:              ld			a,d
 408+ C455 FD 67                                ld			iyh,a
 409+ C457 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit
 410+ C459 57                                   ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
 411+ C45A 78           .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:   ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
 412+ C45B B4                                   or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
 413+ C45C B2                                   or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
 414+ C45D 28 0F                                jr          z,.ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 415+ C45F                                      ShiftHLRight1
 415+ C45F CB 3C       >			   srl h
 415+ C461 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 416+ C463                                      ShiftDERight1
 416+ C463 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 416+ C465 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 417+ C467                                      ShiftBCRight1
 417+ C467 CB 38       >			   srl b
 417+ C469 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 418+ C46B C3 5A C4                             jp          .ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
 419+ C46E              ; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
 420+ C46E DD 7C        .ScaleNodeDone:          ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
 421+ C470 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 422+ C472 B0                                   or			b
 423+ C473 47                                   ld			b,a
 424+ C474 DD 7D        .SignforHL:              ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
 425+ C476 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 426+ C478 B4                                   or			h
 427+ C479 67                                   ld			h,a
 428+ C47A FD 7C        .SignforDE:              ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
 429+ C47C E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit
 430+ C47E B2                                   or			d
 431+ C47F 57                                   ld			d,a
 432+ C480 ED 43 7C C0  .SignsDoneSaveResult:	ld			(SBnKZScaled),bc
 433+ C484 22 78 C0                             ld			(SBnKXScaled),hl
 434+ C487 ED 53 7A C0                          ld			(SBnKYScaled),de
 435+ C48B 78                                   ld			a,b
 436+ C48C 32 9E 7E                             ld			(varU),a
 437+ C48F 79                                   ld			a,c
 438+ C490 32 BB 7E                             ld			(varT),a
 439+ C493 C9                                   ret
 440+ C494
 441+ C494              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 442+ C494              ;;;;X = normal scale
 443+ C494              ;;;;ZtempHi = zhi
 444+ C494              ;;;;......................................................
 445+ C494              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 446+ C494              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90
 447+ C494              ;;;;     inc X
 448+ C494              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2
 449+ C494              ;;;;  Until ZtempHi = 0
 450+ C494              ;;;;......................................................
 451+ C494              ;-LL21---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 452+ C494              ;                        include "./Universe/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
 453+ C494              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 454+ C494
 455+ C494              ; Now we have
 456+ C494              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 457+ C494              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 458+ C494              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 459+ C494              ;
 460+ C494              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 461+ C494              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C494              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 463+ C494              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 464+ C494              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 465+ C494              ; Returns
 466+ C494              ;
 467+ C494              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 468+ C494              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 469+ C494              ;
 470+ C494              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 471+ C494              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 472+ C494              ;
 473+ C494              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 474+ C494              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 475+ C494
 476+ C494
 477+ C494               ; TESTEDOK
 478+ C494              SXX12DotOneRow:
 479+ C494              SXX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (SBnKXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regSunXX15fx /256
 479+ C494 3A 78 C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKXScaled)                        ;
 479+ C497 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 479+ C498 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 479+ C499 57          >                        ld      d,a
 479+ C49A ED 30       >                        mul
 479+ C49C 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 479+ C49D 32 BB 7E    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 480+ C4A0 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 481+ C4A1              SXX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 SBnKXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 481+ C4A1 3A 79 C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKXScaledSign)
 481+ C4A4 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 482+ C4A5 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 483+ C4A8 23                                   inc     hl
 484+ C4A9              SXX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(SBnKYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * SunXX15 /256 using varQ to hold regSunXX15fx
 484+ C4A9 3A 7A C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKYScaled)                        ;
 484+ C4AC 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 484+ C4AD 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 484+ C4AE 57          >                        ld      d,a
 484+ C4AF ED 30       >                        mul
 484+ C4B1 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 484+ C4B2 32 9F 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 485+ C4B5                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 485+ C4B5 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 485+ C4B8 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 486+ C4BB 23                                   inc     hl
 487+ C4BC                                      AequN1xorN2 SBnKYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 487+ C4BC 3A 7B C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKYScaledSign)
 487+ C4BF AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 488+ C4C0              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 489+ C4C0 E5           SSTequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 490+ C4C1 CD 5C 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 491+ C4C4 E1                                   pop     hl
 492+ C4C5 32 BB 7E                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 493+ C4C8 23                                   inc     hl
 494+ C4C9              SXX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(SBnKZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 494+ C4C9 3A 7C C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKZScaled)                        ;
 494+ C4CC 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 494+ C4CD 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 494+ C4CE 57          >                        ld      d,a
 494+ C4CF ED 30       >                        mul
 494+ C4D1 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 494+ C4D2 32 9F 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 495+ C4D5                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 495+ C4D5 3A BB 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 495+ C4D8 32 A0 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 496+ C4DB 23                                   inc     hl
 497+ C4DC                                      AequN1xorN2 SBnKZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 497+ C4DC 3A 7D C0    >                        ld      a,(SBnKZScaledSign)
 497+ C4DF AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 498+ C4E0              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 499+ C4E0 CD 5C 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 500+ C4E3              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 501+ C4E3 C9                                   ret
 502+ C4E4
 503+ C4E4
 504+ C4E4
 505+ C4E4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 506+ C4E4                                      include "./Universe/Sun/CopySunXX12ScaledToSunXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/CopySunXX12ScaledToSunXX18.asm
   1++C4E4              CopySXX12ScaledToSXX18:
   2++C4E4              CopyResultToSDrawCam:
   3++C4E4                      ldCopyByte SXX12         ,SXX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++C4E4 3A 7E C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12)
   3++C4E7 32 6C C0    >                        ld       (SXX18),a
   4++C4EA                      ldCopyByte SXX12+1       ,SXX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++C4EA 3A 7F C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12+1)
   4++C4ED 32 6E C0    >                        ld       (SXX18+2),a
   5++C4F0                      ldCopyByte SXX12+2       ,SXX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++C4F0 3A 80 C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12+2)
   5++C4F3 32 6F C0    >                        ld       (SXX18+3),a
   6++C4F6                      ldCopyByte SXX12+3       ,SXX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++C4F6 3A 81 C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12+3)
   6++C4F9 32 71 C0    >                        ld       (SXX18+5),a
   7++C4FC                      ldCopyByte SXX12+4       ,SXX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++C4FC 3A 82 C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12+4)
   7++C4FF 32 72 C0    >                        ld       (SXX18+6),a
   8++C502                      ldCopyByte SXX12+5       ,SXX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++C502 3A 83 C0    >                        ld       a,(SXX12+5)
   8++C505 32 74 C0    >                        ld       (SXX18+8),a
   9++C508 C9                   ret
  10++C509
# file closed: ././Universe/Sun/CopySunXX12ScaledToSunXX18.asm
 507+ C509              ;                        include "./Variables/CopySunXX12toSunXX15.asm"
 508+ C509              ;                       include "./Variables/CopySunXX18toSunXX15.asm"
 509+ C509              ;                       include "./Variables/CopySunXX18ScaledToSunXX15.asm"
 510+ C509              ;                       include "./Variables/CopySunXX12ToScaled.asm"
 511+ C509              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 512+ C509              ;                        include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12SunXX15.asm"
 513+ C509              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 514+ C509
 515+ C509 DD 25        ScaleDownSXX15byIXH:    dec     ixh
 516+ C50B F8                                   ret     m
 517+ C50C 21 78 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKXScaled
 518+ C50F CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; SunXX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 519+ C511 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at SunXX15 x sign now
 520+ C512 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at SunXX15 y Lo now
 521+ C513 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; SunXX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 522+ C515 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at SunXX15 y sign now
 523+ C516 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at SunXX15 z Lo now
 524+ C517 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 525+ C519 C3 09 C5                             jp      ScaleDownSXX15byIXH
 526+ C51C C9                                   ret
 527+ C51D
 528+ C51D 21 6C C0     DivideSXX18By2:         ld      hl,SBnKDrawCam0xLo
 529+ C520 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 530+ C522 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 531+ C523 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 532+ C524 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 533+ C526 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
 534+ C527 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 535+ C528 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 536+ C52A C9                                   ret
 537+ C52B
 538+ C52B              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 539+ C52B
 540+ C52B
 541+ C52B
 542+ C52B
 543+ C52B              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
 544+ C52B              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
 545+ C52B              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
 546+ C52B              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
 547+ C52B              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
 548+ C52B              ; which can be simplified as:
 549+ C52B              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 550+ C52B              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
 551+ C52B              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
 552+ C52B              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
 553+ C52B              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
 554+ C52B              ;      Roll calculations:
 555+ C52B              ;
 556+ C52B              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 557+ C52B              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 558+ C52B              ;      Pitch calculations:
 559+ C52B              ;
 560+ C52B              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 561+ C52B              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 562+ C52B
 563+ C52B
 564+ C52B                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Sun/SunApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Sun/SunApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++C52B
   2++C52B              ; Full version
   3++C52B              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++C52B              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++C52B              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++C52B              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++C52B
   8++C52B
   9++C52B
  10++C52B              ; SunrollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  11++C52B              ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
  12++C52B              ;  2. z = z + beta * K2
  13++C52B              ;  3. y = K2 - beta * z
  14++C52B              ;  4. x = x + alpha * y
  15++C52B              ;.... or
  16++C52B              ;  2. z = z + (beta * (y - alpha * x))
  17++C52B              ;  3. y = (y - alpha * x) - (beta * z)
  18++C52B              ;  4. x = x + (alpha * y)
  19++C52B
  20++C52B
  21++C52B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  22++C52B              ; Sun version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
  23++C52B              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
  24++C52B 00 00 00 00  SunAlphaMulX            DS 4
  25++C52F 00 00 00 00  SunAlphaMulY            DS 4
  26++C533 00 00 00 00  SunBetaMulZ             DS 4
  27++C537 00 00 00     SunK2                   DS 3
  28++C53A
  29++C53A 3A B8 7D     SunApplyMyRollAndPitch: ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  30++C53D 21 AB 7D                             ld      hl,BETA
  31++C540 B6                                   or      (hl)
  32++C541 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  33++C543 CA F4 C5                             jp      z,.NoRotation
  34++C546 3A B8 7D     .CalcAlphaMulX:         ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll magnitude
  35++C549 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -alpha (Q value)
  36++C54B 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
  37++C54C 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  38++C54F 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
  39++C550 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxhi)                ; .
  40++C553 CD E9 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * -alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
  41++C556              .SaveAlphaMulX:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  42++C556                                      ;ld      (SunAlphaMulX),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                   ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  43++C556 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
  44++C557 32 2C C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulX+1),a
  45++C55A 7B                                   ld      a,e
  46++C55B 32 2D C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulX+2),a
  47++C55E 7A                                   ld      a,d
  48++C55F 32 2E C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulX+3),a          ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256
  49++C562 ED 5B 14 C0  .CalcK2:                ld      de,(SBnKyhi)                ; DEL = Y
  50++C566 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKylo)                 ; .
  51++C569 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
  52++C56A ED 4B 2D C5                          ld      bc,(SunAlphaMulX+2)         ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result
  53++C56E 3A 2C C5                             ld      a,(SunAlphaMulX+1)          ; Deal with sign in byte 4
  54++C571 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; .
  55++C572 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = y - (alpha * x)
  56++C575 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; K2  = DEA = DEL = y - (alpha * x)
  57++C576 32 37 C5                             ld      (SunK2),a                   ; we also need to save l for teh beta k2 calc
  58++C579 ED 53 38 C5                          ld      (SunK2+1),de                ;
  59++C57D EB           .CalcBetaMulK2:         ex      de,hl                       ; HLE == DEA
  60++C57E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
  61++C57F 3A AB 7D                             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; D = BETA
  62++C582 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
  63++C583 CD E9 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = Beta * K2, DEL = Beta/256 * K2
  64++C586 ED 4B 17 C0  .CalcZ:                 ld      bc,(SBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
  65++C58A 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                 ;
  66++C58D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
  67++C58E CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL still = Beta * K2 so its z + Beta * K2
  68++C591 ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (SBnKzhi),de                ; z = resuklt
  69++C595 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
  70++C596 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a                 ; .
  71++C599 3A AB 7D     .CalcBetaZ:             ld      a,(BETA)
  72++C59C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -beta (Q value)
  73++C59E 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
  74++C59F 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z
  75++C5A2 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
  76++C5A3 2A 17 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKzhi)                ; .
  77++C5A6 CD E9 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * -beta, so DEL = Z * -beta / 256 where d = sign byte
  78++C5A9              .SaveAlphaMulZ:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  79++C5A9                                      ;ld      (SunBetaMulZ),a             ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                 ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  80++C5A9                                      ;ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  81++C5A9                                      ;ld      (SunBetaMulZ+1),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  82++C5A9                                      ;ld      a,e                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  83++C5A9                                      ;ld      (SunBetaMulZ+2),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  84++C5A9                                      ;ld      a,d                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  85++C5A9                                      ;ld      (SunBetaMulZ+3),a           ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
  86++C5A9 42 4B        .CalcY:                 ld      bc,de                       ; bch = - Beta * z
  87++C5AB 65                                   ld      h,l
  88++C5AC ED 5B 38 C5                          ld      de,(SunK2+1)                ; DEL = k2
  89++C5B0 3A 37 C5                             ld      a,(SunK2)
  90++C5B3 6F                                   ld      l,a
  91++C5B4 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
  92++C5B7 ED 53 14 C0                          ld      (SBnKyhi),de                ; y = DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
  93++C5BB 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
  94++C5BC 32 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),a                 ; .
  95++C5BF 3A B8 7D     .CalcAlphaMulY:         ld      a,(ALPHA)
  96++C5C2 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha (Q value)
  97++C5C3 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKylo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  98++C5C6 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
  99++C5C7 2A 14 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKyhi)                ; .
 100++C5CA CD E9 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
 101++C5CD 79           .SaveAlphaMulY:         ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign
 102++C5CE 32 2F C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulY),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result
 103++C5D1 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
 104++C5D2 32 30 C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulY+1),a
 105++C5D5 7B                                   ld      a,e
 106++C5D6 32 31 C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulY+2),a
 107++C5D9 7A                                   ld      a,d
 108++C5DA 32 32 C5                             ld      (SunAlphaMulY+3),a
 109++C5DD 42 4B        .CalcxPLusAlphaY:       ld      bc,de                        ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result Deal with sign in byte 4
 110++C5DF 65                                   ld      h,l                         ; .
 111++C5E0 ED 5B 11 C0                          ld      de,(SBnKxhi)                ; DEL = Y
 112++C5E4 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKxlo)                 ; .
 113++C5E7 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 114++C5E8 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = x + alpha * Y
 115++C5EB 7A           .SaveResult1:           ld      a,d                         ; Result 1 (X) = AHL + DEL
 116++C5EC 63                                   ld      h,e                         ;
 117++C5ED 32 12 C0     .CopyResultTo2:         ld      (SBnKxlo+2),a               ; .
 118++C5F0 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo) ,hl               ; .
 119++C5F3 C9                                   ret
 120++C5F4 3A 99 7E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 121++C5F7                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 121++C5F7 A7          >                        and     a
 121++C5F8 C8          >                        ret     z
 122++C5F9 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ;
 123++C5FB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 124++C5FC 06 80                                ld      b,$80                       ;
 125++C5FE ED 5B 17 C0                          ld      de,(SBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 126++C602 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                 ; .
 127++C605 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 128++C606 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 129++C609 ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (SBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 130++C60D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 131++C60E 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a                ;
 132++C611 C9                                   ret
 133++C612              ;
 134++C612              ;SunApplyMyRollAndPitch: ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 135++C612              ;                        ld      hl,BETA
 136++C612              ;                        or      (hl)
 137++C612              ;                        and     SignMask8Bit
 138++C612              ;                        ret     z
 139++C612              ;.CalcZ:                 ;break
 140++C612              ;                        ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll magnitude
 141++C612              ;                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; get Q = -alpha
 142++C612              ;                        ld      d,a                         ; d reg represents Q (abount to roll)
 143++C612              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 144++C612              ;                        ld      e,a                         ;
 145++C612              ;                        ld      hl,(SBnKxhi)                ;
 146++C612              ;                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * -alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 147++C612              ;                        ld      a,d
 148++C612              ;                        ld      (SunRollResultp4),a         ; save D (I guess we need the sign?)
 149++C612              ;.CalcYPlusDEL:          ld      a,(SBnKylo)                 ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo
 150++C612              ;                        ld      h,a
 151++C612              ;                        ld      bc,(SBnKyhi)
 152++C612              ;                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = Y - ( X *  alpha /256)
 153++C612              ;.SaveResult1:           ld      a,l                         ; SunPitchWork = DEL
 154++C612              ;                        ;ld      (SunRollResult), a          ; SunPitchWork + 0 = L
 155++C612              ;                        ex      de,hl                       ; SunPitchWork + 1 = E
 156++C612              ;.CopyResultTo2:         ld      (SunRollResult+1),a         ; SunPitchWork + 2 = D
 157++C612              ;                        ld      (SunRollResult+1) ,hl       ; Copy K to K2 (y - alpha * x)
 158++C612              ;                        ;ld      (SunRollResult2+1),hl       ; also HLA = result
 159++C612              ;                        ld      a,(SunRollResult)           ; .
 160++C612              ;                        ;ld      (SunRollResult2),a          ; .
 161++C612              ;.CalcY:                 ld      e,a                         ; so now HLE = result
 162++C612              ;                        ld      a,(BETA)                    ; get pitch
 163++C612              ;                        ld      d,a                         ; now D = BETA
 164++C612              ;                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = (y - alpha * x /256 ) * Beta
 165++C612              ;                        ld      bc,(SBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 166++C612              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKzlo)                 ;
 167++C612              ;                        ld      h,a                         ;
 168++C612              ;                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = z + ((y - alpha * x /256 ) * Beta) /256
 169++C612              ;.SaveZResult:           ld      (SunZResult+1),de           ; We now have a z result which we save
 170++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKzhi),de                ; .
 171++C612              ;                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 172++C612              ;                        ld      (SunZResult),a              ; .
 173++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKzlo),a                 ; .
 174++C612              ;.CalcMinusBetaMulZ:     ex      de,hl                       ; HLE = DEL = z post calculation
 175++C612              ;                        ld      e,l                         ;
 176++C612              ;                        ld      a,(BETA)                    ; d = - BETA
 177++C612              ;                        ld      d,a                         ;
 178++C612              ;                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ;
 179++C612              ;                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * - BETA
 180++C612              ;                        ld      bc, (SunRollResult+1)       ; BCH = (y - alpha * x) (or K2)
 181++C612              ;                        ld      a,(SunRollResult)           ;
 182++C612              ;                        ld      h,a                         ;
 183++C612              ;                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = (y - alpha * x) - (Z * BETA)
 184++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKyhi),de                ; y = (y - alpha * x) - (Z * BETA)
 185++C612              ;                        ld      a,l                         ;
 186++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKylo),a                 ;
 187++C612              ;.CalcX:                 ex      de,hl                       ; HLE = DEL = Y
 188++C612              ;                        ld      e,l                         ;
 189++C612              ;                        ld      a,(ALPHA)
 190++C612              ;                        ld      d,a                         ; D = alpha
 191++C612              ;                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = Y * alpha
 192++C612              ;                        ld      bc,(SBnKxhi)                ; BCH = x
 193++C612              ;                        ld      a,(SBnKxlo)                 ;
 194++C612              ;                        ld      h,a                         ;
 195++C612              ;                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = x + (alpha * y /256 )
 196++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKxhi),de                ; x = x + (alpha * y /256 )
 197++C612              ;                        ld      a,h                         ;
 198++C612              ;                        ld      (SBnKxlo),a                 ;
 199++C612              ;                        ret

 578+ C61E              ;
 579+ C61E              ;DIVD3B2 K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 580+ C61E
 581+ C61E 00 00 00 00  SunVarK                 DS 4
 582+ C622 00 00 00     SunVarP                 DS 3

 586+ C628 00           SunVarT                 DS 1
 587+ C629
 588+ C629              ; Optimisation
 589+ C629              ; if a <> 0
 590+ C629              ;       divide AH by CD
 591+ C629              ; if h <> 0
 592+ C629              ;      if c <> 0 return 0
 593+ C629              ;      else
 594+ C629              ;        divide HL by DE
 595+ C629              ; if l <>0
 596+ C629              ;      if c or d <> 0 return 0
 597+ C629              ;      else
 598+ C629              ;        divide l by e
 599+ C629              ;
 600+ C629 47           SunAHLequAHLDivCDE:     ld      b,a                         ; save a reg
 601+ C62A 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; check for divide by zero
 602+ C62B B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 603+ C62C B3                                   or      e                           ; .
 604+ C62D                                      JumpIfZero      .divideByZero       ; .
 604+ C62D CA 46 C6    >                        jp	z,.divideByZero
 605+ C630 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; get a back
 606+ C631                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideAHLbyCDE
 606+ C631 A7          >                        and     a
 606+ C632 C2 4D C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideAHLbyCDE
 607+ C635 7C           .AIsZero:               ld      a,h
 608+ C636                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideHLbyDE
 608+ C636 A7          >                        and     a
 608+ C637 C2 54 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideHLbyDE
 609+ C63A 7D           .HIsZero:               ld      a,l
 610+ C63B                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideLbyE
 610+ C63B A7          >                        and     a
 610+ C63C C2 63 C6    >                        jp	    nz,.divideLbyE
 611+ C63F              .resultIsZero:          ZeroA
 611+ C63F AF          >                        xor a
 612+ C640 67                                   ld      h,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 613+ C641 6F                                   ld      l,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 614+ C642 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 615+ C644                                      ClearCarryFlag
 615+ C644 B7          >                        or a
 616+ C645 C9                                   ret
 617+ C646 3E FF        .divideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 618+ C648 67                                   ld      h,a
 619+ C649 6F                                   ld      l,a
 620+ C64A 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 621+ C64C                                      SetCarryFlag
 621+ C64C 37          >                        scf
 622+ C64D              ; AHL = ahl/cde, this could be a genuine 24 bit divide
 623+ C64D              ; if AHL is large and cde small then the value will be big so will be off screen so we can risk 16 bit divide
 624+ C64D CD 30 8F     .divideAHLbyCDE:        call    Div24by24
 625+ C650 EB                                   ex      hl,de                         ; ahl is result
 626+ C651 79                                   ld      a,c                           ; ahl is result
 627+ C652                                      ClearCarryFlag
 627+ C652 B7          >                        or a
 628+ C653
 629+ C653 C9                                   ret
 630+ C654              ; AHL = 0hl/0de as A is zero
 631+ C654 79           .divideHLbyDE:          ld      a,c                         ;'if c = 0 then result must be zero
 632+ C655                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 632+ C655 A7          >                        and     a
 632+ C656 C2 3F C6    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 633+ C659 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 634+ C65B CD 5B 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                   ; BC = HL/DE
 635+ C65E 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 636+ C660                                      ZeroA                               ; so we can set A to Zero
 636+ C660 AF          >                        xor a
 637+ C661                                      ClearCarryFlag
 637+ C661 B7          >                        or a
 638+ C662 C9                                   ret
 639+ C663              ; AHL = 00l/00e as A and H are zero
 640+ C663 79           .divideLbyE:            ld      a,c                         ; if d = 0 then result must be zero
 641+ C664 B2                                   or      d
 642+ C665                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 642+ C665 A7          >                        and     a
 642+ C666 C2 3F C6    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 643+ C669 4B                                   ld      c,e
 644+ C66A 5D                                   ld      e,l
 645+ C66B CD 1D 95                             call    E_Div_C
 646+ C66E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 647+ C66F                                      ZeroA
 647+ C66F AF          >                        xor a
 648+ C670 67                                   ld      h,a
 649+ C671                                      ClearCarryFlag
 649+ C671 B7          >                        or a
 650+ C672 C9                                   ret
 651+ C673
 652+ C673
 653+ C673              ; Needs tuning for registers vs memroy
 654+ C673 22 22 C6     SunKEquAHLDivCDE:       ld      (SunVarP),hl
 655+ C676 32 24 C6                             ld      (SunVarP+2),a
 656+ C679 ED 53 25 C6                          ld      (SunVarQ),de
 657+ C67D 79                                   ld      a,c
 658+ C67E 32 27 C6                             ld      (SunVarS),a
 659+ C681 3A 22 C6     SunDivD3B:              ld      a,(SunVarP)                 ; Ensure P is at least 1
 660+ C684 F6 01                                or      1
 661+ C686 32 22 C6                             ld      (SunVarP),a
 662+ C689 3A 24 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)               ; T = Sign xor Sign
 663+ C68C 21 27 C6                             ld      hl,SunVarS
 664+ C68F AE                                   xor     (hl)
 665+ C690 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 666+ C692 32 28 C6                             ld      (SunVarT),a
 667+ C695 06 00                                ld      b,0                         ; b = y counter
 668+ C697 3A 24 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)               ; a = abs high byte of p
 669+ C69A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; .
 670+ C69C 2A 22 C6                             ld      hl,(SunVarP)                ; shift P left
 671+ C69F              .SunDVL9:               JumpIfAGTENusng   64, .SunDV14      ; if high p > 64 then go to DV14
 671+ C69F FE 40       >                        cp     64
 671+ C6A1 D2 AE C6    >                        jp		nc,.SunDV14
 672+ C6A4                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ;
 672+ C6A4 CB 25       >			   sla l
 672+ C6A6 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 673+ C6A8 CB 17                                rl      a                           ;
 674+ C6AA 04                                   inc     b                           ; increase shift count
 675+ C6AB C3 9F C6                             jp      .SunDVL9
 676+ C6AE 22 22 C6     .SunDV14:               ld      (SunVarP),hl                ; save off var P
 677+ C6B1 32 24 C6                             ld      (SunVarP+2),a
 678+ C6B4 3A 27 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarS)                 ; a= ABS varS
 679+ C6B7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 680+ C6B9 2A 25 C6                             ld      hl,(SunVarQ)                ; HL = vars Q & R
 681+ C6BC 05           .SunDVL6:               dec     b                           ; reduce b counter by 1
 682+ C6BD                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; varQRA  shift left
 682+ C6BD CB 25       >			   sla l
 682+ C6BF CB 14       >			   rl  h
 683+ C6C1 CB 17                                rl      a                           ;
 684+ C6C3 F2 BC C6                             jp      p, .SunDVL6                 ; keep shifting until bit 7 of a is set
 685+ C6C6 22 25 C6                             ld      (SunVarQ),hl                ; save QR
 686+ C6C9 32 27 C6     .SunDV9:                ld      (SunVarS),a                 ; save S
 687+ C6CC                                      ;ld      a,h
 688+ C6CC                                      ;ld      (varQ),a
 689+ C6CC 4F                                   ld      c,a
 690+ C6CD 3A 24 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarP+2)
 691+ C6D0 C5                                   push    bc                          ; save shift counter in b
 692+ C6D1 CD CF 94                             call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC
 693+ C6D4                                      ;call    RequAmul256divQ
 694+ C6D4 79                                   ld      a, c
 695+ C6D5 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 696+ C6D8 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrieve shift counter
 697+ C6D9 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; set K to 0
 698+ C6DC 22 1E C6                             ld      (SunVarK),hl                ; .
 699+ C6DF 22 20 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+2),hl              ; .
 700+ C6E2 CB 78                                bit     7,b                         ; is counter positive
 701+ C6E4 28 32                                jr      z,.SunDV12                  ; .
 702+ C6E6 3A A0 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ;
 703+ C6E9 CB 27        .SunDVL8:               sla     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 704+ C6EB 21 1F C6                             ld      hl,SunVarK+1                ; .
 705+ C6EE CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 706+ C6F0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 707+ C6F1 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 708+ C6F3 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 709+ C6F4 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 710+ C6F6 04                                   inc     b
 711+ C6F7 20 F0                                jr      nz,.SunDVL8                 ; loop until K is shifted
 712+ C6F9 32 1E C6                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 713+ C6FC 3A 21 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 714+ C6FF 21 28 C6                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 715+ C702 B6                                   or      (hl)
 716+ C703 32 21 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 717+ C706 C9                                   ret
 718+ C707 3A A0 7E     .SunDV13:               ld      a,(varR)                    ; when we get here, shift is zero
 719+ C70A 32 1E C6                             ld      (SunVarK),a
 720+ C70D 3A 21 C6                             ld      a,(SunVarK+3)
 721+ C710 21 28 C6                             ld      hl,SunVarT
 722+ C713 B6                                   or      (hl)
 723+ C714 32 21 C6                             ld      (SunVarK+3),a
 724+ C717 C9                                   ret
 725+ C718 78           .SunDV12:               ld      a,b
 726+ C719 A7                                   and     a
 727+ C71A 28 EB                                jr      z,.SunDV13

 729+ C71F CB 2F        .SunDVL10:              sra     a                           ; Shift K by 1 left
 730+ C721 05                                   dec     b
 731+ C722 20 FB                                jr      nz,.SunDVL10

 739+ C72E 47           SunProcessVertex:       ld      b,a                         ; save sign byte
 740+ C72F ED 5B 16 C0  .SunProjectToEye:       ld      de,(SBnKzlo)                ; X Pos = X / Z
 741+ C733 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ; CDE = z
 742+ C736 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 743+ C738                                      ClearSignBitA
 743+ C738 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 744+ C73A                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 745+ C73A              ;                        ld      c,a                         ;
 746+ C73A 5A                                   ld      e,d
 747+ C73B 57                                   ld      d,a
 748+ C73C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 749+ C73E                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256)
 750+ C73E 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; restore sign byte
 751+ C73F FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; save sign
 752+ C741                                      ClearSignBitA

 753+ C743 CD 29 C6                             call SunAHLequAHLDivCDE             ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 754+ C746              .CheckPosOnScreenX:     JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen         ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 754+ C746 A7          >                        and     a
 754+ C747 C2 64 C7    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 755+ C74A                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen      ; or bit 7 set of h
 755+ C74A 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 755+ C74B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 755+ C74D C2 64 C7    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 756+ C750 7C                                   ld      a,h
 757+ C751                                      ReturnIfAGTEusng 4                  ; if a > 1024 then its way too large regardless of sign
 757+ C751 FE 04       >                        cp    4
 757+ C753 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 758+ C754 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now deal with the sign
 759+ C756 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 760+ C758                                      SignBitOnlyA                        ; a= resultant sign
 760+ C758 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 761+ C75A 28 06                                jr      z,.calculatedVert           ; result is positive so we don't 2's compliment it
 762+ C75C              .XIsNegative:           NegHL                               ; make 2's c as negative
 762+ C75C AF          >                    xor a
 762+ C75D 95          >                    sub l
 762+ C75E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 762+ C75F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 762+ C760 94          >                    sub h
 762+ C761 67          >                    ld h,a
 763+ C762              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 763+ C762 B7          >                        or a
 764+ C763 C9                                   ret
 765+ C764 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 766+ C767 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 767+ C769 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 768+ C76B                                      SignBitOnlyA
 768+ C76B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 769+ C76D 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen

 771+ C770 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 772+ C771              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 772+ C771 37          >                        scf
 773+ C772 C9                                   ret

 776+ C773              ; .........................................................................................................................
 777+ C773              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 778+ C773 ED 4B 16 C0  SunCalculateRadius:     ld      bc,(SBnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 779+ C777 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ;
 780+ C77A 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 781+ C77B 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 782+ C77E CD FB 93                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 783+ C781 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 784+ C782                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 784+ C782 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 784+ C783 CA 88 C7    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 785+ C786 1E F8        .MaxRadius:             ld      e,248                       ;set radius to 248 as maxed out
 786+ C788 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 787+ C789 F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 788+ C78B 32 1D C6                             ld      (SunRadius),a               ; save a copy of radius now for later
 789+ C78E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 790+ C78F C9                                   ret
