 562+ CA1D
 563+ CA1D              ; PlanetProcessVertex AHL = X or Y position (sign in A)
 564+ CA1D              ;                     fetches z as this used in both calcs
 565+ CA1D 47           PlanetProcessVertex:    ld      b,a                         ; save sign/high byte
 566+ CA1E ED 5B 16 C0  .PlanetProjectToEye:    ld      de,(P_BnKzlo)               ; B H L   = X or Y
 567+ CA22 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)               ; IYH D E = z
 568+ CA25 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 569+ CA27                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A D E   = | z |
 569+ CA27 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 570+ CA29                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 571+ CA29 5A                                   ld      e,d                         ; C D E   = A D E * 256, i.e. 0 A D
 572+ CA2A 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 573+ CA2B 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ; .
 574+ CA2D                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256) to get +-256 rather than +- 1
 575+ CA2D 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; copy X or Y sign into iyl
 576+ CA2E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; .
 577+ CA30                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A H L = |X| (or |Y|)
 577+ CA30 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 578+ CA32 CD B4 C9                             call PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE          ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 579+ CA35 DA 94 CA                             jp      c,.IsOffScreen              ; carry flag indicates failure
 580+ CA38              .CheckPosOnScreen:      JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen       ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 580+ CA38 A7          >                        and     a
 580+ CA39 C2 94 CA    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 581+ CA3C                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen   ; or bit 7 set of h
 581+ CA3C 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 581+ CA3D E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 581+ CA3F C2 94 CA    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 582+ CA42 DD 7C        .CheckXorY:             ld      a,ixh
 583+ CA44                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ProcessYCoord
 583+ CA44 A7          >                        and     a
 583+ CA45 C2 6B CA    >                        jp	    nz,.ProcessYCoord
 584+ CA48              ; Handle X Coord offset
 585+ CA48 FD 7C        .ProcessXCoord:         ld      a,iyh                       ; determine if its + or - value of AHL/CDE
 586+ CA4A FD AD                                xor     iyl
 587+ CA4C E6 80                                and     $80
 588+ CA4E CA 57 CA                             jp      z,.ProcessXPositive
 589+ CA51              .ProcessXNegative:      macronegate16hl
 589+ CA51 AF          >					xor 	a
 589+ CA52 95          >					sub 	l
 589+ CA53 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 589+ CA54 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 589+ CA55 94          >					sub 	h
 589+ CA56 67          >					ld 		h,a
 590+ CA57 11 80 00     .ProcessXPositive:      ld      de,128
 591+ CA5A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 591+ CA5A B7          >                        or a
 592+ CA5B ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; now X position is CenterX+ (X / Z) in 2's c
 593+ CA5D 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ; set de to | hl for +/- 1024 check
 594+ CA5F F2 8C CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 595+ CA62                                      macronegate16de                     ; .
 595+ CA62 AF          >					xor 	a
 595+ CA63 93          >                    sub 	e
 595+ CA64 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 595+ CA65 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 595+ CA66 92          >                    sub 	d
 595+ CA67 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 596+ CA68 C3 8C CA                             jp      .CheckBoundaries            ; .
 597+ CA6B              ; Handle Y Coord offset
 598+ CA6B FD 7C        .ProcessYCoord:         ld      a,iyh
 599+ CA6D FD AD                                xor     iyl
 600+ CA6F E6 80                                and     $80
 601+ CA71 CA 7A CA                             jp      z,.ProcessYPositive
 602+ CA74              .ProcessYNegative:      macronegate16hl
 602+ CA74 AF          >					xor 	a
 602+ CA75 95          >					sub 	l
 602+ CA76 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 602+ CA77 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 602+ CA78 94          >					sub 	h
 602+ CA79 67          >					ld 		h,a
 603+ CA7A 11 40 00     .ProcessYPositive:      ld      de,64                       ; set hl to center Y and de to 2s'c Y/Z
 604+ CA7D EB                                   ex      de,hl
 605+ CA7E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 605+ CA7E B7          >                        or a
 606+ CA7F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now HL  position is CenterY - (Y / Z) in 2's c
 607+ CA81 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ;
 608+ CA83 F2 8C CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 609+ CA86                                      macronegate16de                     ; load DE with | result to simplify +-1024 check|
 609+ CA86 AF          >					xor 	a
 609+ CA87 93          >                    sub 	e
 609+ CA88 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 609+ CA89 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 609+ CA8A 92          >                    sub 	d
 609+ CA8B 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 610+ CA8C 7A           .CheckBoundaries:       ld      a,d
 611+ CA8D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 4, .IsOffScreen     ; if |position| > 1024 then way to large
 611+ CA8D FE 04       >                        cp     4
 611+ CA8F D2 94 CA    >                        jp		nc,.IsOffScreen
 612+ CA92              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 612+ CA92 B7          >                        or a
 613+ CA93 C9                                   ret
 614+ CA94 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 615+ CA97 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 616+ CA99 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 617+ CA9B                                      SignBitOnlyA
 617+ CA9B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 618+ CA9D 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 619+ CA9F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 620+ CAA0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 621+ CAA1              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 621+ CAA1 37          >                        scf
 622+ CAA2 C9                                   ret
 623+ CAA3
 624+ CAA3
 625+ CAA3              ; .........................................................................................................................
 626+ CAA3              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 627+ CAA3              ; calculates 24576/z, maxes at 248
 628+ CAA3 ED 4B 16 C0  PlanetCalculateRadius:  ld      bc,(P_BnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 629+ CAA7 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ;
 630+ CAAA 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 631+ CAAB 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 632+ CAAE CD FB 93                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 633+ CAB1 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 634+ CAB2                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 634+ CAB2 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 634+ CAB3 CA B9 CA    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 635+ CAB6 21 F8 00     .MaxRadius:             ld      hl,248                      ; set radius to 248 as maxed out
 636+ CAB9 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 637+ CABA F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 638+ CABC                                      DISPLAY "DONE - Eliiminate the check to see if planet radius is > 255 as its already fixed in Planet Calculate Radius"
 639+ CABC                                      ;ld      l,a                        ;
 640+ CABC                                      ;ld      (P_Radius),hl              ; save a copy of radius now for later
 641+ CABC 32 EB C0                             ld      (P_Radius),a
 642+ CABF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 643+ CAC0 16 08        .CalculateStep:         ld      d,8
 644+ CAC2                                      JumpIfALTNusng 8, .DoneStepCalc
 644+ CAC2 FE 08       >                        cp      8
 644+ CAC4 DA D0 CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 645+ CAC7 CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 646+ CAC9                                      JumpIfALTNusng 60, .DoneStepCalc
 646+ CAC9 FE 3C       >                        cp      60
 646+ CACB DA D0 CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 647+ CACE CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 648+ CAD0 7A           .DoneStepCalc:          ld      a,d
 649+ CAD1 32 A1 C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
 650+ CAD4 C9                                   ret
 651+ CAD5
 652+ CAD5              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 653+ CAD5 3A 12 C0     PlanetUpdateCompass:    ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 654+ CAD8 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 655+ CADB CD 1D CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 656+ CADE 22 19 C0                             ld      (P_CompassX),hl
 657+ CAE1 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 658+ CAE4 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 659+ CAE7 CD 1D CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 660+ CAEA 22 1B C0                             ld      (P_CompassY),hl
 661+ CAED C9                                   ret
 662+ CAEE
 663+ CAEE                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 664+ CAEE CD 68 C8     PlanetUpdateAndRender:  call    PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch    ; not needed for solid as yet
 665+ CAF1 3A 18 C0     .DrawSolidPlanet:       ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 666+ CAF4 A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 667+ CAF5 FA 44 CB                             jp      m,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; if its negative then behind so exit
 668+ CAF8              .TooFarAway:            JumpIfAGTENusng   48,.SkipDrawPlanet  ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 668+ CAF8 FE 30       >                        cp     48
 668+ CAFA D2 44 CB    >                        jp		nc,.SkipDrawPlanet
 669+ CAFD 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 670+ CB00 B6                                   or      (hl)                         ; .
 671+ CB01 CA 44 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; .
 672+ CB04              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 673+ CB04 CD FF C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet                ; Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 674+ CB07 CD A3 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 675+ CB0A                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 676+ CB0A                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 677+ CB0A 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 678+ CB0D ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 679+ CB11 3A EB C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 680+ CB14 A7                                   and     a
 681+ CB15 CA 44 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; skip 0 size
 682+ CB18 4F                                   ld      c,a
 683+ CB19 3A F4 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour1)
 684+ CB1C 47                                   ld      b,a
 685+ CB1D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 685+ CB1D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 686+ CB21 CD 95 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 687+ CB24                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng P_Radius, 5, .SkipDrawPlanet
 687+ CB24 3A EB C0    >                        ld      a,(P_Radius)
 687+ CB27 FE 05       >                        cp      5
 687+ CB29 DA 44 CB    >                        jp	  c,.SkipDrawPlanet
 688+ CB2C FE 05                                cp      5               ; radius < 3 means no atmosphere
 689+ CB2E 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; as a holds radius from Jump Macro
 690+ CB2F CA 44 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet
 691+ CB32 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX) ; just to test putting a rim there
 692+ CB35 ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 693+ CB39 3A F5 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour2)
 694+ CB3C 47                                   ld      b,a
 695+ CB3D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 695+ CB3D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 696+ CB41 CD 99 EC                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 697+ CB44 CD D5 CA     .SkipDrawPlanet:        call    PlanetUpdateCompass
 698+ CB47 C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 699+ CB48              ;
 700+ CB48              ; (PLS4)
 701+ CB48              ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 702+ CB48 3A 36 C0     CalcNoseSideArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 703+ CB4B EE 80                                xor     $80
 704+ CB4D 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 705+ CB50 3A 2A C0                             ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ + 1)
 706+ CB53 C3 61 CB                             jp      CalcArcTanPiPA
 707+ CB56              ;  CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 708+ CB56 3A 36 C0     CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 709+ CB59 EE 80                                xor     $80
 710+ CB5B 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 711+ CB5E 3A 30 C0                             ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ + 1)
 712+ CB61              ; CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 713+ CB61 32 9F 7E     CalcArcTanPiPA:         ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A
 714+ CB64 CD B7 91                             call    ARCTAN                      ; A = arctan(P / Q)
 715+ CB67 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; save a
 716+ CB68 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ+1)
 717+ CB6B E6 80                                and     $80
 718+ CB6D 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; restore a as it doesn't affect flags doing an ld
 719+ CB6E FA 73 CB                             jp      m,.SkipFlipSign             ; If nosev_z_hi is negativeleave the angle in A as a positive
 720+ CB71              ; Adds 128 to the result (rather than makes it negative)
 721+ CB71 EE 80        .FlipSign:              xor     $80                         ; If we get here then nosev_z_hi is positive, so flip bit 7 of the angle in A, which is the same as adding 128
 722+ CB73 CB 3F        .SkipFlipSign:          srl     a                           ; Set CNT2 = A / 4
 723+ CB75 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 724+ CB77 32 D5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; .
 725+ CB7A C9                                   ret
 726+ CB7B
 727+ CB7B              ; (PSL1)
 728+ CB7B              ; XX16 K2) = nosev_x / z
 729+ CB7B 2A 31 C0     CalcNoseXDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevX)
 730+ CB7E ED 5B 35 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 731+ CB82 C3 B4 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 732+ CB85 2A 33 C0     CalcNoseYDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevY)
 733+ CB88 ED 5B 35 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 734+ CB8C C3 B4 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 735+ CB8F 2A 2B C0     CalcRoofXDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 736+ CB92 ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 737+ CB96 C3 B4 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 738+ CB99 2A 2D C0     CalcRoofYDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 739+ CB9C ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 740+ CBA0 C3 B4 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 741+ CBA3 2A 25 C0     CalcSideXDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevX)
 742+ CBA6 ED 5B 29 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 743+ CBAA C3 B4 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 744+ CBAD 2A 27 C0     CalcSideYDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevY)
 745+ CBB0 ED 5B 29 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 746+ CBB4              ; (PLS1) (Y A) = nosev_x / z where B = Y (also stores in regY), K+3 = sign of calculation
 747+ CBB4              ; stores result in BC now as well
 748+ CBB4              ; does not do increment of X as its not needed when directly loading verticies of rotation
 749+ CBB4              CalcRotMatDivide:
 750+ CBB4 7B           .LoadDEtoQRS:           ld      a,e                         ; Q
 751+ CBB5 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
 752+ CBB8 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ;
 753+ CBB9 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ;
 754+ CBBB 32 A0 7E                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 755+ CBBE 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ;
 756+ CBBF E6 80                                and     $80                         ;
 757+ CBC1 32 A1 7E                             ld      (varS),a                    ;
 758+ CBC4 7D           .LoadHLtoP012:          ld      a,l                         ; set A P+1 P to (signnoseX) (|noseX|)
 759+ CBC5 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; set P to nosevX lo
 760+ CBC8 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; set P_1 to |nosevX hi|
 761+ CBC9 44                                   ld      b,h                         ; .
 762+ CBCA E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; .
 763+ CBCC 32 A1 7D                             ld      (varP+1),a                  ; .
 764+ CBCF 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; set a to sign nosevX
 765+ CBD0 E6 80                                and     $80
 766+ CBD2 32 A2 7D                             ld      (varP+2),a
 767+ CBD5 CD C4 92                             call    DVID3B                      ; call DVI3B2 variane where z is in de as 16 bit and needs expanding to 32
 768+ CBD8 3A B3 7E                             ld      a,(varK+1)                  ; get second byte into b
 769+ CBDB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; and also check to see if its
 770+ CBDC A7                                   and     a                           ; zero
 771+ CBDD 3A B2 7E                             ld      a,(varK)
 772+ CBE0 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; so now BC = result too
 773+ CBE1 CA E7 CB                             jp      z,.Skip254
 774+ CBE4 3E FE        .Force254Result:        ld      a,254                       ; if 2nd byte is non zero set a to 254 as our max 1 byte value to return
 775+ CBE6 4F                                   ld      c,a
 776+ CBE7 F5           .Skip254:               push    af
 777+ CBE8 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; if a is 0 then force sign to be +ve
 778+ CBE9 A7                                   and     a
 779+ CBEA C2 F3 CB                             jp      nz,.DoNotForceSign
 780+ CBED 32 8A 7D     .ForceSignPositive:     ld      (regY),a
 781+ CBF0 47                                   ld      b,a
 782+ CBF1 F1                                   pop     af
 783+ CBF2 C9                                   ret
 784+ CBF3 3A B5 7E     .DoNotForceSign:        ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; set b to sign (which was Y in 6502)
 785+ CBF6 32 8A 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 786+ CBF9 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; bc also is result as c was a copy of a
 787+ CBFA F1                                   pop     af                          ; so c doesn't need to be pushed to stack
 788+ CBFB C9                                   ret
 789+ CBFC
 790+ CBFC              ; (PLS3)
 791+ CBFC              ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 792+ CBFC 2A 2B C0     Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 793+ CBFF ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 794+ CC03 C3 0D CC                             jp      Calc222MulHLDivDE
 795+ CC06              ; (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 796+ CC06 2A 2D C0     Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 797+ CC09 ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 798+ CC0D              ; Optimise, move result at the end into HL instead of YA (we can ignore P)
 799+ CC0D CD B4 CB     Calc222MulHLDivDE:      call    CalcRotMatDivide            ; calculate (Y A) = nosev_x(orY) / z
 800+ CC10 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; P = |roofv_x / z|
 801+ CC11 1E DE                                ld      e,222                       ; LDA #222               \ Set Q = 222, the offset to the crater
 802+ CC13                                      ; Not needed                        ; STA Q
 803+ CC13                                      ; Not needed                        ; STX U                  \ Store the vector index X in U for retrieval after the  call to MULTU
 804+ CC13 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; call MULTU (unsigned multiply) de = 222 * |roofv_x / z|
 805+ CC15 3A B5 7E                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDY K+3                \ If the sign of the result in K+3 is positive, skip to
 806+ CC18 A7                                   and     a
 807+ CC19 F2 39 CC                             jp      p,.PL12                     ; BPL PL12               \ PL12 to return with Y = 0
 808+ CC1C 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                       ; LDY #&FF               \ Set Y = &FF to be a negative high byte
 809+ CC1E 32 8A 7D                             ld      (regY),a                    ; .
 810+ CC21 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
 811+ CC22                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise the result should be negative, so negate
 811+ CC22 AF          >					xor 	a
 811+ CC23 93          >                    sub 	e
 811+ CC24 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 811+ CC25 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 811+ CC26 92          >                    sub 	d
 811+ CC27 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 812+ CC28 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; now we have Y A P (with Y in b also)
 813+ CC29 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; .
 814+ CC2C 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; .
 815+ CC2D A7                                   and     a
 816+ CC2E CA 32 CC                             jp      z,.ForcePositive            ; if A is 0, special case to make +ve
 817+ CC31 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 818+ CC32              .ForcePositive:         ZeroA                               ; set regY and b to 0
 818+ CC32 AF          >                        xor a
 819+ CC33 32 8A 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 820+ CC36 47                                   ld      b,a
 821+ CC37 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; get d back into a again
 822+ CC38 C9                                   ret
 823+ CC39              .PL12:                  ZeroA                               ; set Y A P to be 0 D E from mul
 823+ CC39 AF          >                        xor a
 824+ CC3A 47                                   ld      b,a
 825+ CC3B 32 8A 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 826+ CC3E 7B                                   ld      a,e
 827+ CC3F 32 A0 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 828+ CC42 7A                                   ld      a,d
 829+ CC43 C9                                   ret
 830+ CC44
 831+ CC44
 832+ CC44              ; K3(1 0) = (Y A) + K3(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 833+ CC44 6F           CalcCraterCenterX:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 834+ CC45 3A 8A 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 835+ CC48 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 836+ CC49 ED 5B C6 7E                          ld      de,(varK3)                  ; de = K3 [ 1 0 ]
 837+ CC4D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 837+ CC4D B7          >                        or a
 838+ CC4E ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 839+ CC50 22 C6 7E                             ld      (varK3),hl                  ; K3[1 0] = hl + de
 840+ CC53 C9                                   ret
 841+ CC54
 842+ CC54              ; K4(1 0) = (Y A) - K4(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 843+ CC54 6F           CalcCraterCenterY:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 844+ CC55 3A 8A 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 845+ CC58 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 846+ CC59 ED 5B CC 7E                          ld      de,(varK4)                  ; de = K4 [ 1 0 ]
 847+ CC5D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 847+ CC5D B7          >                        or a
 848+ CC5E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 849+ CC60 22 CC 7E                             ld      (varK4),hl                  ; K4[1 0] = hl + de
 850+ CC63 C9                                   ret
 851+ CC64
 852+ CC64 CB 7C        TwosCompToLeadingSign:  bit     7,h
 853+ CC66 C8                                   ret     z
 854+ CC67                                      macronegate16hl
 854+ CC67 AF          >					xor 	a
 854+ CC68 95          >					sub 	l
 854+ CC69 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 854+ CC6A 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 854+ CC6B 94          >					sub 	h
 854+ CC6C 67          >					ld 		h,a
 855+ CC6D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 856+ CC6E F6 80                                or      $80
 857+ CC70 67                                   ld      h,a
 858+ CC71 C9                                   ret
 859+ CC72
 860+ CC72 CB 7C        LeadingSignToTwosComp:  bit     7,h
 861+ CC74 C8                                   ret     z
 862+ CC75 7C                                   ld      a,h
 863+ CC76 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 864+ CC78 67                                   ld      h,a
 865+ CC79                                      macronegate16hl
 865+ CC79 AF          >					xor 	a
 865+ CC7A 95          >					sub 	l
 865+ CC7B 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 865+ CC7C 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 865+ CC7D 94          >					sub 	h
 865+ CC7E 67          >					ld 		h,a
 866+ CC7F C9                                   ret
 867+ CC80
 868+ CC80              ;-- bc = bc * P_radius where bc = S.Fraction ,e.g nosex/nosey
 869+ CC80 3A EB C0     P_BCmulRadius:          ld      a,(P_Radius)                ; we probably don't have radius already
 870+ CC83 57           P_BCmulRadiusInA:       ld      d,a                         ; d = radius already in a
 871+ CC84 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; e = c (as we only hold 0.8 in bc, i.e. fractional +/- > 0)
 872+ CC85 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; mulitply raidus by c which will be fractional  generating a 8.X value)
 873+ CC87 4A                                   ld      c,d                         ; we only want the whole number, preserving sign in b
 874+ CC88 C9                                   ret
 875+ CC89
 876+ CC89                 ; DEFINE  PlanetDebugLocal 1
 877+ CC89              PlanetDraw:             IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
 878+ CC89 ~                                            call    TestBLINE
 879+ CC89                                      ENDIF
 880+ CC89                                      IFDEF TESTMERIDIAN
 881+ CC89 ~                                            call    TestMeridian
 882+ CC89                                      ENDIF
 883+ CC89                                      IFDEF PlanetDebugLocal
 884+ CC89 ~                                            ZeroA
 885+ CC89 ~                                            ; x 500, y 50, z 2000: 500/7,50/7 =>71,7 => 199,71 Yes
 886+ CC89 ~                                            ; radius becomes 24576/2000 = 12 (13 is good enough yes)
 887+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 888+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 889+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a
 890+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl, 0
 891+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxlo),hl
 892+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,0
 893+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKylo),hl
 894+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl, 1500
 895+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl
 896+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,$C800
 897+ CC89 ~                                            ld      bc,6144
 898+ CC89 ~                                            ld      de,0
 899+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevX),bc
 900+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevY),de
 901+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ),hl
 902+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvX),de
 903+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvY),hl
 904+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ),bc
 905+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,18432
 906+ CC89 ~                                            ld      bc,$9800
 907+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevX),hl
 908+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevY),de
 909+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ),bc
 910+ CC89 ~            ;                                ld      hl, 230
 911+ CC89 ~            ;                                ld      de,100
 912+ CC89 ~            ;                                ld      c,200
 913+ CC89 ~            ;                                ld      b,$FF
 914+ CC89 ~                                            call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 915+ CC89 ~                                            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 916+ CC89 ~
 917+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 918+ CC89 ~                                            ld      de,(P_centreY)
 919+ CC89 ~                                            ld      a,(P_Radius)
 920+ CC89 ~                                            ld      c,a
 921+ CC89 ~                                            ld      b,$FF
 922+ CC89 ~                                            MMUSelectLayer2
 923+ CC89 ~                                            break
 924+ CC89 ~                                            call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 925+ CC89 ~                                            break
 926+ CC89 ~            .DebugMeridian1:                xor     a
 927+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
 928+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 928+ CC89 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 928+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 929+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)
 929+ CC89 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 929+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 930+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 931+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 931+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 931+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
 932+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
 932+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 932+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
 933+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcRoofXDivRoofZ
 933+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 933+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 934+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ
 934+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 934+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
 935+ CC89 ~                                            break
 936+ CC89 ~
 937+ CC89 ~                                            break
 938+ CC89 ~                                            call    DrawMeridian
 939+ CC89 ~                                            break
 940+ CC89 ~            .DebugMeridian2:                xor     a
 941+ CC89 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
 942+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 942+ CC89 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 942+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 943+ CC89 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)
 943+ CC89 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 943+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
 944+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 945+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 945+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 945+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
 946+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
 946+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 946+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
 947+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
 947+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 947+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 948+ CC89 ~                                            call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
 948+ CC89 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
 948+ CC89 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
 949+ CC89 ~                                            break
 950+ CC89 ~                                            call    DrawMeridian
 951+ CC89 ~                                            break
 952+ CC89 ~                                            break
 953+ CC89 ~
 954+ CC89 ~
 955+ CC89                                      ENDIF
 956+ CC89 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 957+ CC8C A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 958+ CC8D F8                                   ret     m                           ; if its negative then behind so exit
 959+ CC8E              .TooFarAway:            ReturnIfAGTEusng   48               ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 959+ CC8E FE 30       >                        cp    48
 959+ CC90 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 960+ CC91 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 961+ CC94 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 962+ CC95 C8                                   ret     z                           ; .
 963+ CC96              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 964+ CC96 CD FF C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 965+ CC99 D8                                   ret     c                           ; If the C flag is set by PROJ then the planet/sun is  not visible on-screen, so return
 966+ CC9A CD A3 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 967+ CC9D                              IFDEF   PLANETSARESOLID
 968+ CC9D                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 969+ CC9D                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 970+ CC9D 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 971+ CCA0 ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 972+ CCA4 3A EB C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 973+ CCA7 4F                                   ld      c,a
 974+ CCA8 06 CF                                ld      b,$CF
 975+ CCAA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 975+ CCAA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 976+ CCAE CD 95 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 977+ CCB1 C9                                   ret
 978+ CCB2
 979+ CCB2                              ELSE
 980+ CCB2 ~
 981+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: calculate STP step based on planet size"
 982+ CCB2 ~            ; Note we don't to the planet type check as hitting here its always a planet
 983+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:set color green"
 984+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:draw circle (do we draw solid??)"
 985+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 986+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      de,(P_centreY)
 987+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      a,(P_Radius)
 988+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      c,a
 989+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      b,$FF
 990+ CCB2 ~                                    MMUSelectLayer2
 991+ CCB2 ~                                    call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 992+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Add check to see if on screen rather than checkign clipped Circle"
 993+ CCB2 ~                                    ;ret     c                           ; circle failure means exit
 994+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "DONE: REmoved check for Planet Radius high as its already done win calculate radius"
 995+ CCB2 ~                                    ;ReturnIfMemNotZero    P_RadiusHigh   ; if planet raidus < 256 draw meridians or craters
 996+ CCB2 ~            .DrawFeatures:          ;ld      a,(P_RadiusHigh)
 997+ CCB2 ~                                    ;and     a
 998+ CCB2 ~                                    ;ret     nz
 999+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Need logic to generate Planet Type"
1000+ CCB2 ~            .DetermineFeature:      ld      a,(P_BnKShipType)
1001+ CCB2 ~                                    cp      PlanetTypeMeridian
1002+ CCB2 ~                                    jp      nz,DrawPlanetCrater
1003+ CCB2 ~            DrawPlanetMeridian:     ld      a,(P_Radius)                 ; we only pull low byte as that is all we are interested in
1004+ CCB2 ~            .MinSizeCheck:          ReturnIfALTNusng PlanetMinRadius
1005+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
1005+ CCB2 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1005+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1006+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1006+ CCB2 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1006+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1007+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1008+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1008+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1008+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1009+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1009+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1009+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1010+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcRoofXDivRoofZ
1010+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1010+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1011+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ
1011+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1011+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1012+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1013+ CCB2 ~                                    xor     a
1014+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1015+ CCB2 ~                                    call    DrawMeridian                ;--- Drawn first Meridian
1016+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Debug whilst sorting meridain"
1017+ CCB2 ~                                    ret
1018+ CCB2 ~            ;--- Start Second Meridian
1019+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)       ; Set P = -nosev_z_hi
1020+ CCB2 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
1021+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (varP),a                    ; .
1022+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseSideArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1023+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
1023+ CCB2 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1023+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1024+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1024+ CCB2 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1024+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1025+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1026+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1026+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1026+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1027+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1027+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1027+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1028+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
1028+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1028+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1029+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
1029+ CCB2 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1029+ CCB2 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1030+ CCB2 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1031+ CCB2 ~                                    xor     a
1032+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1033+ CCB2 ~                                    jp      DrawMeridian
1034+ CCB2 ~                                    ; implicit ret
1035+ CCB2 ~            DrawPlanetCrater:       ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ+1)      ; a= roofz hi
1036+ CCB2 ~                                    and     a                           ; if its negative, crater is on far size of planet
1037+ CCB2 ~                                    ret     m                           ; .
1038+ CCB2 ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1039+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterX           ;  222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
1040+ CCB2 ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1041+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterY           ;  222 * roofv_y / z - y-coordinate of planet centre
1042+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ           ;  (Y A) = nosev_x / z
1043+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ           ; (XX16+1 K2+1) = nosev_y / z
1044+ CCB2 ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ           ;  (Y A) = sidev_y / z
1045+ CCB2 ~                                    srl     a                           ; Set (XX16+3 K2+3) = (Y A) / 2
1046+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (varK2+3),a                 ; .
1047+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      a,(regY)                    ; (which is also in b to optimise later)
1048+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (P_XX16+3),a                 ;
1049+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      a,64                        ; Set TGT = 64, so we draw a full ellipse in the call to PLS22 below
1050+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKTGT),a
1051+ CCB2 ~                                    ZeroA
1052+ CCB2 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; Set CNT2 = 0 as we are drawing a full ellipse, so we don't need to apply an offset
1053+ CCB2 ~                                    jp      DrawElipse
1054+ CCB2                              ENDIF
1055+ CCB2
1056+ CCB2
1057+ CCB2              ;PLS2                                                   Test
1058+ CCB2              ; K[10] = radius                                        $0000?
1059+ CCB2              ; k3[10], K4[10] X, y pixel of centre
1060+ CCB2              ; (XX16, K2), (XX16+1,K2+1) u_x , u_y                   $1F80  $FE80
1061+ CCB2              ; (XX16+2, K2+2), (XX16+3,K2+3) z_x , z_y               $0000  $0000
1062+ CCB2              ; TGT - target segment count                            $00
1063+ CCB2              ; CNT2 - starting segment                               $0D
1064+ CCB2              ; Now uses (Word) P_BnKCx, Cy, (Byte) Ux, Uy, Vx, Vy
1065+ CCB2                                      DISPLAY "TODO move code back in that was pulled outof BLINE"
1066+ CCB2 3E 3F        DrawMeridian:           ld      a,63                        ; Set TGT = 31, so we only draw half an ellipse
1067+ CCB4 32 A0 C0                             ld      (P_BnKTGT),a                ; and fall into DrawElipse
1068+ CCB7                                      DISPLAY "TODO DEBUG STP Default of 1"
1069+ CCB7 3E 01                                ld      a,1
1070+ CCB9 32 A1 C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
1071+ CCBC              ;PLS22
1072+ CCBC                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Sort out sign byte for uxuy vxvy in calling code"
1073+ CCBC              ; Set counter to 0 and reset flags--------------------------
1074+ CCBC              DrawElipse:
1075+ CCBC              .Initialise:            ZeroA
1075+ CCBC AF          >                        xor a
1076+ CCBD 32 D4 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a                ; Set CNT = 0
1077+ CCC0 32 8E C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a
1078+ CCC3 32 90 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a
1079+ CCC6 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; for debugging later we will just use the cos and sin signs above
1080+ CCC9 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; .
1081+ CCCC 32 9A C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; .
1082+ CCCF 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; .
1083+ CCD2 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; .
1084+ CCD5 32 99 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; .
1085+ CCD8 3D                                   dec     a
1086+ CCD9 32 D7 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a               ; Set FLAG = &FF to reset the ball line heap in the call to the BLINE routine below
1087+ CCDC              .PLL4:                  ;break
1088+ CCDC 3A D5 C0     .GetSinAngle:           ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set angle = CNT2 mod 32 (was regX)
1089+ CCDF E6 1F                                and     31                          ;
1090+ CCE1              ; Caclulate Sin(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1091+ CCE1 32 9F C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So P_BnKAngle is the starting segment, reduced to the range 0 to 32, so as there are 64 segments in the circle, this
1092+ CCE4 CD 7D 91     .CalculateSinCNT2:      call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(angle)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
1093+ CCE7 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1094+ CCEA 32 8D C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1095+ CCED              ; calculate BnKVxSin = VX*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1096+ CCED 3A 89 C0     .GetVxSin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVx)                 ; Set A = K2+2 = |v_x|
1097+ CCF0 CD CE 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; R = A * Q / 256 = |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1098+ CCF3 32 95 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSin),a              ; now varR = vx*sin(CNT2)
1099+ CCF6              ; calculate BnkVySin = Vy*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1100+ CCF6 3A 8B C0     .GetVySin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVy)                 ; Set A = K2+3 = |v_y|
1101+ CCF9 CD CE 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set varK = A * Q / 256 = |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1102+ CCFC 32 97 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySin),a              ;
1103+ CCFF              ; Now work sign of vx and vy * sin -------------------------; In 6502 below, in z80 C flag is reversed
1104+ CCFF 3A D5 C0     .CalcVxVyMulSinSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If CNT2 >= 33 then this sets the C flag, else clear : C is clear if the segment starts in the first half of the circle, 0 to 180 degrees
1105+ CD02 FE 21                                cp      33                          ;                                                       C is set if the segment starts in the second half of the circle, 180 to 360 degrees
1106+ CD04 DA 15 CD                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeSin          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1107+ CD07 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1108+ CD09 32 8E C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1109+ CD0C 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1110+ CD0F 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1111+ CD12 32 99 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; |v_x/y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1112+ CD15              .NoSignChangeSin:
1113+ CD15              ; calculate cos(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1114+ CD15 3A D5 C0     .CalculateCosCNT2:      ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set X = (CNT2 + 16) mod 32
1115+ CD18 C6 10                                add     a, 16                       ; .
1116+ CD1A E6 1F                                and     31                          ; .
1117+ CD1C 32 9F C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So we can use X as a lookup index into the SNE table to get the cosine (as there are 16 segments in a  quarter-circle)
1118+ CD1F CD 7D 91                             call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin((CNT2 + 16) mod 32) = |cos(CNT2)|
1119+ CD22 32 9F 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1120+ CD25 32 8F C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1121+ CD28              ; calculate Uy*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1122+ CD28 3A 87 C0     .GetUyCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUy)                 ; Set A = K2+1 = |u_y|
1123+ CD2B CD CE 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUyCos(wasK+2) = A * Q / 256 = |u_y| * |cos(CNT2)|
1124+ CD2E 32 93 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCos),a              ; .
1125+ CD31              ; calculate Ux*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1126+ CD31 3A 85 C0     .GetUxCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUx)                 ; Set A = K2 = |u_x|
1127+ CD34 CD CE 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUxCos(wasP) = A * Q / 256 = |u_x| * |cos(CNT2)| also sets the C flag, so in the following, ADC #15 adds 16 rather than 15 (use use non carry add)
1128+ CD37 32 91 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCos),a              ; .
1129+ CD3A              ; now work out sign for cos CNT2----------------------------;
1130+ CD3A 3A D5 C0     .CalcUxUyMulCosSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If (CNT2 + 16) mod 64 >= 33 then this sets the C flag,
1131+ CD3D C6 10                                add     a,16                        ; otherwise it's clear, so this means that:
1132+ CD3F E6 3F                                and     63                          ; .
1133+ CD41 FE 21                                cp      33                          ; c is clear if the segment is 0 to 90 or 270 to 360, we need
1134+ CD43 DA 54 CD                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeCos          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1135+ CD46 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1136+ CD48 32 90 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1137+ CD4B 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1138+ CD4E 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1139+ CD51 32 9A C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1140+ CD54              .NoSignChangeCos:
1141+ CD54              ; calculate Ux*cos + vx*sin---------------------------------;
1142+ CD54 3A 8E C0     .CalcSignOfVxMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1143+ CD57 21 8A C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVxSign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1144+ CD5A AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1145+ CD5B E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1146+ CD5D 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1147+ CD60 3A 90 C0     .CalcSignOfUxMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1148+ CD63 21 86 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUxSign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1149+ CD66 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1150+ CD67 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1151+ CD69 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1152+ CD6C 2A 91 C0     .AddUxCosVxSin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUxCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1153+ CD6F ED 5B 95 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVxSin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1154+ CD73 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1155+ CD76 22 9B C0     .DoneAddUxCosVxSin:     ld      (P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin),hl     ;
1156+ CD79              ; calculate -(Uy*cos - vy*sin)------------------------------;
1157+ CD79 3A 8E C0     .CalcSignOfVyMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1158+ CD7C 21 8C C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVySign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1159+ CD7F AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1160+ CD80 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1161+ CD82 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1162+ CD85 3A 90 C0     .CalcSignOfUyMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1163+ CD88 21 88 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUySign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1164+ CD8B AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1165+ CD8C E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1166+ CD8E 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1167+ CD91 2A 93 C0     .AddUyCosVySin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUyCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1168+ CD94 ED 5B 97 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVySin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1169+ CD98 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1170+ CD9B 22 9D C0     .DoneAddUyCosVySin:     ld      (P_BnKUyCosSubVySin),hl     ;
1171+ CD9E              ; Calculate NewXPos = Centrey - Uy cos - vy cos (which we still have in hl)
1172+ CD9E              .PL42:
1173+ CD9E ED 5B 83 C0  .CalcNewYPos:           ld      de, (P_BnKCy)               ; Hl is already in HL so de =  Cx
1174+ CDA2 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; swap round so we can do hl + de where de is already negated to effect a subtract (probabyl don't don't need this)
1175+ CDA3 7A                                   ld      a,d
1176+ CDA4 EE 80                                xor     $80                         ; now flip bit as its a subtract not add
1177+ CDA6 57                                   ld      d,a
1178+ CDA7 CD D6 CD                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1179+ CDAA CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cy - ( uy Cos + vy sin)
1180+ CDAD 22 F2 C0                             ld      (P_NewYPos),hl              ; load to new Y Pos
1181+ CDB0 2A 81 C0     .CalcNewXPos:           ld      hl,(P_BnKCx)
1182+ CDB3 ED 5B 9B C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin)
1183+ CDB7 CD D6 CD                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1184+ CDBA CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cx - ( ux Cos + vx sin)
1185+ CDBD 22 F0 C0                             ld      (P_NewXPos),hl
1186+ CDC0 CD FB CD     .PL43:                  call    BLINE                       ; hl = TX  draw this segment, updates CNT in A
1187+ CDC3                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng P_BnKTGT        ; If CNT > TGT then jump to PL40 to stop drawing the ellipse (which is how we draw half-ellipses)
1187+ CDC3 21 A0 C0    >                        ld      hl,P_BnKTGT
1187+ CDC6 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
1187+ CDC7 D0          >                        ret	    nc
1188+ CDC8 3A D5 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set CNT2 = (CNT2 + STP) mod 64
1189+ CDCB 21 A1 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP                 ; .
1190+ CDCE 86                                   add     a,(hl)                      ; .
1191+ CDCF 32 D5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a               ; .
1192+ CDD2 C3 DC CC                             jp      .PLL4                       ; Jump back to PLL4 to draw the next segment
1193+ CDD5 C9           .PL40:                  ret
1194+ CDD6
1195+ CDD6
1196+ CDD6 EB           ScaleDE75pct:           ex      de,hl
1197+ CDD7 7C                                   ld      a,h
1198+ CDD8 A7                                   and     a
1199+ CDD9 F5                                   push    af
1200+ CDDA F2 E0 CD                             jp      p,.PositiveHL
1201+ CDDD E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
1202+ CDDF 67                                   ld      h,a
1203+ CDE0 D5           .PositiveHL:            push    de
1204+ CDE1 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
1205+ CDE3 29                                   add     hl,hl                       ; * 2
1206+ CDE4 19                                   add     hl,de
1207+ CDE5 D1                                   pop     de
1208+ CDE6                                      ShiftHLRight1
1208+ CDE6 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1208+ CDE8 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1209+ CDEA                                      ShiftHLRight1
1209+ CDEA CB 3C       >			   srl h
1209+ CDEC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1210+ CDEE EB           CheckSign:              ex      de,hl
1211+ CDEF F1                                   pop     af
1212+ CDF0 A7                                   and     a
1213+ CDF1 F0                                   ret     p
1214+ CDF2 7C                                   ld      a,h
1215+ CDF3 F6 80                                or      $80
1216+ CDF5 67                                   ld      h,a
1217+ CDF6 C9                                   ret
1218+ CDF7
1219+ CDF7              ;  Draw a single segment of a circle, adding the point to the ball line heap.
1220+ CDF7              ;  Arguments:
1221+ CDF7              ;   CNT                  The number of this segment
1222+ CDF7              ;   STP                  The step size for the circle
1223+ CDF7              ;   K6(1 0)              The x-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as a screen coordinate
1224+ CDF7              ;   P_New Pos-- (T X)                The y-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as an offset from the centre of the circle
1225+ CDF7              ;   FLAG                 Set to &FF for the first call, so it sets up the first point in the heap but waits until the second call before drawing anything (as we need two points, i.e. two calls, before we can draw a line)
1226+ CDF7              ;   -- Not UsedK                    The circle's radius
1227+ CDF7              ;   -- Not UsedK3(1 0)              Pixel x-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1228+ CDF7              ;   -- Not UsedK4(1 0)              Pixel y-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1229+ CDF7              ;   P_PrevXPos--K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1230+ CDF7              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1231+ CDF7              ;   SWAP                 If non-zero, we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2)
1232+ CDF7              ; Returns:
1233+ CDF7              ;   CNT                  CNT is updated to CNT + STP
1234+ CDF7              ;   A                    The new value of CNT
1235+ CDF7              ;   P_PrevXPos --K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1236+ CDF7              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1237+ CDF7              ;   FLAG                 Set to 0`
1238+ CDF7              ; ** THIS NEEDS CHANGING TO IMMEDIATE DRAW and retain last line end pos) ;
1239+ CDF7              ; Flow of code
1240+ CDF7              ; Entry Bline, prepare T , X K4 etc
1241+ CDF7              ;       BL1
1242+ CDF7 00           PLINEx1                 DB 0
1243+ CDF8 00           PLINEy1                 DB 0
1244+ CDF9 00           PLINEx2                 DB 0
1245+ CDFA 00           PLINEy2                 DB 0
1246+ CDFB
1247+ CDFB                                      IFDEF MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1248+ CDFB ~            ; Store X and Y on plot line (ball) heap, values bc = YX to save, a = offset
1249+ CDFB ~            P_StoreXYOnHeap:        ld      hl,P_BnKPlotXHeap
1250+ CDFB ~                                    ld      bc,(P_NewXPos)
1251+ CDFB ~                                    ld      de,(P_NewYPos)      ; now save Y
1252+ CDFB ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get off set
1253+ CDFB ~                                    add     hl,a                ; now we have x heap target
1254+ CDFB ~                                    ld      (hl),b
1255+ CDFB ~                                    inc     hl
1256+ CDFB ~                                    ld      (hl),c
1257+ CDFB ~                                    ld      a, $80 - 1          ; note its 2 bytes per coord element, we have already incremeted by 1 byte
1258+ CDFB ~                                    add     hl,a
1259+ CDFB ~                                    ld      (hl),d
1260+ CDFB ~                                    inc     hl
1261+ CDFB ~                                    ld      (hl),e
1262+ CDFB ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get index back
1263+ CDFB ~                                    inc     a                   ; move on 2 bytes
1264+ CDFB ~                                    inc     a                   ; .
1265+ CDFB ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; and save it
1266+ CDFB ~                                    ret
1267+ CDFB                                      ENDIF
1268+ CDFB
1269+ CDFB              ; We'll move the calculation of absolute screen pos outside of bline so we expect screen pixel coordinates
1270+ CDFB              BLINE:                  ;ld      a,(P_Tvar)          ; entry point if we need to fetch TX
1271+ CDFB                                      ;ld      h,a
1272+ CDFB                                      ;ld      a,(P_Xreg)
1273+ CDFB                                      ;ld      l,a
1274+ CDFB              BLINE_HL:               ;ld      de,(P_varK4)        ; Set K6(3 2) = (T X) + K4(1 0) = y-coord of centre + y-coord of new point
1275+ CDFB                                      ;ex      de,hl               ;not really needed
1276+ CDFB                                      ;ClearCarryFlag              ; .
1277+ CDFB                                      ;adc     hl,de               ; .
1278+ CDFB                                      ;ld      a,h
1279+ CDFB                                      ;ld      (P_varK6p2),hl      ; so K6(3 2) now contains the y-coordinate of the new point on the circle but as a screen coordinate, to go along with the screen y-coordinate in K6(1 0)
1280+ CDFB 3A D7 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKFlag)       ; If FLAG = 0, jump down to BL1, else its FF so we save first point
1281+ CDFE A7                                   and     a                   ; .
1282+ CDFF CA 09 CE                             jp      z,.BL1              ; .
1283+ CE02              .FirstPlot:
1284+ CE02              ; This code now stores on line heap if debugging is enabled else it just stores in Prev X and Y for direct plotting
1285+ CE02              ; First time in we are just establinshign first position point, then we can exit
1286+ CE02 3C           .BL5:                   inc     a                   ; Flag is &FF so this is the first call to BLINE so increment FLAG to set it to 0
1287+ CE03 32 D7 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a       ; so we just save the first point and don't plot it
1288+ CE06                                      DISPLAY "TODO, set up proper variables, hold variables for previous X Y, we don't need ball heap"
1289+ CE06                                      DISPLAY "TODO, created a plot xy heap to store for debugging purposes, delete once not needed"
1290+ CE06                                      DISPLAY "TODO, need flag for start which is probably CNT being 0?"
1291+ CE06                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1292+ CE06 ~                                    ZeroA
1293+ CE06 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; Initialise line list
1294+ CE06                                      ENDIF
1295+ CE06              ; We don't need to copy to prev here as we do it in BL7
1296+ CE06 C3 37 CE                             jp      .SkipFirstPlot      ; Jump to BL7 to tidy up and return from the subroutine
1297+ CE09              ; This section performs teh clipping and draw of the line. it retrieves previous position and draws to new
1298+ CE09              .BL1:
1299+ CE09              ; note we still need the unclipped points for the next segment as we have to clip again
1300+ CE09                                      ;ld      hl,(PLINEx1)        ; Otherwise the coordinates were swapped by the call to
1301+ CE09                                      ;ld      de,(PLINEx2)        ; LL145 above, so we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2) back
1302+ CE09                                      ;ld      (PLINEx1),de        ; again
1303+ CE09                                      ;ld      (PLINEx2),hl        ; .
1304+ CE09              .BL9:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1305+ CE09              .BL8:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1306+ CE09                                      ;ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex) ; Set Line Stack Pointer to be the same as Plot Index)
1307+ CE09                                      ;ld      (P_BnKLSP),a
1308+ CE09 2A EC C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevXPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1309+ CE0C 22 F7 C0                             ld      (P_XX1510),hl
1310+ CE0F 2A EE C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevYPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1311+ CE12 22 F9 C0                             ld      (P_XX1532),hl
1312+ CE15 2A F0 C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1313+ CE18 22 FB C0                             ld      (P_XX1554),hl
1314+ CE1B 2A F2 C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewYPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1315+ CE1E 22 FD C0                             ld      (P_XX1210),hl
1316+ CE21 CD 0A C3     .CLipLine:              call    P_LL145_6502        ; Clip  line from (X1, Y1) to (X2, Y2), loads to X1,Y1,X2,Y2 P_XX1510 as bytes                        ld      bc,(XX1510)
1317+ CE24 38 11                                jr      c,.LineTotallyClipped
1318+ CE26                                      DISPLAY "TODO what was the Ld de for?"
1319+ CE26              ;                        ld      de,(XX1532)
1320+ CE26                                      DISPLAY "TODO SORT OUT PROPER PLANET COLOR"
1321+ CE26 3E CC        .DrawLine:              ld      a,$CC
1322+ CE28 ED 4B F7 C0                          ld      bc,(P_XX15PlotX1)
1323+ CE2C ED 5B F9 C0                          ld      de,(P_XX15PlotX2)
1324+ CE30                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1324+ CE30 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1325+ CE34 CD AB F5                             call    l2_draw_any_line
1326+ CE37                                      DISPLAY "TODO removed check for starting line segments again as we draw direct"
1327+ CE37              ;                        ld      a,(P_XX13)          ; If XX13 is non-zero, jump up to BL5 to add a &FF marker to the end of the line heap. XX13 is non-zero
1328+ CE37              ;                        and     a                   ; after the call to the clipping routine LL145 above if the end of the line was clipped, meaning the next line
1329+ CE37              ;                        jp      z,.BL5              ; sent to BLINE can't join onto the end but has to start a new segment, and that's what inserting the &FF marker does
1330+ CE37              ; if line was totally clipped just store new x and y as previous and continue from there
1331+ CE37              .SkipFirstPlot:
1332+ CE37              .LineTotallyClipped:
1333+ CE37 2A F0 C0     .BL7:                   ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)        ; Copy the data for this step point from K6(3 2 1 0)
1334+ CE3A ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(P_NewYPos)        ; into K5(3 2 1 0), for use in the next call to BLINE:
1335+ CE3E 22 EC C0                             ld      (P_PrevXPos),hl
1336+ CE41 ED 53 EE C0                          ld      (P_PrevYPos),de
1337+ CE45                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1338+ CE45 ~                                    call    P_StoreXYOnHeap
1339+ CE45                                      ENDIF
1340+ CE45              ;                        ld      (P_varK5),hl        ; * K5(1 0)(3 2) = x, y of previous point
1341+ CE45              ;                        ld      (P_varK5p2),de      ;
1342+ CE45 3A D4 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT)         ; CNT = CNT + STP
1343+ CE48 21 A1 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP
1344+ CE4B                                      ClearCarryFlag
1344+ CE4B B7          >                        or a
1345+ CE4C 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)
1346+ CE4D 32 D4 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a
1347+ CE50 C9                                   ret
1348+ CE51
1349+ CE51              PlanetBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfPlanet
1350+ CE51
